[\[131a.4\]]ni de 'dzin pa med par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs na de yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis bzung ngo /_/rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams zhes bya ba ni de dag skye bo med par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/_des na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems mtshan 
[\[131a.5\]]phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par blta'am/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/_mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par mi blta'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de de bzhin te/_mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[131a.6\]]par mi blta'o/_/rab 'byor gal te mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par blta bar gyur na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur te de bas na mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par mi blta'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad 
[\[131a.7\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs par mi blta'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang dag nga la gzugs su mthong /_/gang dag nga la sgrar shes pa/_/log par spong bar 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]zhugs pa ste/_/skye bo de dag nga mi mthong /_/sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid blta/_/'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku/_/chos nyid rig par bya min pas/_/de ni rnam par shes mi nus/_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[131b.2\]]so snyam du 'dzin na/_rab 'byor khyod kyis de ltar mi blta ste/_rab 'byor mtshan phun sum tshogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa med do/_/rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_
[\[131b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis chos la la zhig rnam par bshig gam/_chad par btags pa snyam du 'dzin na/_rab 'byor de ltar mi blta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyis chos gang la yang rnam par bshig pa'am/_chad 
[\[131b.4\]]par btags pa med do/_/yang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin pa bas/_byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig chos rnams bdag med cing skye ba med pa la bzod pa thob na de 
[\[131b.5\]]nyid gzhi de las bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du skyed do/_/yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi phung po yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi phung po yongs su gzung bar mi bgyi lags sam/_
[\[131b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor yongs su gzung mod kyis log par mi gzung ste/_des na yongs su gzung ba zhes bya'o/_/rab 'byor gang la la zhig 'di skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pa bzhud dam/_byon tam/_bzhengs sam/_bzhugs sam/_mnal ba mdzad 
[\[131b.7\]]do zhes de skad zer na/_des na ngas bshad pa'i don mi shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni gar yang ma bzhud/_gang nas kyang ma byon pa'i phyir te/_des na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o/_/
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]yang rab 'byor rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sa'i rdul rnams ji snyed yod pa de dag 'di lta ste dper na rdul phra rab kyi tshogs bzhin du phye mar byas na/_rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/_rdul phra rab kyi tshogs de 
[\[132a.2\]]mang ba yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/_rdul phra rab kyi tshogs de mang ba lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gal te tshogs shig mchis par gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rdul phra rab kyi tshogs zhes bka' mi stsal ba'i slad 
[\[132a.3\]]du'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis rdul phra rab kyi tshogs zhes gang gsungs pa de tshogs ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i slad du ste/_des na rdul phra rab kyi tshogs zhes bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[132a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams zhes gang gsungs pa de khams ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/_des na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das gal te khams shig mchis par gyur na/_de nyid ril 
[\[132a.5\]]por 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas ril por 'dzin par gang gsungs pa de 'dzin pa ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te/_des na ril por 'dzin pa zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor ril por 'dzin 
[\[132a.6\]]pa nyid ni tha snyad de/_chos de ni brjod du med pa yin na/_de yang byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis bzung ngo /_/rab 'byor gang la la zhig 'di skad du/_de bzhin gshegs pas bdag tu lta bar gsungs te/_de bzhin gshegs pas sems can du lta ba dang /_srog 
[\[132a.7\]]tu lta ba dang /_gang zag tu lta bar gsungs so zhes zer na/_rab 'byor de yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin nam/_rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pas bdag tu lta bar gang gsungs pa de lta ba ma mchis par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i slad du ste/_des na bdag tu lta ba zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par 
[\[132b.2\]]zhugs pas 'di ltar chos thams cad shes par bya blta bar bya mos par bya ste/_ci nas chos su 'du shes pa la yang mi gnas pa de ltar mos par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor chos su 'du shes chos su 'du shes zhes bya ba ni 'du shes med par de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs 
[\[132b.3\]]pa'i phyir te/_des na chos su 'du shes zhes bya'o/_/yang rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med cing grangs med pa dag/_rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin pa bas/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[132b.4\]]kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam blangs nas/_'dzin tam/_klog gam/_kun chub par byed dam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/_de nyid gzhi de las bsod nams ches mang du grangs 
[\[132b.5\]]med dpag tu med pa bskyed do/_/ji ltar yang dag par rab tu ston ce na/_ji ltar yang dag par rab tu mi ston pa bzhin du ste/_des na yang dag par rab tu ston pa zhes bya'o/_/skar ma rab rib mar me dang /_/sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang /_/rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bur/_/
[\[132b.6\]]'dus byas de ltar blta bar bya/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_gnas brtan rab 'byor dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_'khor bzhi po dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha 
[\[132b.7\]]ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]{D17}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA na ya sha ta pany+tsA sha ti kA/_bod skad du/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_
[\[133a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyi cod pan gyis khams gsum du dbang bcu rdzogs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 
[\[133a.3\]]dang ldan pa/_rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgyas chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa/_sna tshogs kyi bya ba mdzad de/_ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs 
[\[133a.4\]]su bskang ba'i 'phrin las mdzad pa/_thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa khams gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs thams cad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/_lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas/_'dod pa'i 
[\[133a.5\]]khams thams cad na/_nor bu rin po che chen pos rab tu spras pa dang /_ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dril bu brgyus pa rlung gis bskyod pa dang /_me tog gi phreng ba dang /_rnga ma dang /_rgyan phreng dang /_chun 'phyang dang /_zla ba lta bus mdzes par byas pa/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[133a.6\]]pa thams cad bzhugs pa/_shis pa thams cad bstod pa na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_nam mkha'i snying po dang /_
[\[133a.7\]]rdo rje khu tshur dang /_'jam dpal dang /_sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_nam mkha' mdzod dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]brgya dang thabs cig ste/_yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba thog mar dge ba/_bar du dge ba tha mar dge ba don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs 
[\[133b.2\]]pa/_yongs su dag pa/_yongs su byang ba yang dag par ston te/_'di ltar rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/_/'dod chags kyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/_/reg 
[\[133b.3\]]pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/_/sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/_/thams cad la dbang phyug dang /_dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems 
[\[133b.4\]]dpa'i gnas so/_/lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/_/dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/_/sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas 
[\[133b.5\]]so/_/snyems pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/_/rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/_/yid tshim par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas 
[\[133b.6\]]so/_/snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/_/lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/_/gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/_/sgra 
[\[133b.7\]]rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/_/dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/_/ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/_/reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]de ni 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa ste/_chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o/_/lag na rdo rje 
[\[134a.2\]]su la las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo sgrub pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig thos na yang de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad dang chod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_chos kyi sgrib pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa chen po 
[\[134a.3\]]bsags kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song du nam yang skye bar mi 'gyur/_sdig pa yang byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/su zhig 'dzin pa dang /_nyin re zhing klog pa dang /_kha ton byed pa dang /_tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de tshe 'di 
[\[134a.4\]]nyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas chos thams cad la dbang bsgyur bar 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad la dga' ba dang /_mgu ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshe bcu drug gis de bzhin 
[\[134a.5\]]gshegs pa'am/_rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa/_dkyil 'khor thams cad pa/_rdo rje 'dzin mtha' dag gi sems can gyi mchog khams gsum ma lus pa 
[\[134a.6\]]mtha' dag na 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba/_sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa 'dul ba/_don thams cad grub pa/_dam tshig chen po pa/_rdo rje gsang ba'i sems can chen po du mas g.yog byas pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 
[\[134a.7\]]gyi don 'di ston te/_bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings te thog ma'i rdo rje chen po gsor nas rang gi snying gar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di smras so/_/hU~M/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrub pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/_/rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang 
[\[134b.2\]]chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/_/don gcig pa'i phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/_/ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/_/thams cad la rnam par mi 
[\[134b.3\]]rtog pa'i phyir thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o/_/lag na rdo rje su la la chos mngon par sgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad spyod kyang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug 
[\[134b.4\]]gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur ro/_/myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs 
[\[134b.5\]]su 'dzin pa don gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te/_chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di rab tu smras so/_/a/_de nas ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas kyang yang chos thams 
[\[134b.6\]]cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di bshad de/_'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do/_/zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid do/_/gti 
[\[134b.7\]]mug gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis chos thams cad spros pa med pa nyid do/_/chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa nyid du rig par bya'o/_/lag na rdo rje su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang /_'dzin 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]pa dang /_klog pa dang /_sgom pa des 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 
[\[135a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos nyid 'di'i don rgya cher ston te/_'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas khro gnyer dang bcas shing smin ma bteg ste/_'bar bar lta la pad+ma'i gdong khro zhing dgod de/_mche ba 
[\[135a.3\]]gtsigs nas/_rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul du gnas pas gnas nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/_/hUM/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid thob pas yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[135a.4\]]gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/_'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par 
[\[135a.5\]]dag par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje su la la shes 
[\[135a.6\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_sgom pa de 'dod chags dang /_dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang /_dri ma rnams dang /_glo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 
[\[135a.7\]]'gyur te/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]te/_/pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri mas mi gos pa la lta zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi phyir pad+ma gzugs sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/_/hrIH/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang 
[\[135b.2\]]pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/_dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro/_/nor sbyin pa ni re ba thams 
[\[135b.3\]]cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/zang zing sbyin pa ni lus dang ngag dang sems kyi bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po bzhin rab 
[\[135b.4\]]tu 'dzum ste/_rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching zhing don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/_dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/_/trA~M/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag 
[\[135b.5\]]rgya thob pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[135b.6\]]kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 
[\[135b.7\]]'dzin pa ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems thams cad rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_lung 'bogs pa dang /_sgom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang /_phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang /_shes pa thams cad dang /_dgos pa thams cad dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems thams cad 
[\[136a.2\]]rdo rjer rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i khu tshur dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pas 
[\[136a.3\]]don gnas 'di rgya cher bstan te/_de bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje sra ba'i phyag rgya dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/_/aH/_de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba 
[\[136a.4\]]zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/_ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid do/_/mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o/_/smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o/_/shes 
[\[136a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/_bzhin rab tu 'dzum bzhin du bdag gi ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[136a.6\]]la 'debs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i mchog 'di smras so/_/a/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor der 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 
[\[136a.7\]]'di bshad do/_/rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/don gyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/chos thams cad kyi 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos nyid 
[\[136b.2\]]kyi don 'di rgya cher ston cing 'dzum dmul nas rdo rje'i 'khor lo bskor zhing rdo rje'i 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/_/hU~M/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i snod kyis mchod pa thams cad 
[\[136b.3\]]kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/_/byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/_/sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod 
[\[136b.4\]]pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/_/dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_brjod pa dang /_ston pa dang /_
[\[136b.5\]]nyan pa dang /_sems pa dang /_sgom pa dang /_mchod pa byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod don de nyid rgya cher ston te/_bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing las thams 
[\[136b.6\]]cad don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/_/oM/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad 'dul nus pa yang ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa sems can thams cad 'dul ba shes pa'i snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[136b.7\]]phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/_/sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid do/_/sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba nyid do/_/sems can thams cad chos nyid pas khro ba chos nyid do/_/sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]khro bo rdo rje nyid do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub bo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa don de nyid rgya cher ston te/_bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang /_rdo rje 
[\[137a.2\]]gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyis rdo rje khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/_/ha/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/_/thams 
[\[137a.3\]]cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do/_/thams cad don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do/_/thams cad chos nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do/_/thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[137a.4\]]las nyid du rig par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/_don yod pa thams cad 
[\[137a.5\]]kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so/_/hUM/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems can thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[137a.6\]]sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no/_/thams cad rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas sems can thams cad ni rdo rje'i snying po can no/_/ngag thams cad rab tu 
[\[137a.7\]]'byung bas sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po can no/_/sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas sems can thams cad ni las kyi snying po can no/_/de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs rnams kyis ca co'i sgra phyung nas/_chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing snying po 
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]phul te/_de nas rdo rje'i dbang phyug chen pos rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/_/drI/_de nas ma mo thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te tshig 'thun par thams cad dgug pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_gzhig pa dang /_sgrub pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho 
[\[137b.2\]]na'i snying po 'di phul lo/_/b+h+yoH/_de nas sbrang rtsir byed pa la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te tshig 'thun par rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo/_/swA/_de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/_rang gi de kho na'i snying po 
[\[137b.3\]]'di phul lo/_/hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas mu med la mthar thug cing mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang chos 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pas byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje 
[\[137b.4\]]zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do/_/shes rab kyi 
[\[137b.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas chos thams cad du ma nyid do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa med pa nyid pas chos thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid yin no/_/su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_
[\[137b.6\]]klog pa dang /_ston pa dang /_brjod pa dang /_sgom pa des sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te/_sgrib pa thams cad zad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[137b.7\]]'dus te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don yod pa dang /_thogs pa med par myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/_lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/sems can chen po legs so legs/_/bde ba chen po legs so legs/_/theg pa chen po legs so legs/_/
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]blo gros chen po legs so legs/_/cho ga 'di ni legs par smras/_/sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis/_/'bras bu yod pa 'dul ba'i mchog_/rdo rje mdo sde byin gyis brlabs/_/cho ga'i rgyal po bla na med/_/gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni/_/
[\[138a.2\]]bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis/_/de dag mi sod mi tshugs so/_/sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang /_/sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin/_/ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur/_/de skad gsungs nas gsang 
[\[138a.3\]]grub phyir/_/rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la/_/dkon mchog sangs rgyas mkhas bcas pa/_/thams cad kyis ni mngon par bstod/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa 
[\[138a.4\]]chos thams cad spros pa med pas yang bde ba chen po rdo rje'i don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje don yod pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mchog dang po thog ma dang /_tha ma dang /_dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po 
[\[138a.5\]]rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bde ba chen po dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub 
[\[138a.6\]]dam par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam pa ni bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud 
[\[138a.7\]]chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam pa ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni 'jig 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]rten gyi khams ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir 'khor ba la yang chags shing brtson 'grus che ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongs su 
[\[138b.2\]]bskyab pa dang /_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba dang /_mchog tu shin tu bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni/_/mkhas mchog 'dug par 'gyur ba'i tshe/_/de srid mtshungs med sems can don/_/
[\[138b.3\]]mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus/_/shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang /_/ye shes gnas su bsgrubs pas ni/_/chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_/'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur/_/chags la sogs pas 'dul na ni/_/'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang /_/'jig rten sdig byed de 
[\[138b.4\]]sbyang phyir/_/'khor ba'i srid du bdag nyid 'dul/_/ji ltar pad+ma rab dmar yang /_/tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa/_/de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis/_/'gro phan rnams la mi gos so/_/'dod chags chen po rnam par dag_/bde ba che zhing nor che la/_/khams 
[\[138b.5\]]gsum dbang phyug thob pas na/_/sems can don rnams brtan par byed/_/lag na rdo rje su la la nang par langs nas mchog dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re zhing 'don pa dang /_nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_sgom 
[\[138b.6\]]pa de yid bde ba dang /_bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur ro/_/bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog kyang 'grub ste/_rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi chen po'am/_de 
[\[138b.7\]]bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_gsang ba'i bdag po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i sngags kyi tshig nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di rnams so/_/oM byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/_oM kun tu 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]bzang po'i spyod pa/_oM yid bzhin gyi nor bu/_oM 'gog pa med pa/_oM skye ba bzlog pa/_oM rnam par shes pa thams cad/_oM 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid chen po/_/oM brtson 'grus kyi go cha/_oM kun tu 'gro ba/_oM rdo rje sra ba'i sems hUM phaT/_
[\[139a.2\]]oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/_oM ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa/_oM chos nyid shes pa rnam par dag pa/_oM de bzhin las rnam par sbyong ba/_hUM/_oM nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can phaT/_oM 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa/_oM spong ba'i rdo rje can/_oM hUM thams cad 'dul 
[\[139a.3\]]ba/_oM hrIHoM a zhes bya ba'i sgo/_oM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/_A~M ba~M hU~M a/_oM/_oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog_/oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par dag pa/_oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje aH/_oM a 
[\[139a.4\]]sdig pa'i bcings pa thams cad choms shig_/ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las thar bar gyis shig_/oM dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje/_hUM tra Ta/_sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub dam pa rdo rje 'dzin chen 
[\[139a.5\]]po dang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/lag na rdo rje 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyi rna lam du thos par mi 'gyur ro/_/'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa rnams kyis mnyan pa'am/_yi ger 'dri ba'am/_yi ger 'drir gzhug pa'am/_
[\[139a.6\]]bklag pa'am/_'chang ba'am/_bsgom pa'am/_bsti stang du bya ba'am/_ri mor bya ba'am/_mchod par mi nus so/_/gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na yi ge 'bru gcig tsam thos na yang sems can de dag ni gzhan na 
[\[139a.7\]]sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na mtha' dag rdzogs pa lta ci smos/_/lag na rdo rje gang la la dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang gA'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma snyed la bkur sti ma byas pa dang /_bla mar ma byas pa dang /_bsti stang ma byas pa dang /_mchod pa 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]ma byas pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par mi nus so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang na spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gi lus la thogs sam/_glegs bam la 
[\[139b.2\]]bris te spyod pa'i gang zag de phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro/_/de bskal pa bye ba mang por skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/de la bdud sdig to can bar chad byed par mi 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha gzhan rnams kyang de la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sba ba'i 
[\[139b.3\]]phyir rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur ro/_/ya nga ba ma spangs par 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang der skye'o/_/de ltar shes rab 
[\[139b.4\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di phan yon mang mod kyi ngas phyogs tsam zhig brjod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_
[\[139b.5\]]thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga 
[\[139b.6\]]bcu pa rdzogs so//[ {D18}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya b+ha ga ba tI pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA pany+tsA sha ti ka_/bod skad du/_'phags pa bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bcu pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[139b.7\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]bzhugs te/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge 
[\[140a.2\]]bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma du ma dag dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor gang la la zhig nyan thos kyis la slob par 'dod pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis la slob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[140a.3\]]phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_kun chub par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha

[\[140a.5\]]tu phyin pa 'di nyid du rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la slob par 'dod pas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/_gzung bar bya/_bcang bar bya/_bklag par bya/_kun chub par bya'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[140a.6\]]dpa' thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mngon par brtson par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[140a.7\]]chen pos gang la bslab par bya ba dang /_rnal 'byor du bya ba sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid du rgya cher bstan pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor dge ba'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs rnams dang /_nyan thos kyi chos rnams 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du chud cing 'dus te 'ub la yang dag par gzhol ba yin no/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_

[\[140b.4\]]rgyas kyi chos rnams gang dag yin pa rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nang du chud cing 'dus te 'ub la yang dag par gzhol ba yin no zhes bgyi ba de dag gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor 'di lta ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul 
[\[140b.5\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid

[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang /_'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang /_tshad med pa bzhi dang /_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /_rnam par

[\[141a.3\]]gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_

[\[141b.1\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kye ma a la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gting dpag dka' ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro/_/rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/_bcom

[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub bzung ba yin no/_/rab 'byor de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang

[\[142a.3\]]de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par

[\[142a.7\]]phyin pa ni gnyis su blta bar mi bya/_gnyis ma yin par yang ma yin/_mtshan mar ma yin/_mtshan ma ma yin par yang ma yin blang bar yang ma yin/_dor bar yang ma yin/_bsnan par ma yin/_bsnan pa med par yang ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs par ma 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]yin/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin par yang ma yin/_rnam par byang bar ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin par yang ma yin/_spang bar ma yin/_spang ba ma yin par yang ma yin/_gnas su ma yin/_gnas su ma yin par yang ma yin/_sbyor bar ma yin/_

[\[142b.3\]]yin/_yang dag pa'i mthar ma yin/_yang dag pa'i mthar ma yin par yang ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid mnyam mo/_/chos thams cad zab pa'i 
[\[142b.4\]]phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/chos thams cad dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben no/_/chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med do/_/chos thams cad rlom sems med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[142b.5\]]tu phyin pa rlom sems med do/_/chos thams cad 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jigs pa med do/_/chos thams cad bag tsha ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bag tsha ba med do/_/chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro 
[\[142b.6\]]gcig go/_/chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med do/_/chos thams cad 'gags pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gags pa med do/_/chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bu'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' 
[\[142b.7\]]lta bu'o/_/gzugs su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/_/sa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]phyin pa mu med do/_/de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/_/ri rab mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu 
[\[143a.2\]]phyin pa mu med do/_/rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/_/rdo rje mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam mo/_/chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbyer med do/_/chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs su 
[\[143a.3\]]med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med do/_/chos thams cad bsal ba med par mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsal ba med par mnyam mo/_/chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med do/_/
[\[143a.4\]]chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam 
[\[143a.5\]]gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi 
[\[143a.6\]]pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad de/_'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus 
[\[143a.7\]]byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/_mdor na stong pa nyid 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/skar ma rab rib mar me dang /_/sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang /_/
[\[143b.2\]]rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu/_/'dus byas de ltar blta bar bya/_/na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi twA yai/_oM d+hIHhrIHshrI shru ti smr-i ti ma ti ga ti bi dza ye swA hA/_'gag pa med cing skye med la/_/chad pa med cing rtag pa med/_/tha dad don min don gcig min/_/'ong ba med 
[\[143b.3\]]cing 'gro med la/_/spros pa zhi bas zhi ba yi/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ston pa/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa/_/smra mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_lha'i dbang 
[\[143b.4\]]po brgya byin dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa shes rab kyi pha 
[\[143b.5\]]rol tu phyin pa kau shi ka zhes bya ba rdzogs so//[ {D20}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya pany+tsa bing+sha ti ka pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA mu kha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa 
[\[143b.6\]]lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi zom la lha thams cad kyi mtshan mo'i gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bye 
[\[143b.7\]]ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das lha dang /_lha'i bu dang /_lha ma yin dang /_rlung lha dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_mi'am ci dang /_srin po dang /_rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang /_
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]'byung po dang /_log 'dren dang /_sha za dang /_snang ba dang /_mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs shin tu mang zhing rgya che ba dpag tshad lnga'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa sha stag dang /_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar nas chos ston to/_/de nas 
[\[144a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing /_rig pa'i tshogs dang /_phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang /_rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste 
[\[144a.3\]]phyin nas/_bar snang las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' 
[\[144a.4\]]stsal pa/_gsang ba pa'i bdag po nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di dag ni nga'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo yin no/_/sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM byang chub kyi sems kyi rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM kun tu bzang 
[\[144a.5\]]po'i spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM yid bzhin gyi nor bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM 'gog pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM skye bar 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM rnam par shes pa thams cad 
[\[144a.6\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM 'bar ba chen po'i chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM brtson 'grus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM rdo rje thams cad brtan pa'i sems shes rab 
[\[144a.7\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM las rnam par sbyong ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]oM nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can phaT shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM 'dod pa la 'dod chags rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM mgyogs pa'i rdo rje can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM hU~M thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab 
[\[144b.2\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM hrIHshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM a zhes bya ba'i sgo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM a~M ba hU~M shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/
[\[144b.3\]]oM e shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[144b.4\]]cad kyi thugs rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin 
[\[144b.5\]]dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//skad gsar chad kyis 
[\[144b.6\]]bcos nas gtan la phab pa//[ {D21}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_b+ha ga ba tI pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA hr-i da ya/_bod skad du/_bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po/_bam po gcig go/_/bcom 
[\[144b.7\]]ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]tu bzhugs te/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das zab mo snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[145a.2\]]pa zab mo spyod pa nyid la rnam par lta zhing /_phung po lnga po de dag la yang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam par lta'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di 
[\[145a.3\]]skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des ji ltar bslab par bya/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang 
[\[145a.4\]]phyug gis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des 'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya ste/_phung po lnga po de dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong 
[\[145a.5\]]par rnam par yang dag par rjes su blta'o/_/gzugs stong pa'o/_/stong pa nyid gzugs so/_/gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin/_stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed dang /_rnam par shes 
[\[145a.6\]]pa rnams stong pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na chos thams cad stong pa nyid de/_mtshan nyid med pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa/_dri ma med pa/_dri ma dang bral ba med pa/_bri ba med pa/_gang ba med pa'o/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na stong pa nyid la gzugs 
[\[145a.7\]]med/_tshor ba med/_'du shes med/_'du byed rnams med/_rnam par shes pa med/_mig med/_rna ba med/_sna med/_lce med/_lus med/_yid med/_gzugs med/_sgra med/_dri med/_ro med/_reg bya med/_chos med do/_/mig gi khams med 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]pa nas yid kyi khams med yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du yang med do/_/ma rig pa med/_ma rig pa zad pa med pa nas rga shi med/_rga shi zad pa'i bar du yang med do/_/sdug bsngal ba dang /_kun 'byung ba dang /_'gog pa dang /_lam med/_ye shes med/_
[\[145b.2\]]thob pa med/_ma thob pa yang med do/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams thob pa med pa'i phyir/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing gnas te/_sems la sgrib pa med pas skrag pa med de/_phyin ci log las shin tu 'das nas mya ngan las 
[\[145b.3\]]'das pa'i mthar phyin to/_/dus gsum du rnam par bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/de lta bas na shes rab kyi 
[\[145b.4\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/_rig pa chen po'i sngags/_bla na med pa'i sngags/_mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sngags/_sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags/_mi rdzun pas na bden par shes par bya ste/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngags 
[\[145b.5\]]smras pa/_tad+ya thA/_ga te ga te pA ra ga te/_pA ra saM ga te/_bo d+hi swA hA/_shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la bslab par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/_byang chub 
[\[145b.6\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[145b.7\]]pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i 
[\[146a.2\]]mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong rin chen sdes bsgyur cing /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge blo dang nam mkha' la sogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//dpal bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa'i gtsug lag gi dge rgyas bye ma gling gi rtsig ngos la bris pa 
[\[146a.3\]]dang zhu dag legs par bgyis so//[ {D22}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya swa lpA k+Sha ra pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_
[\[146a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu 
[\[146a.5\]]bzhugs te/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/_dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 
[\[146a.6\]]stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_'dzum mul te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung 
[\[146a.7\]]ngu la bsod nams che ba/_gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs ma mchis par gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/_/
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir brtson pa legs so legs so/_/de'i phyir rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la 
[\[146b.2\]]yid la zung shig dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu la bsod nams che ba gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ba dang /_byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pa de dag bgegs 
[\[146b.3\]]med par sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/_de nas bcom 
[\[146b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sems can thams cad dgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/mnyam par bzhag pa des smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i phrag nas 'od zer 'bum phrag du ma byung ste/_'od zer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab par gyur to/_/sems can 
[\[146b.5\]]gang dag 'od zer des reg pa sems can dmyal ba pa yan chad sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du lha'i tsan dan gyi phye 
[\[146b.6\]]ma'i char yang phab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gsungs pa 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpas mnyam pa'i sems dang byams pa'i sems dang byas pa gzo ba dang /_sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sems su bya'o/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying 
[\[146b.7\]]po 'di yang gdon par bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/tad+ya thA/_oM mu ne mu ne ma hA mu na ye swA hA/_ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo/_/
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyang 'di las byung ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chen po las khyod kyis 'di nyid thob pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/_/khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[147a.2\]]sangs rgyas 'od zer kun nas 'phags pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas nyid du lung yang bstan to/_/gang dag khyod kyi ming nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher ston pa dang /_glegs bam du bris nas mchod pa byed pa de dag 
[\[147a.3\]]thams cad ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro/_/tad+ya thA/_dza ya dza ya/_pad+mA b+he/_a ba me sa ra sa ra Ni/_ng+hi ri d+hi ri/_d+hi ri d+hi ri/_de ba tA nu pA la ne/_bud+d+ha ut+ta ra Ni pU ra ya b+ha ga ba ti/_sarbA sha ma sha ma sarba sa twA nA~M/_sarba karmA ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ya/_bud d+ha a d+hi Sh+ThA ne na swA hA/_
[\[147a.4\]]don dam par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i yum 'phral du sdig pa 'phrog pa/_byang chub sbyin par byed pa ste/_'di lta ste/_bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis phan yon brjod par mi nus so/_/'di bklags 
[\[147a.5\]]pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i 
[\[147a.6\]]slad du 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_thabs sla ba'i phyir te/_sems can gang dag spro ba chung ba de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa de dag thams cad thabs sla 
[\[147a.7\]]bas byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur te/_de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]kyis ji tsam du sems can thams cad la sman pa dang /_sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' stsal pa/_bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/_/bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces 
[\[147b.2\]]bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs 
[\[147b.3\]]pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ge nyung ngu zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//[ {D23}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_e ka ak+Sha rI mA tA nA ma sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/_bod skad du/_de bzhin 
[\[147b.4\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma yi ge gcig ma zhes bya ba/_yum chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la/_dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[147b.5\]]chen po brgya phrag phyed dang bcu gsum dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma yi ge gcig ma zhes bya ba 
[\[147b.6\]]'di sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir zung shig_/'di lta ste/_a/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rjes 
[\[147b.7\]]su rtogs shing yi rangs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma yi ge gcig ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]{D24}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya sap+ta sha ti kA nA ma pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdun brgya pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di 
[\[148a.2\]]skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong stong tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen 
[\[148a.3\]]po bgos pa sa ya thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byams pa dang /_spobs pa thogs med dang /_brtson pa mi 'dor dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems 
[\[148a.4\]]dpa' sa ya dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir skya rengs shar ba'i dus kyi tshe rang gi gnas nas byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgo ga la ba der song nas phyin 
[\[148a.5\]]pa dang pho brang gi sgo'i phyi rol na 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir rang gi gnas nas byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_
[\[148a.6\]]tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kA t+yA'i bu chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang /_de dag thams cad dang gzhan yang nyan thos chen po rnams rang rang gi gnas nas byung ste/_bcom ldan 'das kyi pho brang ga la ba der 
[\[148a.7\]]dong nas phyin pa dang phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos chen po rnams 'ongs shing lhags te 'dus par mkhyen nas bdag gi pho brang nas byung ste pho brang gi phyi rol phyogs gcig tu gdan bting ba la bzhugs so/_/bzhugs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]kyis mkhyen bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod ci'i phyir zhogs pas 'ongs te de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgo na 'dug_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[148b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi thog ma nyid du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi chab sgor mchis so/_/bdag ni bcom ldan 'das la blta bar 'tshal ba'i slad du slad kyis mchis so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du 'jam 
[\[148b.3\]]dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyi thog ma nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang gi sgor 'dug pa bden nam/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 
[\[148b.4\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags/_bde bar gshegs pa de de lta lags te/_bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du thams cad kyi thog ma nyid rang gi gnas nas 
[\[148b.5\]]byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho brang ga la ba der mchis nas phyogs gcig tu mchis so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /_phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi bas ma ngoms pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[148b.6\]]'das 'di ltar bdag de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du mchis pa de yang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du ste/_bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang phyag bgyi ba dang bsnyen bkur bgyi ba ji ltar bdag gis 
[\[148b.7\]]mthong ba dang ji ltar ba dag phyag bgyid pa dang ji ltar bdag bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de ltar blta bar bgyi'o/_/de ltar phyag bgyi'o/_/de ltar bsnyen bkur bgyi'o/_/de lta na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba nas bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni sems 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]can thams cad kyi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar blta/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid kyi rnam pa dang rnam par 
[\[149a.2\]]mi rtog pa'i rnam par de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la mi skye ba'i rnam par blta ba nas dngos po ma mchis pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin nyid la kun nas 'byung ba ma mchis te/_de ltar de bzhin 
[\[149a.3\]]gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin nyid ni 'byung ba yang ma lags 'jig pa yang ma lags te/_de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin nyid ni yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas te de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[149a.4\]]nyid ni 'das pa la ma lags/_ma 'ongs pa la ma lags/_da ltar byung ba la ma lags te/_de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin nyid ni gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba ma lags/_gnyis su ma mchis pas rab tu phye ba yang ma lags te/_de ltar de bzhin 
[\[149a.5\]]gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin nyid ni kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba ma lags/_rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ma lags te/_de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag pa ste/_de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta bar 
[\[149a.6\]]bgyi'o/_/de lta na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang phyag bgyis pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis de ltar bltas na ci zhig 
[\[149a.7\]]mthong /_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de ltar bltas na/_ci yang mthong ba ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bdag gis chos gang la yang skye ba yang ma mthong /_'gog pa yang ma mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la de ltar mthong ba dang /_de ltar bsnyen bkur byas pa gang yin pa dang /_khyod kyi byams pa chen po sems can thams cad la nye bar gnas kyang khyod la sems can du dmigs 
[\[149b.2\]]pa dang /_sems can du mngon par zhen pa ci yang med cing sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir zhugs kyang khyod la sems can du mngon par zhen pa gang yang mi 'byung ba dang /_khyod mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang dngos po med pa'i tshul dang sgyid lug pa med 
[\[149b.3\]]pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad kyi ched du go cha bgos pa de ni khyod dka' ba byed pa'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/_
[\[149b.4\]]sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyir go cha 'di yang bgos te/_bdag la sems can du dmigs pa'am/_sems can la mngon par zhen pa gang yang med do/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu go cha de ni 'di ltar bdag gis sems can gyi khams bri ba'am gang 
[\[149b.5\]]bar bya zhes de ltar ma bgos so/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung ste/_gal te sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re na gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so nas nyin mtshan du chos ston te/_
[\[149b.6\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bzhugs par gyur la/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa re res sems can ji snyed btul ba de snyed kyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa re res chos bstan pa re res btul bar gyur du 
[\[149b.7\]]zin kyang sems can gyi khams la bri ba'am gang bar mngon pa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can dben pa dang /_sems can sems can ma yin pa'i phyir te/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems can gyi khams ni bri ba'am gang bar mi mngon no/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal gal te sems can dben pa dang /_sems can sems can ma yin pa'i phyir sems can gyi khams bri ba dang gang bar mi mngon na/_'o na byang chub mngon par 
[\[150a.2\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas su la chos ston/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe sems can shin tu mi dmigs pa de'i tshe su zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[150a.3\]]rgya su la chos bstan par bya/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal gang gi tshe chos thams cad shin tu mi 
[\[150a.4\]]dmigs pa de'i tshe ci sems can du yang 'dogs sam/_yang gal te 'jam dpal khyod la 'ga' zhig sems can ji snyed yod ces de skad 'dri na/_de la khyod kyis ji skad bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[150a.5\]]chos ji snyed pa de snyed do zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te yang sems can gyi khams kyi tshad ji tsam zhes 'dri na/_de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi tshad ji tsam mo zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal 
[\[150a.6\]]khyod gal te yang la la zhig 'di skad du sems can gyi khams gang du gtogs zhes 'dri na de la khyod kyis ji skad bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 'di skad du skye ba med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gang du gtogs par gtogs so zhes 
[\[150a.7\]]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal gal te yang la la zhig khyod la 'di skad du/_sems can gyi khams ci la gnas zhes 'dri na/_de la khyod kyis ji skad bya/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la bdag gis 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]'di skad du/_skye ba med pa'i khams ci la gnas pa de la sems can gyi khams kyang gnas so zhes bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de'i tshe/_ci la gnas te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[150b.2\]]sgom/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de'i tshe mi gnas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal mi gnas pa la shes rab 
[\[150b.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom du yang ci yod/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang ci la yang mi gnas pa de nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol 
[\[150b.4\]]tu phyin pa la sgom pa de'i tshe khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'am 'bri bar 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'am/_'bri bar 'gyur ba ci yang ma mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang las chos 
[\[150b.5\]]'ga' zhig 'phel ba'am 'bri ba mchis na/_de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ma lags te/_bcom ldan 'das gang yang chos 'ga' zhig 'phel ba'i slad du'am/_'bri ba'i slad du nye bar gnas pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ma lags par rig par 
[\[150b.6\]]bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang mi spong la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mi len pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ni chos gang spong ba 
[\[150b.7\]]'am blang bar dmigs pas chos gang la yang mi gnas pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang 'khor ba'i skyon du yang mi mchi la/_mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan du yang mi mchi ba de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]'das 'di ltar 'khor ba nyid kyang mi mthong na 'khor ba'i skyon lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_mya ngan las 'das pa nyid mi dmigs na mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das gang chos gang la yang blang ba'am gzung ba'am dor ba 
[\[151a.2\]]ma mchis pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang chos gang la yang 'grib pa dang 'phel ba mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa la 'grib pa dang 'phel 
[\[151a.3\]]ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag par mi bgyid pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang chos gang la 
[\[151a.4\]]yang 'grib pa'am rgyas par mi bgyid pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das gang de ltar sgom pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos la yang mi smon cing nyi tshe ba la yang 
[\[151a.5\]]mi smon gyi/_bcom ldan 'das gang la smon pa dang /_gang gis smon pa de nyid kyang ma mchis pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar sgom na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[151a.6\]]pa sgom pa ni 'di ltar chos 'di dag ni mchog go/_/chos 'di dag ni tha ma'o zhes bgyi bar nye bar mi gnas shing chos gang dag mchog dang tha mar 'gyur ba'i chos de dag kyang mi dmigs te/_de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa'i rigs kyi bu ni 
[\[151a.7\]]chos thams cad mi dmigs so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ni chos gang yang mchog ce'am tha ma zhes mi rtog go/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das skye ba ma mchis pa la mchog gam tha ma zhes bgyi ba gang yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_chos thams cad kyi bar la yang mchog gam tha ma ma mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar sgom na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur 
[\[151b.2\]]pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mchog ma yin nam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gzung du ma mchis pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni mchog lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong 
[\[151b.3\]]par de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal de de bzhin te/_de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad stong par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_
[\[151b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das stong pa nyid la mchog gam tha ma zhes bgyi ba mchis sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal de de bzhin te/_ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams bla 
[\[151b.5\]]na med pa ma yin nam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_de de lta lags te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni bla na ma mchis pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de dag la chos cung zad tsam yang ma mchis shing mi dmigs te/_de bas na sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[151b.6\]]chos de dag ni bla na ma mchis pa'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sgrub par yang mi bgyid la/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams spong bar yang mi bgyid cing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams 'dul ba yang ma lags la 'dzin pa yang ma lags pa de shes rab kyi pha 
[\[151b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang chos gang la yang mi sems la rnam par mi rig pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]sems sam/_'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su grub par mthong na ni bdag sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la sems pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ni 'di 
[\[152a.2\]]dag ni so so'i skye bo'i chos so/_/'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes chos gang la yang rnam par rtog pas nye bar gnas pa ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das shes rab 
[\[152a.3\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa'i rigs kyi bus chos de nyid kyang mi dmigs te/_gang la chos de dag so so'i skye bo'i chos zhes brjod pa'am/_slob pa'i chos zhes brjod pa'am/_mi slob pa'i chos zhes brjod pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes brjod pa'am/_
[\[152a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos zhes brjod pa yang mtha' las 'das pa'i chos nyid lags pas chos de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar sgom na/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes 
[\[152a.5\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa'i rigs kyi bu ni 'di ltar 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams so/_/'di ni gzugs kyi khams so/_/'di ni gzugs med pa'i khams so/_/zhes bgyi ba nas 'di ni 'gog pa'i dbyings so zhes bgyi ba'i bar du yang mi sems so/_/de ci'i slad du 
[\[152a.6\]]zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar des 'gog pa'i chos gang lags pa'i chos de gang yang mi mthong ste/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar sgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par rig par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang chos gang la yang phan pa'am gnod par 
[\[152a.7\]]yang mi bgyid pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sbyin par bgyid pa'ang ma lags/_so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams gcod par bgyid pa'ang ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang so so'i 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]skye bo'i chos rnams kyang mi 'gog la sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang mi 'thob pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis 
[\[152b.2\]]chos zab mo 'di lta bu 'di bstan pa legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dmigs pa can rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 
[\[152b.3\]]rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rgya 'di bzhag go/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang dngang bar mi 'gyur ba de dag ni sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin/_sangs rgyas gcig la dge 
[\[152b.4\]]ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa ma yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rgya cher ston par spobs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[152b.5\]]'jam dpal spobs par gyis shig_/'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das gang chos gang gis gnas pa mi dmigs pa dang /_mi gnas pa yang mi dmigs pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos thams cad ni mi gnas 
[\[152b.6\]]pa'i slad du mi dmigs pa ste/_bcom ldan 'das gang chos gang la yang lhag par dmigs pa'i slad du nye bar mi gnas pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dmigs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du
