[\[192b.7\]]med dam za ma'am ma ning ngam mtshan gnyis pas ni 'grub pa ma yin no/_/skyes bur gyur nas de'i lus su 'dod pa dang dgra bcom pa thob par bya ba'i phyir du yongs su rdzogs par 'grub bo/_/gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/_/sgyu dang ldan zhing gal te 'tsho ba dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi drung du gnyer 
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]na don du 'grub bo/_/sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas mchod rten gyi drung du'am byang chub shing gi drung du don du gnyer bas ni mi 'grub bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi drung du don du gnyer kyang rab tu byung ba'i mtshan ma dang ldan pas 'grub kyi/_khyim pa'i mtshan ma dang ldan pas ni ma yin 
[\[193a.2\]]no/_/rab tu byung yang mngon par shes pa lnga dang snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad thob pas 'dod par 'grub kyi/_yon tan 'di rnams dang bral bas ni ma yin no/_/yon tan dang ldan yang gang zhig 'tsho ba dang ldan pa'i lus sangs rgyas la yongs su btang na 'grub kyi/_gzhan du ni ma yin no/_/de'i gzhi 'dis 
[\[193a.3\]]gzhi yongs su rdzogs nas 'grub bo/_/gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/_/gzhi dang ldan yang gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi phyir du 'dun pa chen po dang /_spro ba chen po dang /_rtsol ba chen po dang /_yongs su 'bad pa rnams kyis 'grub bo/_/gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/_/de la 'dir 'dun pa chen po'i dpe ni 
[\[193a.4\]]gal te 'di ltar gang zhig 'jig rten thams cad kyi khor yug gi nang chu yis gang bar gyur pa la bdag gi lag pas brkyal te pha rol du 'gro bar nus na des sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro/_/yang na gang du gang zhig slar yang thams cad kyi khor yug gi nang du 'od ma mang pos bkang ste rkang pas nyed cing rdul 
[\[193a.5\]]du byed pas pha rol du 'gro bar nus na de yis sangs rgyas thob par nus so/_/yang na gang zhig slar yang thams cad kyi khor yug gi nang du mtshon cha rnams kha gyen la bstan pa'i mtshon rtse mo bar med pas yongs su gang ba la rkang pas rdzi zhing pha rol du 'gro bar nus na des sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[193a.6\]]yang na gang zhig gis slar yang 'jig rten khor yug gi nang du sol ba 'bar bas yongs su gang bar byas nas rkang pas rdzi zhing pha rol du 'gro bar nus na de yis sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig de rnams las gang zhig la sdug bsngal bar mi sems par bdag gis 'di rnams kyang pha rol 
[\[193a.7\]]du bsgral ba'am 'gro ba'am pha rol du 'gro bar bya'o zhes shes so/_/de de ltar 'dun pa chen po dang /_spro ba dang /_rtsol ba dang /_'bad pa rnams dang yang dag par ldan na de'i don du gnyer ba 'grub bo/_/gzhan gyis ni ma yin no/_/blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa slar yang chos brgyad po 'di rnams 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]bsdus nas sangs rgyas 'dod pa'i smon lam btab nas nyal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyis kyang byon nas blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa'i mgo'i gam du bzhugs te nor bu seng ge'i khang pa'i gzeb kyi sgor ston pa bzhin du kha dog lnga pa rab tu dngas pa dang ldan pa'i spyan gyis 
[\[193b.2\]]gzigs nas 'jim pa'i steng na nyal ba'i blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa gzigs so/_/dka' thub pa 'di sangs rgyas thob pa'i phyir du smon lam 'debs shing nyal lo/_/'di'i don du gnyer ba 'grub bam mi 'grub snyam du dgongs nas ma 'ongs pa'i ye shes kyis rtog cing dpyod do/_/'di nas 
[\[193b.3\]]bskal pa grangs med pa bzhi dang 'bum phrag gcig lhag nas gau tam zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhes rtogs nas 'khor gyi nang du lung ston pas bka' stsal pa/_mchog gi dka' thub kyi dka' thub pa 'di 'jim pa'i steng na nyal ba khyed rnams kyis mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_btsun pa de 
[\[193b.4\]]bzhin du mthong ngo /_/bka' stsal pa/_'dis sangs rgyas thob par bsams nas nyal to/_/gsol pa/_'di'i don du gnyer ba 'grub par 'gyur lags sam/_bka' stsal pa/_'di nas bskal pa grangs med pa bzhi dang 'bum phrag gcig lhag 'das nas gau tam zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas su 
[\[193b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/de la slar yang grong khyer ser skya'i gnas su 'khrungs par 'gyur ro/_/lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma chen mo zhes bya ba ni yum mo/_/rgyal po zas gtsang ma zhes bya ba ni yab bo/_/nyan thos kyi mchog ni gnas brtan nye rgyal dang nyan thos gnyis pa ni gnas brtan pang nas skyes so/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[193b.6\]]kyi nye gnas ni kun dga' bo zhes bya ba'o/_/nyan thos ma'i mchog ni gnas brtan ma dge ma zhes bya ba dang nyan thos ma gnyis pa ni gnas brtan ma ud pa la'i mdog can zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/ye shes yongs su smin par gyur te/_nges par 'byung ba chen po byas nas dka' thub chen po rdzogs 
[\[193b.7\]]par byas te/_n+ya gro d+ha'i shing drung du 'o thug blangs nas chu klung nai ra dza ra'i 'gram du gsol lo/_/byang chub kyi snying por gshegs te a shwat+tha'i shing drung du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_mar me mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhyen/_/sems can phan phyir 'jig rten byung /_/
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]bdag gi mgo bo'i gam 'dug ste/_/'di lta bu yi tshig gsungs so/_/dka' thub pa 'di ltos shig dang /_/dka' ba mchog gi ral pa 'dzin/_/'di ni bskal pa mang 'das nas/_/'jig rten du ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/ser skya dga' ba'i grong du 'khrungs/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nges par 
[\[194a.2\]]'byung /_/dka' thub gnas su gnas nas ni/_/shin tu dka' ba'i dka' thub spyad/_/a tsa pA la'i shing drung du/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs nas su/_/der ni 'o thug blangs nas ni/_/nai ra dza ra'i 'gram gnas nas/_/nai ra dza ra'i 'gram du ni/_/'o thug rgyal bas longs spyod do/_/lam gyi mchog gi ched du 
[\[194a.3\]]ni/_/byang chub bzhir ni byon 'gyur ro/_/bla med byang chub snying po la/_/de nas bskor ba byas nas ni/_/a shwat+tha yi drung du ni/_/grags chen zhes pa sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/'di yi skye ba'i yum gyur pa/_/sgyu ma zhes par 'gyur ba yin/_/yab ni zas gtsang zhes bya'o/_/'di ni gau tam zhes par 'gyur/_/
[\[194a.4\]]zag pa zad cing 'dod chags bral/_/zhi ba'i sems dang mtshungs par ldan/_/pang nas skyes dang nye rgyal ni/_/nyan thos rnams kyi mchog yin no/_/nye gnas kun dga' bo zhes pas/_/rgyal ba de la zhabs tog byed/_/dge ma dang ni ud pa la mdog_/nyan thos ma yi mchog yin no/_/zag pa med 
[\[194a.5\]]cing 'dod chags bral/_/zhi ba'i sems dang mtshungs par ldan/_/de yi bcom ldan byang chub shing /_/a shwat+tha zhes brjod pa'o/_/de thos nas blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa bdag gis don du gnyer ba grub par 'gyur bas yid bde ba thob par gyur to/_/skye bo mang pos stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i 
[\[194a.6\]]mar me mdzad kyi gsung thos nas/_blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa sangs rgyas kyi sa bon gyi myu gur gyur pas dga' ba dang bde ba skyes so/_/de lta bur gyur pa'i sems kyis/_ji ltar skyes bu chu klung gi pha rol du 'gro ba na mu 'gram drang po nas pha rol du 'gro bar mi nus na 'og gi cha'i mu gnas nas pha 
[\[194a.7\]]rol du 'gro'o/_/de ltar 'di ltar bdag gis stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mar me mdzad kyi bstan pa la lam gyi 'bras bu ma thob par gyur na/_gang gi tshe khyod ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes so/_/de'i tshe khyod kyis mngon sum du lam 'bras bu mngon du byed pa bdag gis nus so/_/don du gnyer 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]bar byas nas stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mar me mdzad kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bsngags pa brjod cing me tog snyim pa brgyad kyis gtor nas bskor ba byas te gshegs so/_/'bum phrag bzhi po zag pa zad pa de rnams kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' la dri bzang dang me tog gis 
[\[194b.2\]]mchod nas bskor ba byas te gshegs so/_/lha dang mi rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du mchod nas phyag btsal te song ngo /_/byang chub sems dpas thams cad song ba'i dus su nyal ba'i gnas nas langs te pha rol du phyin pa bsam pa'i phyir me tog gi phung po'i steng du skyil krung bcas nas bzhugs 
[\[194b.3\]]so/_/de ltar byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs nas 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi lha rnams kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin no/_/'phags pa blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa sngar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang skyil krung bcas te pha rol du phyin pa sems shing sngon gyi 
[\[194b.4\]]dus na bzhugs bzhin du sdug bsngal gyi mtshan ma mthong nas de rnams kyi mtshan ma rnams kyang de ring skyes par gyur to/_/the tsom med par khyod sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis de rnams shes so/_/gang gis 'di rnams kyi mtshan ma mthong bar gyur pas de nges par sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/
[\[194b.5\]]de la khyod bdag nyid brtson 'grus brtan po mchog bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sna tshogs pa'i bstod pa byas so/_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_'di yi tshig ni thos nas ni/_/mtshungs med drang srong chen po la/_/lha dang mi ni rjes yi rangs/_/sangs rgyas sa bon myu gu 'di/_/sgra ni chen 
[\[194b.6\]]po sgrogs byed cing /_/gsal bar bzhad par byed pa dang /_/thal mo sbyar nas phyag byed pa/_/stong phrag bcu yi lha dang bcas/_/bstan pa 'di la 'bras ma thob/_/gal te 'jig rten mgon po 'di/_/ma 'ongs pa rnams 'das gyur nas/_/'di ni sngon du 'gyur ba'o/_/ji ltar chu klung pha rol mi/_/
[\[194b.7\]]'gro ba po yi mu gnas la/_/'og gi mu nas bzung nas ni/_/chu klung chen po'i pha rol 'gro/_/de ltar 'di ltar bdag gis ni/_/rgyal ba 'di ni gal te na/_/ma 'ongs pa ni mang song nas/_/'di ni mngon sum gyur pa yin/_/mar me mdzad ni 'jig rten mkhyen/_/'di ltar 'gyur zhes gsungs pa 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]yin/_/bdag gi las rnams bsal byas nas/_/rkang pa g.yas pa bteg byas so/_/gang zhig de la rgyal sras ni/_/bdag la kun gyis bskor ba byas/_/mi dang klu dang dri za rnams/_/phyag byas nas ni gshegs par gyur/_/dge 'dun bcas pa 'jig rten 'dren/_/bdag gis gshegs 
[\[195a.2\]]pa mthong ba na/_/dga' zhing tshim pa'i sems kyis ni/_/de tshe bdag gis stan las langs/_/bdag ni bde zhing bde bar 'gyur/_/dga' zhing dga' bar gyur pa ste/_/dga' dang ldan par skye ba dang /_/de yi tshe na skyil krung bcas/_/skyil krung la ni gnas nas su/_/de la bdag gis 'di ltar bsams/_/
[\[195a.3\]]bdag gi bsam gtan dbang du gyur/_/ye shes kyi ni pha rol phyin/_/stong phrag gi ni 'jig rten na/_/nga dang mtshungs pa'i drang srong med/_/rdzu 'phrul chos ni bdag mi mtshungs/_/'di 'dra ci bde gzhan ma thob/_/bdag gis skyil krung bcas nas bdag_/stong phrag bcu lhag gnas nas su/_/sgra chen 
[\[195a.4\]]po ni sgrogs par byed/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/gang zhig byang sems sngon ma rnams/_/skyil krung du ni bzhugs nas su/_/mtshan ma rnams ni mthong ba ni/_/de rnams de ring mthong ba yin/_/grang ba rnams ni med par gyur/_/dro ba rnams ni nye bar zhi/_/de rnams de ring so sor mthong /_/
[\[195a.5\]]nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/stong phrag bcu yi 'jig rten khams/_/phan tshun du ni 'jigs med gyur/_/de rnams de ring so sor mthong /_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/rlung chen po ni mi ldang zhing /_/chu rnams rgyun las log pa dang /_/de rnams de ring so sor mthong /_/nges par 
[\[195a.6\]]khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/thang skyes chu skyes me tog rnams/_/thams cad du ni me tog bye/_/de rnams de ring me tog bye/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/'khri shing yang na shing gyur pa/_/de ma thag tu 'bras bur gyur/_/de rnams de kun 'bras gyur pa/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 
[\[195a.7\]]'gyur/_/nam mkha' dang ni sa gzhi la/_/rin chen de dag 'od 'gyed do/_/de rnams de ring 'od 'gyed pas/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gro/_/lha rnams dang ni mi rnams ni/_/de dag rol mo'i sgra sgrogs so/_/de rnams de ring sgra 'byin pas/_/khyod ni nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]me tog sna tshogs pa yi tshogs/_/de ma thag tu char pa 'bebs/_/de rnams de ring char 'bebs pas/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/rgya mtsho chen po ma g.yo zhing /_/'jig rten stong phrag bcu po g.yo/_/de rnams de ring gyur pas na/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/stong 
[\[195b.2\]]phrag bcu yi dmyal ba rnams/_/de ma thag tu bsreg dang bral/_/de rnams de ring zhi bas na/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/nyi ma dri ma med pa dang /_/rgyu skar thams cad mthong ba dang /_/de rnams de ring mthong bas na/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/char pa 'bab par ma gyur 
[\[195b.3\]]kyang /_/sa ni snum bag bcas pa dang /_/de rnams de ring sa la gyur/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/rgyu skar tshogs ni rnam par gsal/_/nam mkha'i dbyings su rgyu skar rnams/_/zla ba dang ni 'grogs pa bzhin/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/sa khung ri khung srog chags 
[\[195b.4\]]rnams/_/sems gcig pas ni pha rol mthong /_/de ring de rnams sems dga' bas/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/sems can rnams ni mi dga' med/_/de ma thag tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/de ring de rnams dga' bas na/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/de tshe nad rnams 
[\[195b.5\]]nye bar zhi/_/'dod pa'i nad ni med pa'o/_/de ring de rnams mthong bas na/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/de tshe chags pa bsrabs pa dang /_/skyon dang rmongs pa rnam par zhig_/de ring de kun dor bas na/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/de yi tshe na 'jigs med pa/_/de ring 
[\[195b.6\]]de rnams mthong bas na/_/bdag gi rtags de kun gyis shes/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/steng 'og rdul ni go bzlog 'gro/_/de ring yang ni de rnams mthong /_/bdag gi rtags de kun gyis shes/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/dri rnams ngan pa song ba dang /_/lha 
[\[195b.7\]]yi dri ni 'ong ba dang /_/de ring de rnams dri ldang bas/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/lha rnams thams cad mthong ba dang /_/gzugs med pa rnams spangs pa ni/_/de ring de kun mthong bas na/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/dmyal ba rnams ni ji srid pa/_/de yi tshe na 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]thams cad mthong /_/de rnams de ring kun mthong bas/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/sgo chung dang ni ri yi rnams/_/de yi tshe na mi mthong med/_/de ring nam mkha' bzhin du mthong /_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/rum du gnas dang 'thon pa ni/_/skad cig tsam 
[\[196a.2\]]gyis ma yin no/_/de ring de rnams so sor mthong /_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/brtson 'grus brtan par byas nas ni/_/nges par 'byung ba ldog mi bya/_/bdag gis 'di rnams legs shes pas/_/nges par khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpas stobs bcu 
[\[196a.3\]]dang ldan pa'i mar me mdzad dang stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi lha rnams kyi gsung thos nas/_yid bde ba cher skyes te bdag nyid spro bar gyur nas bsams pa/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi don yod pa'i gsung zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung las gzhan du mi 'gyur ba yin no/_/ji ltar 
[\[196a.4\]]yang nam mkha' la rdo 'phangs na lhung bar 'gyur ba dang /_skyes nas 'chi bar 'gyur ba dang /_skya rengs shar na nyi ma 'char bar 'gyur ba dang /_gnas nas seng ge langs nas sgra phyung ste 'gro ba dang /_sbrum ma yongs su smin nas skye bar 'gyur bar nges so/_/nges par de bzhin du 'di ltar sangs rgyas 
[\[196a.5\]]rnams kyi gsung ni nges shing don yod par 'dod do/_/nges par bdag ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung thos nas/_/stong phrag bcu dang gnyis ka yi/_/tshim zhing dgyes la rab tu dga'/_/bdag gis de tshe 'di ltar bsams/_/gnyis ni 
[\[196a.6\]]mi gsung sangs rgyas ni/_/rgyal ba don yod pa yi gsung /_/sangs rgyas rnams ni gzhan mi gsung /_/bdag ni nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/ji ltar mkha' la rdo 'phangs pa/_/nges par sa la lhung bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin du ni sangs rgyas kyi/_/gsung ni nges par 'gyur ba bzhin/_/
[\[196a.7\]]ji ltar sems can thams cad ni/_/nges par 'chi bar 'gyur ba'o/_/de bzhin du ni sangs rgyas kyi/_/gsung ni nges par 'gyur ba bzhin/_/ji ltar nam ni zad pa na/_/nges par nyi ma 'char bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin du ni sangs rgyas kyi/_/gsung ni nges par 'gyur ba bzhin/_/ji ltar seng ge'i 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]gnas nas ni/_/seng ge'i sgra ni nges pa'o/_/de bzhin du ni sangs rgyas kyi/_/gsung ni nges par 'gyur ba bzhin/_/ji ltar sbrum ma smin gyur na/_/mngal nas nges par skye bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin du ni sangs rgyas kyi/_/gsung ni nges par 'gyur ba bzhin/_/legs so bdag ni sangs rgyas 
[\[196b.2\]]su 'gyur ro/_/de ltar nges par byas nas sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos tshol bas sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i chos gang zhig na yod/_gal te steng na yod dam 'og na'am phyogs sam mtshams rnams na yod dam ci/[ {]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du chos kyi dbyings thams cad la brtsams nas sngar gyi byang chub 
[\[196b.3\]]sems dpas kyang bsnyen pa dang nges par brten par bya ba'i dang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gzigs so/_/de ltar bdag gis kyang bdag la gdams pa/_mkhas pa blo gros bzang po khyod kyis kyang 'di nas bzung nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par bya'o/_/ji ltar na chu'i bum pa kha phub 
[\[196b.4\]]na bum par chu rnams mi gnas par sa la bo ba nyid slar yang bum pa la mi gnas so/_/de ltar 'di ltar nor ram grags pa'am bu dang chung ma'am yan lag dang nying lag rnams ltos pa med par slong ba rnams kyi don du thams cad gang dang gang 'dod pa la lhag ma med par byas nas sbyin te byang chub 
[\[196b.5\]]kyi shing drung du bzhugs nas sangs rgyas thob bo/_/dang por sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brtan par byas nas gnas par bya'o/_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_bdag gis sangs rgyas byed pa'i chos/_/gang dang de ru btsal byas pa/_/steng dang 'og dang phyogs bcu dang /_/chos kyi dbyings kyi bar du'o/_/
[\[196b.6\]]de tshe btsal ba na ni mthong /_/dang por sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/_/sngon gyi skyes bu chen po yi/_/lam ni pha rol rjes su 'gro/_/'di ni re zhig khyod kyis kyang /_/brtan por byas nas gzung bar gyis/_/gal te byang chub thob 'dod na/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin par gyis/_/ji ltar bum pa 
[\[196b.7\]]gang gyur pa/_/gang gang kha ni phub pa na/_/chu ni lhag ma med par 'bo/_/bum pa'i nang du mi gnas so/_/de bzhin du ni slong ba mthong /_/mchog dman 'bring po gang yin pa/_/ma lus par ni sbyin par bya/_/kha phub bum pa de bzhin no/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos 'di 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]'ba' zhig ma yin par blta bar bya'o/_/lhag par tshol ba ni gnyis pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong nas 'di lta bu'i sems su gyur to/_/mkhas pa blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa khyod kyis 'di nas bzung nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par bya'o/_/
[\[197a.2\]]dper na gzhan yang rgod g.yag zhes bya ba srog la mi lta bar rang gi mjug ma'i rnga ma nyid bsrung ba de bzhin du/_khyod kyis kyang 'di nas bzung nas srog la mi lta bar tshul khrims bsrungs na khyod kyis sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnyis pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtan 
[\[197a.3\]]par byas te gnas par bya'o/_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_'di tsam 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/_/gang zhig byang chub thob byed chos/_/gzhan la yang ni btsal bar bya/_/gang zhig chos ni thob byed pa/_/de yi tshe na tshol ba mthong /_/gnyis pa tshul khrims pha rol phyin/_/sngon gyi skyes 
[\[197a.4\]]bu chen po yis/_/bsnyen dang brten par byas pas so/_/re zhig gnyis pa 'di yis ni/_/brtan por byas nas gzung bar bya/_/gal te byang chub thob 'dod na/_/tshul khrims pha rol phyin par gyis/_/ji ltar rgod g.yag rnga ma ni/_/gang dang gang gis bzung ba na/_/ltos pa med par 
[\[197a.5\]]srog 'dor ro/_/rnga ma la dga' khro ba med/_/de bzhin du ni sa gzhi ru/_/tshul khrims yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_/rtag tu tshul khrims kun srung byed/_/rgod g.yag rnga ma bsrung ba bzhin/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos 'di 'ba' zhig ma yin par blta bar bya'o/_/lhag 
[\[197a.6\]]par tshol ba na gsum pa nges 'byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong nas 'di lta bu'i sems su gyur to/_/mkhas pa blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa khyod kyis 'di nas bzung nas nges par 'byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rdzogs par bya'o/_/ji ltar btson rar yun ring por bcings nas bzhag 
[\[197a.7\]]pa'i mi de la 'dod par mi byed do/_/gzhan yang shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i sems de la de bzhin du gnas par 'dod pa med do/_/de ltar 'di ltar khyod kyis kyang skye ba thams cad du btson rar bcings pa bzhin byas nas skye ba thams cad du shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i sems kyis grol bar 'dod 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]pa'i sems kyis nges par 'byung ba mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/de ltar byas na sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro/_/nges par 'byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtan par byas te gnas so/_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_'di tsam 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/_/gang zhig byang chub thob byed chos/_/gzhan 
[\[197b.2\]]pa yang ni btsal bar bya/_/gang zhig chos ni thob byed pa/_/de yi tshe na tshol ba mthong /_/gsum pa nges 'byung pha rol phyin/_/sngon gyi skyes bu chen po yis/_/bsnyen dang brten par byas pas so/_/re zhig gsum pa 'di yis ni/_/brtan por byas te gzung bar bya/_/gal te byang chub 
[\[197b.3\]]thob 'dod na/_/nges 'byung pha rol phyin par gyis/_/ji ltar skyes bu btson rar bcings/_/yun ring gnas shing sdug bsngal ba/_/de la dga' bar mi byed par/_/myur du 'grol bar 'dod par sems/_/de bzhin khyod ni skye kun du/_/btson ra bzhin du blta bar gyis/_/nges par 
[\[197b.4\]]'byung ba sngon du na/_/skye ba las ni grol bar 'gyur/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos 'di 'ba' zhig ma yin par blta bar bya'o/_/lhag par tshol ba na bzhi pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong nas 'di lta bu'i sems su gyur to/_/mkhas pa blo gros bzang po dka' 
[\[197b.5\]]thub pa khyod kyis 'di nas bzung nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rdzogs par bya'o/_/dman pa dang 'bring po dang chen po rnams su mi sems par de rnams kyi gnas su song ste mkhas pa rnams 'dri bar bya'o/_/ji ltar na bsod snyoms la 'gro ba'i dge slong dman pa la sogs pa'i 
[\[197b.6\]]gnas su song ste/_rigs kyi dbye ba ma spangs par [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bsod snyoms la 'gro ba myur du rang gi bza' ba'i tshad thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang mkhas pa thams cad kyi drung du song ste dri bar byas na sangs rgyas thob bo/_/bzhi pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[197b.7\]]pa la brtan par bya ste gnas par gyis shig_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_'di tsam 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/_/gang zhig byang chub thob byed chos/_/gzhan pa yang ni btsal bar bya/_/gang zhig chos ni thob byed pa/_/de yi tshe na tshol ba mthong /_/bzhi pa shes rab pha rol phyin/_/sngon 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]gyi skyes bu chen po yis/_/bsnyen dang brten par byas pas so/_/re zhig bzhi pa 'di yis ni/_/brtan por bya ste gzung bar bya/_/gal te byang chub thob 'dod na/_/shes rab pha rol phyin par gyis/_/ji ltar dge slong bsod snyoms pa/_/dman dang 'bring dang 
[\[198a.2\]]chen po yi/_/rigs rnams dpyod par mi byed par/_/de ltar bza' ba'i zas thob bo/_/de bzhin khyod kyis dus kun du/_/skye bo mkhas la yongs su dris/_/shes rab pha rol phyin song bas/_/byang chub thob par 'gyur ba yin/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos 
[\[198a.3\]]ni 'di 'ba' zhig ma yin par blta bar bya'o/_/lhag par btsal na lnga pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob nas 'di lta bu'i sems su gyur to/_/mkhas pa blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa khyod kyis 'di nas bzung nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rdzogs par bya'o/_/
[\[198a.4\]]ji ltar [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge dus thams cad du brtson 'grus brtan po dang ldan pa de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang skye ba thams cad du brtson 'grus brtan par bya'o/_/zhum pa med pa'i brtson 'grus byas na sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro/_/lnga pa brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtan 
[\[198a.5\]]par byas nas gnas par gyis shig_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_'di tsam 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/_/gang zhig byang chub thob byed chos/_/gzhan pa yang ni btsal bar bya/_/gang zhig chos ni thob byed pa/_/de yi tshe na tshol ba mthong /_/lnga pa brtson 'grus pha rol phyin/_/sngon gyi skyes bu 
[\[198a.6\]]chen po yis/_/bsnyen dang brten par byas pas so/_/re zhig lnga po 'di yis ni/_/gal te byang chub mchog 'dod na/_/brtson 'grus pha rol phyin par gyis/_/brtan por byas te gzung bar bya/_/ji ltar [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyal po ni/_/sdod dang 'gro ba'i gnas rnams su/_/zhum pa med pa'i 
[\[198a.7\]]brtson 'grus kyis/_/yid ni rtag tu brtan pa yin/_/de bzhin khyod kyis dus kun du/_/brtson 'grus brtan por gyis la zung /_/brtson 'grus pha rol phyin gyur nas/_/byang chub thob par 'gyur ba yin/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos 'di 'ba' zhig ma yin par blta 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]bar bya'o/_/lhag par tshol ba na drug pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong nas 'di lta bu'i sems su gyur to/_/mkhas pa blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa khyod kyis 'di nas bzung nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rdzogs par bya'o/_/bzang po dang ngan par byas pa la bzod par bya'o/_/
[\[198b.2\]]ji ltar sa'i steng du gtsang ba dang mi gtsang ba gos par byas nas gzhi khro bar mi byed pa bzhin du bzod cing sran pa dang lhag par gnas pa de bzhin du'o/_/de ltar 'di ltar khyod kyis kyang gnod pa dang phan par byas kyang bzod cing sran par byas na sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro/_/drug pa bzod 
[\[198b.3\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brtan par byas nas gnas par gyis shig_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_'di tsam 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/_/gang zhig byang chub thob 'dod pa/_/gzhan pa yang ni btsal bar bya/_/gang zhig chos ni thob byed pa/_/de yi tshe na tshol ba mthong /_/drug pa bzod pa'i pha 
[\[198b.4\]]rol phyin/_/sngon gyi skyes bu chen po yis/_/bsnyen dang brten par byas pas so/_/re zhig drug pa 'di yis ni/_/de la zhe sdang ma byas na/_/yang dag byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/ji ltar yang ni sa gzhi la/_/gtsang dang mi gtsang byugs pa na/_/thams cad blugs kyang bzod par 
[\[198b.5\]]byed/_/skyug bro ba ni byed pa med/_/de bzhin khyod kyis thams cad la/_/phan dang gnod pa byed pa na/_/bzod pa'i pha rol phyin gyur nas/_/byang chub yang dag thob par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos 'di 'ba' zhig ma yin par blta bar bya'o/_/lhag 
[\[198b.6\]]par tshol ba na bdun pa bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong nas 'di lta bu'i sems su gyur to/_/mkhas pa blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa khyod kyis 'di nas bzung nas bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rdzogs par bya'o/_/thog mgo la lhung bar gyur na yang nor la sogs pa'i phyir 
[\[198b.7\]]du 'dun pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis shes nas [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi smra'o/_/ji ltar na tha skar la sogs pa'i rgyu skar dus thams cad du rang rang 'gro ba'i lam dor nas lam gzhan nas mi 'gro bar rang gi lam nyid nas 'gro ba'o/_/de ltar 'di ltar khyod kyis kyang bden pa bzung nas [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]mi byed 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]pas ni sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro/_/bdun pa bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brtan par byas nas gnas par gyis shig_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_'di tsam 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/_/gang zhig byang chub thob 'dod chos/_/gzhan pa yang ni btsal bar bya/_/gang 
[\[199a.2\]]zhig chos ni thob byed pa/_/de yi tshe na tshol ba mthong /_/bdun pa bden pa'i pha rol phyin/_/sngon gyi skyes bu chen po yis/_/bsnyen dang brten par byas pas so/_/re zhig bdun pa 'di yis ni/_/brtan par byas nas gnas par gyis/_/de la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ni mi smra bas/_/yang dag byang chub 
[\[199a.3\]]thob par gyis/_/ji ltar tha skar zhes bya ba/_/lha dang mi rnams mtshungs par ni/_/dus kyi lo yi dus su ni/_/lam gzhan du ni mi 'gro'o/_/khyod kyis kyang ni de bzhin bden/_/bden pa bzung nas mi 'gro ba/_/bden pa'i pha rol phyin gyur pas/_/byang chub yang dag thob par 'gyur/_/
[\[199a.4\]]gzhan yang sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos 'di 'ba' zhig ma yin par blta bar bya'o/_/lhag par tshol ba na brgyad pa lhag par gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong nas 'di lta bu'i sems su gyur to/_/mkhas pa blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa khyod kyis 'di nas bzung nas lhag par gnas 
[\[199a.5\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rdzogs par bya'o/_/gang zhig lhag par gnas par gyis la de la lhag par gnas na g.yo ba med par 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar na ri bo ni phyogs thams cad nas rlung gis bskyod kyang g.yo bar mi 'gyur zhing bskyod par mi 'gyur cing /_rang gi gnas zhig tu gnas so/_/
[\[199a.6\]]de ltar 'di ltar khyod kyis kyang bdag nyid lhag par gnas pa rnams mi g.yo bar gyur na sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro/_/brgyad pa lhag par gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brtan par byas nas gnas par gyis shig_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_'di tsam 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/_/gang zhig 
[\[199a.7\]]byang chub thob 'dod chos/_/gzhan pa yang ni btsal bar bya/_/gang zhig chos ni thob byed pa/_/de yi tshe na tshol ba mthong /_/brgyad pa lhag gnas pha rol phyin/_/sngon gyi skyes bu chen po yis/_/bsnyen dang brten par byas pas so/_/re zhig brgyad pa 'di yis ni/_/brtan par bya ste gnas 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]par gyis/_/de la khyod ni g.yo med pas/_/yang dag byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/ji ltar ri bo'i brag chen po/_/g.yo ba med cing legs par gnas/_/rlung chen pos ni g.yo ba med/_/rang gi gnas su gnas pa nyid/_/de bzhin khyod kyis lhag gnas par/_/thams cad du 
[\[199b.2\]]ni mi g.yo bar/_/lhag gnas pha rol phyin gyur pas/_/yang dag byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos 'di 'ba' zhig ma yin par blta bar bya'o/_/lhag par tshol ba na dgu pa byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mthong bas de lta bu'i khams su gyur to/_/
[\[199b.3\]]mkhas pa blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa khyod kyis 'di nas bzung nas byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang rdzogs par bya'o/_/phan pa dang mi phan par gyur kyang sems gcig tu bya'o/_/ji ltar chu ni sdig pa can gyi skye bo dang dge ba'i skye bos kyang bsil bar gyur cing gcig tu mtshungs par 
[\[199b.4\]]byas nas reg go/_/de ltar na 'di ltar khyod kyis kyang sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems gcig tu gyur nas sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro/_/dgu pa byams pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brtan par byas te gnas par gyis shig_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_'di tsam 'ba' zhig ma 
[\[199b.5\]]yin gyi/_/gang zhig byang chub thob 'dod chos/_/gzhan pa yang ni btsal bar bya/_/gang zhig chos ni thob byed pa/_/de yi tshe na tshol ba mthong /_/dgu pa byams pa'i pha rol phyin/_/sngon gyi skyes bu chen po yis/_/bsnyen dang brten par byas pa'o/_/re zhig dgu pa 'di yis ni/_/
[\[199b.6\]]byams par byas te gnas par gyis/_/gal te byang chub thob 'dod na/_/byams pa mtshungs pa med par 'gyur/_/ji ltar chu zhes bya ba la/_/dge 'am sdig pa'i skye bo ni/_/mtshungs par bsil bar gyur la reg_/rdul dang dri ma spong bar byed/_/de ltar khyod kyis mi phan dang /_/
[\[199b.7\]]phan la'ang mtshungs par byams par bya/_/byams pa'i pha rol phyin gyur nas/_/yang dag byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos 'di 'ba' zhig ma yin par blta bar bya'o/_/lhag par tshol ba na bcu pa btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong nas 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]'di lta bu'i sems su gyur to/_/mkhas pa blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa khyod kyis 'di nas bzung nas btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang rdzogs par bya'o/_/bde ba'am sdug bsngal yang bar ma la gnas par bya'o/_/ji ltar sa gzhi la gtsang ba dang mi gtsang 
[\[200a.2\]]bas byugs kyang bar mar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de ltar 'di ltar khyod kyis kyang bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba la bar mar gnas par gyur na sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro/_/bcu pa btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brtan par byas la gnas par gyis shig_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_
[\[200a.3\]]'di tsam 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi/_/gang zhig byang chub thob 'dod chos/_/gzhan pa yang ni btsal bar gyis/_/gang zhig chos ni thob byed pa/_/de yi tshe na tshol ba mthong /_/bcu pa btang snyoms pha rol phyin/_/sngon gyi skyes bu chen po yis/_/bsnyen dang brten par byas pas so/_/re 
[\[200a.4\]]zhig bcu pa 'di yis ni/_/brtan par byas nas gnas par gyis/_/srang ni gang bar 'gyur ba bzhin/_/yang dag byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/ji ltar sa gzhi zhes bya la/_/gtsang dang mi gtsang byugs pa na/_/ltos pa med cing btang snyoms pas/_/khro ba med par spong ba yin/_/ji 
[\[200a.5\]]ltar khyod kyis kyang bde sdug_/dus rnams kun tu srang bzhin du/_/btang snyoms pha rol phyin gyur nas/_/yang dag byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/de nas bsams pa 'jig rten pa 'di rnams byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub rdzogs par byed pa dang sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos de rnams 
[\[200a.6\]]nyid do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dor na gzhan med do/_/pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po 'di ni steng gi nam mkha' na yang med do/_/'og gi sa gzhi la yang med do/_/shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams na yang med do/_/bdag nyid kho na'i snying gi sha'i nang na gnas so/_/de ltar de'i snying la so sor 
[\[200a.7\]]gnas pa mthong nas thams cad brtan par bya ste gnas par bya'o/_/yang dang yang du dran par bya ste lugs las byung ba dang lugs las bzlog pa brtan par byed do/_/tha ma nas bzung ste thog ma'i bar bsam par bya'o/_/dang po nas bzung nas tha ma'i bar bsam mo/_/dbus nas 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]bzung nas thog ma dang tha ma'i bar bsam par bya'o/_/thog ma dang tha ma nas bzung nas dbus kyi bar blta bar bya'o/_/lus yongs su gtong ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'o/_/phyi'i longs spyod yongs su gtong ba ni nye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'o/_/srog yongs su gtong ba ni 
[\[200b.2\]]don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'o/_/pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po dang /_nye ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po dang /_don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po'o/_/me'i stengs su 'bru mar bskol ba bzhin du khor yug gi nang du rgya mtsho chen po ri bo mchog rab kyis bsrub pa bzhin du dran 
[\[200b.3\]]par bya ste/_de'i pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dran par byas nas chos kyi gzis 'bum phrag gnyis dang stong phrag bzhi bcu lhag pa'i sa chen po 'di'i stugs la glang po ches rkang pas gnon cing smyug ma 'chag pa bzhin du'o/_/bur shing gi 'khrul 'khor bzhin du btsir ba dang sgra chen po sgrogs pa 
[\[200b.4\]]bzhin du yang dag par sgrogs so/_/rab tu g.yos so/_/yang dag par rab tu g.yos te rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bzhin no/_/'bru mar gyi 'khrul 'khor bzhin du yongs su bskor ro/_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_'di yi 'jig rten de rnams nyid/_/gang zhig byang chub thob byed chos/_/
[\[200b.5\]]'di ni steng dang gzhan na'ang med/_/brtan par bya ste sems la zhog_/rang bzhin gyis ni g.yo med par/_/'di yi chos ni dran par byed/_/chos kyi gzhi yi sa gzhi ni/_/'jig rten stong phrag rab tu g.yos/_/sems med pa yi sa gzhi ni/_/bur shing 'khrul 'khor bzhin du btsir/_/
[\[200b.6\]]'bru mar 'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'khor/_/de ltar sa ni rab tu g.yos/_/sa chen po 'di g.yos pas dga' ba can gyi grong khyer na gnas pa'i mi rnams ldang bar ma nus te/_bskal pa'i mtha' yi rlung gis bskyod pa'i sa'i shing chen po g.yos pa bzhin brgyal ba dang bag med pas 
[\[200b.7\]]'gyel bar gyur to/_/bum pa la sogs pa'i snod ni 'dzad pa dang phan tshun du phrad pa'i sgra dang phye ma dang dum bur gyur to/_/skye bo thams cad 'jigs par gyur nas ston pa'i drung du nye bar song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das ci lags 'di'i klu 'khrugs pa'am 'di'i 'byung po'am gnod sbyin 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]nam lha rnams sam gzhan rnams 'khrugs sam bdag cag gis 'tshal bar ma gyur to/_/gzhan yang 'di'i skye bo chen po thams cad la nye bar 'tshe bar gyur to/_/ci'i rgyu 'di'i 'jig rten gyi sdig pa las gyur ram/_yang na dge ba las gyur bdag cag la 
[\[201a.2\]]'di rnams kyi rgyu mtshan rnams gsung du gsol zhes zhus so/_/ston pas de rnams kyi gtam thos nas/_/khyed rnams 'jigs par ma byed cig_/khyed rnams cung zad kyang ma sems shig_/mtshan ma 'di rnams la khyed rnams la 'jigs pa med do/_/gang tshe bdag gis 
[\[201a.3\]]de ring mkhas pa blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa ma 'ongs pa na gau ta ma zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/de ni 'dir pha rol tu phyin pa dran par byed do/_/des pha rol tu phyin pa dran par byed cing dpyod do/_/de'i chos kyi gzi brjid kyis stong phrag bcu'i 'jig 
[\[201a.4\]]rten gyi khams thams cad skad cig tsam gyis g.yo ba dang sgra 'byin no zhes gsung ngo /_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_ji srid 'khor rnams yod pa la/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni sbrel bas na/_/de ni de ru sdug bsngal sems/_/brgyal bar gyur nas sa la nyal/_/bum pa stong phrag du ma dang /_/
[\[201a.5\]]snod chen brgya phrag mang po rnams/_/der ni phye ma zhib mor gyur/_/phan tshun thug cing 'chag pas so/_/brgyal dang skrag dang 'jigs pa dang /_/gnod cing gzir ba'i sems kyis 'gyel/_/skye bo thams cad gcig tu 'dus/_/mar me mdzad kyi drung du song /_/'jig rten pa 
[\[201a.6\]]rnams ci phyir gyur/_/dge ba'am yang na sdig gam ci/_/'jig rten kun la nyer 'tshe byung /_/spyan ldan legs par gsung du gsol/_/de rnams kun la chos bstan cing /_/thub pa chen po mar me mdzad/_/'jigs par ma byed dbugs dbyung gis/_/'di yi sa gzhi g.yo bas 
[\[201a.7\]]ni/_/gang zhig de ring bdag lung bstan/_/'jig rten pa rnams sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/de ni chos ni dran par byed/_/sngon gyi rgyal ba bsten byas shing /_/de yi chos rnams dran byed pas/_/sangs rgyas sa ni ma lus pa/_/des na 'di yi sa rnams g.yos/_/lha dang bcas 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]pa stong phrag bcu/_/skye bo chen po rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung thos pas dga' ba dang tshim pa skyes nas me tog dang dri bzang dang /_byug pa rnams blangs te dga' ba can gyi grong khyer nas 'thon nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste me tog la sogs pas mchod nas phyag 
[\[201b.2\]]dang bstod pa byas te dga' ba can gyi grong khyer nyid du gnas so/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dran par byas nas brtson 'grus brtan par bya ste lhag par gnas nas stan las langs so/_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi ni gsung thos nas/_/de ma thag 
[\[201b.3\]]tu 'jigs med sems/_/thams cad bdag gi drung du 'ongs/_/slar yang phyag ni byas nas so/_/sangs rgyas yon tan sems par byed/_/de tshe bdag gis stan las langs/_/mar me mdzad la phyag byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' stan las langs pa na stong phrag 
[\[201b.4\]]bcu'i lha thams cad 'dus nas lha'i me tog dang dri bzang gis mchod pa byas/_'phags pa blo gros bzang po dka' thub pa de yis de ring stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mar me mdzad kyi zhabs drung du don chen po don du gnyer ba'i phyir don du gnyer to/_/de yis de rnams la bar gcod med 
[\[201b.5\]]cing rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/de la 'jigs pa med pa dang /_zhum pa med par 'gyur ro/_/sku la nad cung zad kyang mi 'byung zhing myur du pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par byas nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grub par gyis shig_/ji ltar me tog can gyi shing ngam 'bras bu 
[\[201b.6\]]can gyi shing dus su me tog smin pa dang 'bras bu smin pa nyid do/_/de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang de'i dus su lhag par gnas par byed pa la myur du mchog rdzogs par byed pa la sogs pa'i bstod pa dang bkra shis pas bstod do/_/de bzhin du bstod pa byas nas lha rnams rang rang 
[\[201b.7\]]gi gnas su song ngo /_/byang chub sems dpas kyang lha la sogs pa'i bstod pa thos par byas nas/_bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa bcu rdzogs par byas te bskal pa grangs med pa bzhi dang 'bum phrag gcig lhag pa'i mthar sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur bas brtson 'grus 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]brtan po lhag par gnas nas nam mkha' la 'phags te gangs can gyi gnas nyid la gshegs so/_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_lha dang mi yi me tog rnams/_/lha dang mi rnams gnyis ka yis/_/stan las langs par gyur nas ni/_/me tog mtshungs 
[\[202a.2\]]par bsdus nas so/_/lha dang mi rnams gnyis ka yang /_/thams cad zhi bar gyur zhes bstod/_/khyod kyis chen po don du gnyer/_/ji ltar 'dod pa de thob bo/_/dus min 'chi ba ring du song /_/nad rnams thams cad nyams par gyur/_/khyod la bar chad mi 'byung 
[\[202a.3\]]ngo /_/mchog gi byang chub myur du thob/_/ji ltar dus su sleb pa na/_/ljon shing me tog bye bar gyur/_/de bzhin khyod kyi dpa' chen pos/_/sangs rgyas ye shes me tog gyur/_/gang zhig ji ltar rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs par byas/_/de bzhin khyod kyi 
[\[202a.4\]]dpa' chen pos/_/pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs par gyis/_/ji ltar gang zhig rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/byang chub snying po rdzogs par gyur/_/de bzhin khyod kyi dpa' chen pos/_/rgyal ba'i byang chub rdzogs par gyis/_/gang zhig ji ltar rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 
[\[202a.5\]]gyur/_/de bzhin khyod kyi dpa' chen pos/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gyis/_/ji ltar zla ba nya ba bzhin/_/yongs su dag pas 'od 'gyed pa/_/de bzhin khyod kyis bsam rdzogs pa'i/_/stong phrag bcu yi 'od phyung cig_/nyi ma sgra gcan las grol ba/_/tsha zhing 'od zer rab tu 
[\[202a.6\]]'gyed/_/de bzhin 'jig rten grol byas nas/_/khyod kyi dpal ldan 'od zer phyung /_/gang zhig ji ltar chu klung ni/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i rjes su 'gro/_/de ltar lha mi'i 'jig rten tshogs/_/khyod kyi rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/_/de rnams khyod la bstod cing bsngags/_/chos bcu po la 
[\[202a.7\]]gnas byas nas/_/de yi chos rnams rdzogs byed cing /_/de tshe nags tshal chen por phyin/_/mkhas pa blo gros bzang po'i gtam du bya ba rdzogs so//_//dga' ba can gyi grong khyer du gnas pa rnams grong khyer du zhugs nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]sbyin pa chen po gtang ngo /_/ston pas de rnams la chos bstan cing bstan nas skye bo mang po skyabs su 'gro ba la gnas par byas te/_dga' ba can gyi grong khyer nas 'thon te/_lhag par gnas pa ji srid 'tsho'i bar de srid du gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad byed cing [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]
[\[202b.2\]]bzhin du lhag ma med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de la cung zad brjod pas de thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rgyud la brjod pa'i rigs pa de bzhin rig par bya'o/_/de la gsungs pa/_de tshe khyod rnams mchod ston byed/_/dge 'dun dang 
[\[202b.3\]]bcas 'jig rten 'dren/_/de la skyabs su 'gro ba yin/_/ston pa mar me mdzad pa la/_/de bzhin gshegs pas nges gsungs pa'i/_/gang zhig skyabs su 'gro bar gyur/_/gang zhig tshul khrims lnga dang ldan/_/gzhan yang tshul khrims bcu po yi/_/gang zhig la ni gzhan phyin 
[\[202b.4\]]pa/_/mchog gi 'bras bu bzhi po dang /_/gang zhig la ni mtshungs med chos/_/so so yang dag rig pa byin/_/phun tshogs mchog ni gang zhig la/_/brgyan nas mi yi khyu mchog byin/_/gang zhig la ni rig pa gsum/_/mngon par shes pa drug la zhugs/_/de yis rig pa 
[\[202b.5\]]skye bo'i tshogs/_/thub pa chen po'i gdams pa byin/_/de yis rgya chen por ni gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po'i bstan la'o/_/khyu mchog phrag pa 'gram chen po/_/mar me mdzad kyi mtshan dang ldan/_/skye bo mang po sgrol bar byed/_/ngan 'gro yongs su grol bar byed/_/grol 
[\[202b.6\]]ba'i phyir du skye bo mthong /_/stong phrag brgya yi dpag tshad du/_/skad cig tsam gyi nye bar song /_/thub pa chen po de mkhyen phyir/_/dang por 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_/bye ba brgya po rtogs par byas/_/mgon po 'dus pa gnyis pa ni/_/'bum phrag gcig gis rtogs 
[\[202b.7\]]par byas/_/gang tshe lha yi gnas su ni/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni chos bstan no/_/bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu yi/_/'dus pa gsum pa la ni gyur/_/de rnams 'dus pa gsum du gyur/_/ston pa mar me mdzad kyi'o/_/bye ba stong phrag brgya yis ni/_/dang po yi ni 'dus pa 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]yin/_/slar yang nA ra d+ha yi phur/_/rgyal ba gcig pur bzhugs pa ni/_/zag pa'i dri ma zad pa yi/_/bye ba brgya ni zhi ba dang /_/dpa' bo chen po ji srid bzhugs/_/ri yi steng na blta na sdug_/stong phrag bye ba dgu bcu yis/_/de tshe thub pa yi ni 'khor/_/
[\[203a.2\]]bdag gis de yi dus su ni/_/sdom brtson dka' thub pa yi mchog_/bdag ni bar snang la ni 'gro/_/mngon shes lnga yi pha rol son/_/stong phrag bcu dang nyi shu ni/_/chos la 'dus par gyur pa'o/_/gcig dang gnyis kyi 'dus pa ni/_/bgrang du med cing grangs med 
[\[203a.3\]]do/_/rgya che ded dpon cang shes pa/_/de tshe rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing rdzogs/_/bcom ldan 'das ni mar me mdzad/_/bstan pa shin tu dag cing mdzes/_/'bum phrag bzhi po rnams la ni/_/mngon shes drug dang rdzu 'phrul ldan/_/mar me mdzad ni 'jig rten mkhyen/_/rtag 
[\[203a.4\]]tu 'khor rnams yongs dag ldan/_/gang zhig de yi dus su ni/_/mi rnams dngos po gtong ba dang /_/sems kyi lhag ma ma thob pa/_/de rnams skur pa 'debs par gyur/_/me tog bzang po'i tshig rnyed pa/_/dgra bcom rnams ni de dang mtshungs/_/dri ma med cing zag pa 
[\[203a.5\]]zad/_/lha dang mi rnams nye bar mdzes/_/grong khyer dga' ba can zhes pa/_/blo gros bzang po rgyal po'i rigs/_/yum ni blo gros bzang mo yin/_/ston pa mar me mdzad yin no/_/bkra shis bzang po nye rgyal ni/_/nyan thos rnams kyi mchog yin no/_/legs 'ongs zhes pa 
[\[203a.6\]]nye gnas yin/_/ston pa mar me mdzad pa'o/_/dga' ba nyid dang shin tu dga'/_/nyan thos ma yi mchog yin no/_/bcom ldan de yi byang chub shing /_/bim pa la zhes bya ba yin/_/mtho tshad khru ni brgyad cu pa/_/thub pa chen po mar me mdzad/_/shing bzhin rab tu 'bar ba yi/_/
[\[203a.7\]]me tog sA la'i shing rgyas bzhin/_/lo ni stong phrag brgya ru ni/_/drang srong chen po de yi tshe/_/de srid du ni gnas pa ste/_/skye bo mang po sgrol bar byed/_/chos kyi snang bar byas nas ni/_/skye bo mang po yang dag sgrol/_/me yi phung po bzhin du gsal/_/de nas nyan thos dang bcas 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]'das/_/de yang rdzu 'phrul de grags pa/_/rin chen 'khor lo de zhabs la/_/thams cad kun nas bral ba dang /_/'dus byas chos rnams gtong ba'o/_/mar me mdzad kyi 'og tu ni/_/'dren pa kauN+Di n+ya zhes pa/_/gzi brjid dpag med mtha' yas grags/_/ring la sems pa 
[\[203b.2\]]gzhal du med/_/slar yang bcom ldan 'das mar me mdzad kyi 'og gi char bskal pa grangs med pa gcig 'das nas/_ston pa'i 'dren pa kauN+Di n+ya zhes bya ba byon no/_/de'i yang nyan thos 'dus pa gsum du gyur to/_/'dus pa dang po la bye ba stong phrag brgya'o/_/'dus pa gnyis 
[\[203b.3\]]pa la bye ba stong phrag gcig go/_/'dus pa gsum pa la ni bye ba phrag dgu bcu'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur to/_/bye ba stong phrag brgya'i grangs kyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po 
[\[203b.4\]]rnams la sbyin pa chen po gtong ngo /_/ston pas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan par byas nas chos bstan no/_/des ston pa'i chos thos nas rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung ngo /_/des sde snod gsum po bslabs nas snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad 
[\[203b.5\]]dang mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do/_/bsam gtan ma bor bar tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so/_/slar yang sangs rgyas kauN+Di n+ya de'i grong khyer dga' ba can yin no/_/shin tu dga' ba'i rgyal po ni yab bo/_/rigs bzang lha mo ni yum mo/_/bzang po dang legs bzang gnyis 
[\[203b.6\]]ni nyan thos rnams kyi mchog go/_/mi 'gal ba zhes bya ba ni nye gnas so/_/rgyal ma dang nye rgyal ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi dge ba'i shing ni shAl+ya'o/_/sku'i mtho tshad du khru brgyad cu rtsa brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag brgya'o/_/de'i 'og gi char 
[\[203b.7\]]bskal pa grangs med pa gcig 'das nas bskal pa gcig gi nang de nyid du sangs rgyas bzhi byon par gyur to/_/bkra shis bzang po dang /_thugs bzang po dang /_nam gru can dang /_ma nges pa can no/_/bcom ldan 'das bkra shis bzang po'i nyan thos kyi 'dus pa gsum du 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]'gyur te/_de'i 'dus pa dang po ni bye ba stong phrag brgya'i dge slong ngo /_/gnyis pa la bye ba stong phrag gcig go/_/gsum pa la bye ba phrag dgu bcu'o/_/ma'i spun gyi gzhon nu kun dga' bo zhes bya ba bye ba phrag dgu bcu'i 'khor dang bcas pa ni chos nyan pa'i phyir 
[\[204a.2\]]du'o/_/ston pa'i nye bar gnas pa rnams song ngo /_/ston pa de'i sngon gyi gtam rnams [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/de 'khor dang bcas pa so so yang dag par rig pa dang dgra bcom pa thob bo/_/ston pa des rigs kyi bu rnams la sngar gyi spyod pa rnams la blta zhing rdzu 
[\[204a.3\]]'phrul las byung ba'i lhung bzed dang chos gos rnams gzigs te/_phyag g.yas pa brkyang nas dge slong rnams tshur shog cig ces gsungs pa dang /_thams cad de ma thag nyid du rdzu 'phrul las byung ba'i lhung bzed dang chos gos bzung nas gnas brtan lo drug cu lon pa 
[\[204a.4\]]bzhin du gyur te/_cho ga phun sum tshogs par gyur nas ston pa la phyag byas te 'khor du gyur to/_/ji ltar gzhan yang sangs rgyas gzhan rnams la kun nas khru brgyad cu pa'i sku tshad nyid kyi 'od du gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das de nyid kyi sku'i 'od de lta bu nyid ma yin gyi/_dus rtag tu 
[\[204a.5\]]stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'phro zhing gnas te/_shing dang sa dang ri dang rgya mtsho la sogs pa'i phyogs lhag ma rnams dang tshang bang la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pa gser gyis spras pa bzhin no/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni stong phrag dgu bcu'o/_/de rnams kyi lus la zla ba dang nyi ma la sogs pa la rang gi 
[\[204a.6\]]'od kyi snang ba'i nus pa med do/_/mtshan mo dang nyin mo'i bye brag mi shes so/_/sems can rnams kyi nyin mo nyi ma shar ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis rtag tu 'gro bar byed do/_/mtshan mo me tog zum pa dang snga dro'i dus su bya rnams skad 'byin pa la sogs pa la brten nas 'jig rten 
[\[204a.7\]]pas nyin mtshan shes par byed do/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzhan rnams la ci'i phyir 'di lta bu med pa yin nam/_med pa ni ma yin te/_de rnams kyis kyang dgongs par gyur na stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gyur pa'am de bas lhag par yang 'od 'phro bar 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]byed do/_/slar yang bcom ldan 'das bkra shis bzang po sngar gyi don du gnyer ba'i dbang gis te/_gzhan gyi 'od 'dom gang ba bzhin no/_/sku'i 'od kyis rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid du stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byas nas gnas so/_/de'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dus 
[\[204b.2\]]na thams cad sgrol bzhin du bdag nyid gnas so/_/de'i bu dang bu mor bcas pa ri bo b+ha ga bzhin du ri la bzhugs so/_/de nas mche ba gcig pa gdug pa can gyi gnod sbyin zhig gis skyes bu chen po sbyin pa gtong zhes thos nas bram ze'i gzugs kyis nye bar song ste sems dpa' chen po'i drung 
[\[204b.3\]]du bu dang bu mo slong ngo /_/sems dpa' chen pos bram ze la bu dang bu mo sbyin no zhes bsams nas dga' ba dang tshim pas chu'i mthar thug pa'i sa rnams g.yos so/_/de nas gnod sbyin 'chag pa'i gnas kyi mthar tsog pur rgyab rten la 'dug ste sems dpa' chen po la lta zhing 'dug go/_/
[\[204b.4\]]de la des bu dang bu mo byin pa dang des la phug za ba bzhin du bu dang bu mo zos nas/_gnod sbyin gyis skyes bu chen po de la blta ste/_kha gdangs nas me 'bar ba bzhin du khrag gi rgyun 'bab bo/_//de'i kha mthong nas kyang skra'i rtse mo tsam gyi yid mi bde ba yang ma skyes par ngas byin pa shin tu 
[\[204b.5\]]legs pa gcig go zhes sems so/_/slar yang lus la mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes so/_/de dag 'di la byin pa'i bsod nams kyi phan yon gyis ma 'ongs pa na 'di lta bu'i rim pa'i 'od zer 'phro bar don du gnyer ro/_/de la don du gnyer ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis sangs rgyas su gyur 
[\[204b.6\]]nas sku'i 'od de phyi rol du 'phro zhing de rnams la khyab par gnas so/_/gzhan yang 'di'i sngar gyi mdzad pa yod pas de byang chub sems dpa'i dus su sangs rgyas gcig gi sku gdung gi mchod rten mthong nas sangs rgyas 'di'i sku gdung la bdag gis 'tsho ba yongs su btang na rigs sa 
[\[204b.7\]]snyam nas shing ras kyis dkris pa bzhin du lus thams cad gos gzhan gyis dkris shing rin po che'i cod pan gyon nas 'bum phrag gcig ri ba'i gser gyi snod du mar gyis bkang ste der ras 'de stong phrag brgya btsugs nas mar me sbar te mgo'i steng du bzhag cing lus thams cad kyang 'bar 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]bar byas nas sku gdung gi mchod rten la bskor ba byed do/_/de ltar mtshan thog thag snga dro'i skya rengs shar gyi bar du 'bad pa byed pa nyid kyi ba spu'i khung bu tsam yang dro bar ma gyur te pad ma'i tshal du bzhugs pa bzhin no/_/chos zhes bya ba 'di rang nyid bsrung na chos bsrungs par 
[\[205a.2\]]'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_chos bzhin bsrung na chos spyod de/_/chos kyis bsgral na chos bzhin thob/_/legs par bsgral na chos phan yon/_/chos spyod ngan 'gror mi 'gro'o/_/'di'i las kyi 'bras bu bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i 'od kyis stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten 
[\[205a.3\]]gyi khams khyab cing gnas so/_/de'i tshe bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' shin tu sred pa zhes bya ba'i bram zer gyur to/_/des ston pa mgron du gnyer ba'i phyir drung du song ste chos snyan po'i bshad pa thos nas btsun pa sang bdag gi gdugs tshod la byon par zhu zhes zhus so/_/bram 
[\[205a.4\]]zes dge slong du tsam dgos zhes gsungs pa dang /_btsun pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun du tsam bdog ces zhus so/_/de'i tshe ston pa'i 'dus pa dang po nyid tsam yod do/_/de'i phyir bye ba stong phrag brgya yod ces gsungs so/_/btsun pa 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa bdag gi 
[\[205a.5\]]khang par gdugs tshod la byon par zhu zhes zhus pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste bram zes sang don du gnyer cig_/khang par 'gro zhing bsams pa/_bdag gis dge slong 'di rnams la thug pa dang zan dang gos la sogs pa 'bul bar nus so/_/bzhugs pa'i gnas ji lta bu zhes 
[\[205a.6\]]bsams so/_/dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi steng na gnas pa'i lha'i rgyal po'i la ba dmar po'i rdo leb la bzhugs pa na dro bar gyur te/_brgya byin gang zhig bdag gi gnas 'di 'dor ba'i sems su zhig la yod snyam pa dang /_lha'i dbang pos lha'i mig gis bltas pas skyes bu 
[\[205a.7\]]chen po de mthong nas/_'di ltar shin tu sred pa'i bram zes sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mgron du gnyer te/_bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang bsams kyi/_bdag kyang der phyin nas bsod nams kyi cha len par rigs so snyam nas shing mkhan gyi gzugs su sprul te/_ste'u 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]dang dgra sta blangs te skyes bu chen po'i mdun du gnas par gyur nas/_gang su zhig kho bo la gla byin te las ka byed pa yod ces smras so/_/skyes bu chen pos gzigs te/_gang zhig las ka byed nus zhes gsung ba dang /_bdag gis mi shes pa'i bzo med do/_/khang pa'am/_
[\[205b.2\]]bsti gnas sam/_gang zhig cung zad byed pa'i bzo de bdag gis byed kyang yang nus so zhes zer ro/_/byang chub sems dpas smras pa/_de'i phyir nga la las su bya ba yod do/_/kho bos sang 'phags pa las bye ba phrag brgya pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun mgron du gnyer to/_/
[\[205b.3\]]de rnams bzhugs pa'i gnas byed par nus sam/_smras pa bdag gis bgyi'o/_/bdag la gla ster bar nus sam/_bu bdag gis nus so/_/legs so zhes bya ba legs par byas so/_/phyin nas sa phyogs gcig bltas nas dpag tshad bcu gnyis sam bcu gsum 
[\[205b.4\]]pa'i tshad kyis phyogs gcig tu zad par sngon po'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du steng mnyam par byas so/_/des 'di rnams kyi gnas tsam du rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i bsti gnas sa 'og nas phyung nas bya'o zhes bsam zhing blta'o/_/de ma thag par sa gzhi brtol nas bsti gnas 
[\[205b.5\]]grub bo/_/de ni gser las byung ba'i ka ba rnams la dngul las byung ba'i ka zhu'i steng du gser las byung ba'i gdung ngo /_/nor bu'i ka ba la byi ru'i rang bzhin no/_/byi ru'i ka ba la nor bu'i rang bzhin no/_/rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i ka ba la rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i 
[\[205b.6\]]ka zhu nyid do/_/de nas bsti gnas kyi bar bar du g.yer kha'i dra ba 'phyang ba la blta zhing de bltas tsam nyid na dra ba 'phyang ba/_gang la rlung gis bskyod pa de la yan lag lnga pa'i rol mo sgra snyan sgrogs te/_lha'i glu dbyangs sgrogs pa bzhin no/_/bar bar du spos kyi phreng ba dang me 
[\[205b.7\]]tog gi phreng ba 'phyang ba la sems shing phreng ba 'phyang ba la'o/_/bye ba stong phrag brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi grangs kyis stan dang rgyab rten rnams sa gzhi la brten nas byung bar bsams so/_/de ma thag tu sa'i steng du grub bo/_/mtshams dang mtshams rnams su re rer chu'i snod 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]chen po grub pa bsams so/_/chu'i snod chen po de rnams grub bo/_/de dag thams cad sprul nas bram ze'i drung du song nas 'phags pa 'dir byon la bsti gnas gzigs mdzod/_bdag la gla sbyin par rigs so zhes zhus nas skyes bu chen po gshegs te bsti 
[\[206a.2\]]gnas gzigs nas de ma thag tu brgya byin mi snang bar gyur to/_/gzigs pa tsam na lus thams cad kha dog lnga dang ldan pa la dga' ba rgyun mi 'chad par 'phro bar gyur to/_/de nas bsti gnas gzigs nas 'di ltar yid la bsams so/_/bsti gnas 'di mir gyur pas 
[\[206a.3\]]bsgrubs pa ma yin no/_/slar yang bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang bdag gi yon tan rtogs pas nges par brgya byin gyi stan dro bar gyur nas brgya byin lha'i rgyal pos bsti gnas 'di byas par gyur to/_/de nas slar yang 'di lta bu'i tshul gyi bsti gnas su nyi ma gcig nyid 
[\[206a.4\]]la sbyin pa gtong ba ni bdag gi rigs pa ma yin no/_/nyi ma bdun du bdag gis ster bar bsams so/_/phyi rol gyi sbyin pas ji tsam gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgyes par mi nus so/_/rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i mgo bo bcad pa dang dri ma med pa'i mig bton pa dang 
[\[206a.5\]]snying gi sha bregs pa'am bcad nas byin pa'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' btang ba'i dgyes par 'gyur ro/_/bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang sha si bi'i skyes rabs las nyi ma re rer dong tse khal lnga lnga ri ba'i rin gyis nyos nas sgo bzhi dang grong khyer gyi dbus 
[\[206a.6\]]su sbyin pa gtong ngo /_/de'i sbyin pa de gtong bas yongs su tshim pa med do/_/slar yang gang gi tshe brgya byin lha'i rgyal po bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'ongs nas mig bslangs so/_/de'i tshe de'i mig bton nas ster ba nyid kyis dgyes par 'gyur ro/_/skra'i rtse mo tsam yang 
[\[206a.7\]]sems la sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du sbyin pa'i rgyus byang chub sems dpa' la tshim pa med do/_/de'i phyir skyes bu chen po de yang zhag bdun du bdag gis bye ba stong phrag brgya'i grangs kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la sbyin pa gtong bar rigs so zhes bsams 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]so/_/de'i bsti gnas su bzhugs nas zhag bdun du dga' ba pA na zhes bya ba'i sbyin pa byin no/_/dga' ba can zhes pa ni ches che ba'i snod shin tu che ba 'o mas bkang nas tshang bang chen po'i steng du bzhag nas mes 'o ma shin tu bska bar bskol te 'bras cung zad btab nas 
[\[206b.2\]]btsos te sbrang dang dkar ba'i phye ma dang mar gsar pa rnams btsos pa'i bza' ba'i 'o thug ni dga' ba bA na zhes brjod do/_/mi rnams kyis 'dren par ma nus na lha rnams kyis kyang bar bar du 'dren no/_/dpag tshad bcu gnyis sam bcu gsum pa'i tshad kyi gnas su dge 
[\[206b.3\]]slong rnams ma shong na/_slar yang dge slong de rnams rang rang gi mthus bzhugs so/_/zhag bdun gyi mthar dge slong thams cad kyi lhung bzed bkrus nas sman gyi phyir du mar gsar pa dang zhun mar dang sbrang dang bu ram bskol ba'i chu rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas chos 
[\[206b.4\]]gos gsum dang bcas pa phul lo/_/dge 'dun gzhon nu rnams kyis dge slong gis thob pa'i chos gos kyi rgyu'i ras 'bum phrag gcig ri ba thob par gyur to/_/ston pas rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do/_/skyes bu 'dis 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis sbyin pa chen po byin no/_/gang 
[\[206b.5\]]gi don du 'gyur zhes rtog par byed do/_/ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa 'bum phrag gcig lhag pa'i grangs med pa gnyis 'das pa na gau ta ma zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhes gzigs te/_skyes bu chen po bos nas khyod kyi dus 'di rnams 'das nas gau ta ma zhes bya ba'i 
[\[206b.6\]]sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan no/_/skyes bu chen pos lung bstan pa thos nas bdag ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur bas/_bdag khyim na gnas pa la don med kyis rab tu 'byung ngo snyam du bsams so/_/de de lta bu'i tshul dang ldan pas mchil ma dor ba bzhin 
[\[206b.7\]]du khyim spangs nas ston pa'i drung du rab tu byung zhing byung nas sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab bslabs nas mngon par shes pa dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed de/_tshe'i mthar tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das bkra shis bzang po'i grong 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]khyer mchog ces bya bar gyur to/_/yab ni mchog gi rgyal po'o/_/yum ni mchog ma zhes bya ba'o/_/ltang bzang dang chos kyi sde gnyis ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/bskyang ba zhes bya ba ni nye gnas so/_/zhi byed len dang /_mya ngan med gnyis ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub shing ni 
[\[207a.2\]]klu shing ngo /_/sku'i mtho tshad du khru brgyad cu rtsa brgyad pa'o/_/stong phrag dgu bcu'i lo ni sku tshe'i tshad do/_/stong phrag dgu bcu bzhugs nas mya ngan las 'das so/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas slar yang de ma thag par stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi phyogs kun mun par gyur to/_/khor yug 
[\[207a.3\]]thams cad kyi mi rnams cho nges chen po 'debs so/_/kauN+Di n+ya 'og tu ni/_/'jig rten 'dren pa bkra shis bzang /_/'jig rten nang gi mun bsal nas/_/chos kyi snang ba'i 'od bkye'o/_/de bzhin du stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mun nag tu byas nas mya ngan las 'das so/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i 'og 
[\[207a.4\]]gi char yid [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]zhes bya ba'i ston pa byon no/_/de'i yang nyan thos kyi 'dus pa gsum ste/_'dus pa dang po la bye ba stong phrag brgya'i dge slong ngo /_/'dus pa gnyis pa la gser gyi ri la bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu'o/_/gsum pa la bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu'o/_/de'i tshe sems dpa' chen po klu'i rgyal 
[\[207a.5\]]po mnyam med ces bya bar gyur to/_/rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang ldan zhing des sangs rgyas byon pa thos nas gnyen gyi grogs rnams 'khor du byas te/_klu'i gnas nas 'thon te/_bye ba stong phrag brgya'i dge slong gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das la lha'i rol mos nye bar mchod nas sbyin pa chen po phul lo/_/so so la 
[\[207a.6\]]lha'i gos gnyis gnyis phul bas skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshul khrims la gnas so/_/de yang ston pa des ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar lung bstan no/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer dge ba can zhes bya bar gyur te/_legs byin zhes bya ba'i rgyal po ni yab bo/_/dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba ni yum mo/_/nges 
[\[207a.7\]]'gro dang goms byed ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/'char byed ni nye gnas so/_/nyan pa dang nye bar nyan pa gnyis ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni klu shing ngo /_/sku'i mtho tshad du khru drug cu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag dgu bcu'o/_/bkra shis bzang po'i 'og tu ni/_/'dren pa thugs bzang zhes 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]bya ba/_/chos rnams kun la mtshungs med pa/_/sems can kun gyi mchog yin no/_/de'i yang 'og gi char nam gru can gyi ston pa zhes bya ba byon no/_/de'i 'dus pa gsum du 'gyur te/_'dus pa dang po la bgrang du med pa zhes bya ba'o/_/gnyis pa la bye ba stong phrag brgya'i dge slong ngo /_/de bzhin du gsum pa yang ngo /_/de'i 
[\[207b.2\]]tshe byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i lha zhes bya ba'i bram zer gyur to/_/ston pa'i chos bshad pa thos nas skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshul khrims la gnas so/_/mgo'i steng du thal mo sbyar nas ston pa la de'i nyon mongs rnams spong ba'i bsngags pa brjod nas bla gos kyis mchod pas de yang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes 
[\[207b.3\]]lung bstan to/_/slar yang de'i bcom ldan 'das kyi grong khyer ni nam gru bzang ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/_/yab ni shin tu rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'o/_/yum ni shin tu rgyas ma zhes bya ba'o/_/chu lha dang lha tshangs pa ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/yang dag 'byung zhes bya ba ni nye gnas so/_/bzang mo dang legs bzang mo 
[\[207b.4\]]ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni klu shing ngo /_/sku mtho tshad du khru brgyad cu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag drug cu'o/_/thugs bzang gi ni 'og tu ni/_/'dren pa nam gru can zhes bya/_/mtshungs pa med cing dpe med par/_/rgyal ba mnyam med mchog tu gyur/_/de'i 'og gi char mdzes byed ces bya ba'i 
[\[207b.5\]]ston pa byon no/_/de'i 'dus pa gsum du gyur te/_'dus pa dang po la bye ba brgya'i dge slong ngo /_/gnyis pa la bye ba dgu bcu'o/_/gsum pa la bye ba brgyad cu'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pa zhes bya ba'i bram zer gyur to/_/ston pa'i chos bstan pa thos nas skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshul khrims la 
[\[207b.6\]]gnas so/_/sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin pa chen po btang ngo /_/des yang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar lung bstan no/_/slar yang bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer chos bzang zhes bya bar gyur to/_/yab ni chos bzang rgyal po'o/_/yum ni chos bzang ma zhes bya ba'o/_/mtshungs med dang 
[\[207b.7\]]legs spyan ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/yid ldan ni nye gnas so/_/rig ma dang legs skyes ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni klu shing nyid do/_/sku mtho tshad du khru lnga bcu rtsa brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag dgu bcu'o/_/nam gru can gyi 'og tu ni/_/'dren pa mdzes byed ces bya ba/_/mnyam 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]par bzhag cing thugs ni zhi/_/gang zag zla med mtshungs med do/_/de'i 'og gi char bskal pa grangs med pa gcig 'das nas bskal pa gcig gi nang du sangs rgyas gsum byon no/_/thugs ldan mthong ba dang /_pad ma dang mi sbyin no/_/bcom ldan 'das thugs ldan mthong gi 'dus pa 
[\[208a.2\]]gsum du gyur te/_dang po la dge slong 'bum phrag gcig go/_/gnyis pa la 'bum phrag bdun no/_/gsum pa la 'bum phrag drug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' gnod sbyin gcig tu gyur to/_/rdzu 'phrul dang mthu chen po dang ldan pa'i bye ba stong phrag brgya du ma'i gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag 
[\[208a.3\]]por gyur to/_/des bcom ldan 'das byon pa thos nas 'ongs te sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin pa chen po btang ngo /_/ston pas kyang ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan no/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das thugs ldan mthong gi grong khyer ni la ba can zhes bya bar 
[\[208a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/yab ni grags ldan rgyal po'o/_/yum ni grags 'dzin ma'o/_/nges bzang dang yid ldan ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/chu lha ni nye gnas so/_/legs mdzes dang yid bzang ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni srid sgrub kyi shing ngo /_/sku'i mtho tshad khru lnga bcu rtsa brgyad do/_/'bum phrag gcig 
[\[208a.5\]]gi lo ni sku tshe'i tshad do/_/mdzes byed kyi ni 'og tu ni/_/rkang gnyis mchog gi rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/thugs bzang mthong dang 'chi med grags/_/gzi brjid ldan zhing ring mthong ngo /_/de'i 'og gi char pad ma zhes bya ba'i ston pa byon no/_/de'i yang 'dus pa gsum du 'gyur te/_'dus pa dang po la bye ba 'bum phrag gcig gi dge 
[\[208a.6\]]slong ngo /_/gnyis pa la 'bum phrag gsum mo/_/gsum pa la grong med pa'i dgon par gnas tshal chen po na dge slong 'bum phrag gnyis gnas so/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa yang de'i nags tshal chen por bzhugs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ger skyes par gyur to/_/ston pas 'gog pa la snyoms par 
[\[208a.7\]]zhugs so/_/zhugs par mthong nas sems rab tu dang bas phyag byas nas bskor ba byas te/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes so/_/lan gsum du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so/_/zhag bdun du sangs rgyas kyi phyir du dga' ba ma spangs pas dga' ba dang bde ba nyid kyi spyod yul du ma phyin par srog yongs su btang ngo snyam ste 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]blta zhing 'dug go/_/ston pa zhag bdun nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/_seng ge la blta zhing dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kyis kyang sems dang bar byas nas dge 'dun la phyag byed do zhes brjod cing dge slong gi dge 'dun shog ces bsams te dge slong rnams de ma thag tu byon no/_/
[\[208b.2\]]seng ges dge 'dun la sems rab tu dang bar byed do/_/ston pas de'i sems la brtags te ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan no/_/slar yang bcom ldan 'das pad ma'i grong ni tsam pa ka zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/yab ni pad ma'i rgyal po'o/_/yum ni mtshungs med ma zhes bya'o/_/
[\[208b.3\]]sA la dang u pa sA la ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/chu lha zhes bya ba ni nye gnas so/_/dga' ma dang shin tu dga' ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni sro na'i shing ngo /_/sku'i mtho tshad du khru lnga bcu rtsa brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag gcig go/_/thugs ldan mthong gi 'og tu ni/_/rkang 
[\[208b.4\]]gnyis mchog gi rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/mtshan ni pad ma zhes bya ba/_/gang zag zla med mtshungs med do/_/de'i 'og tu mi sbyin zhes bya ba'i ston pa byon no/_/de'i yang 'dus pa gsum du 'gyur te/_'dus pa dang po la bye ba stong phrag brgya'i dge slong ngo /_/gnyis pa la bye ba 'bum phrag dgu 
[\[208b.5\]]bcu'o/_/gsum pa la bye ba brgyad cu dang 'bum phrag gcig go/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' drang srong gis rab tu byung ste mngon par shes pa lnga dang snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad po dbang du gyur te sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin pa chen po btang nas/_tsan 
[\[208b.6\]]dan dmar pos mchod nas de yang des ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer ni 'byor ldan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/yab ni blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'o/_/yum ni yid ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/sA la bzang po dang rgyal byed 
[\[208b.7\]]bshes gnyen ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/gnas mchog ni nye gnas so/_/mchog ma dang 'bras bu can ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni sro na chen po'o/_/sku'i mtho tshad du khru brgyad cu rtsa brgyad pa'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag dgu bcu'o/_/pad ma yi ni 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]'og tu ni/_/rkang gnyis mchog gi rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/mtshan ni mi sbyin zhes bya ba/_/gang zag zla med mtshungs med do/_/sangs rgyas mi sbyin gyi 'og gi char 'di nas bskal pa 'bum phrag gcig gi mgo nas brtsams te bskal pa gcig nyid kyi 
[\[209a.2\]]nang du sangs rgyas pad ma mchog ces bya ba byon no/_/de'i yang 'dus pa gsum du 'gyur te/_'dus pa dang po la bye ba stong phrag brgya'i dge slong ngo /_/gnyis pa la bai b+hA ra'i ri la bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu'o/_/gsum pa la bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems 
[\[209a.3\]]dpa' ral pa can zhes bya ba'i yul 'khor chen por skyes so/_/sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun rnams la chos gos dang bcas pa'i sbyin pa chen po btang ngo /_/de yang des ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan no/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das pad ma mchog gi 
[\[209a.4\]]dus su mu stegs zhes bya ba'i ming yang med do/_/lha dang mi thams cad sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba'o/_/de'i grong khyer ni dang ba ldan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/yab ni kun dga' bo zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'o/_/yum ni legs ma zhes bya ba'o/_/lha'i spyan dang legs skyes ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/
[\[209a.5\]]yid bzang zhes bya ba ni nye gnas so/_/grogs med ma dang mtshungs med ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni shA la'i shing nyid do/_/sku'i mtho tshad du khru brgyad cu rtsa brgyad do/_/sku'i 'od kun nas 'khor ba la dpag tshad bcu gnyis so/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum phrag gcig 
[\[209a.6\]]go/_/mi sbyin gyi ni 'og nyid du/_/rkang gnyis mchog gi rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/rgyal ba pad ma mchog zhes pa/_/mi 'khrugs rgya mtsho lta bu'o/_/de'i 'og gi char bskal pa stong phrag gsum 'das nas/_blo gros bzang po dang legs skyes zhes bya ba ni bskal pa gcig gi nang du sangs rgyas 
[\[209a.7\]]gnyis su gyur to/_/blo gros bzang po'i yang nyan thos kyi 'dus pa gsum du 'gyur te/_'dus pa dang po la grong khyer blta na sdug ces bya ba na bye ba brgya'i zag pa zad pa'o/_/'dus pa gnyis pa la yang bye ba dgu bcur 'gyur ro/_/'dus pa gsum pa la ni bye ba brgyad cu'o/_/de'i tshe 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' lus mchog ces bya ba bram ze'i khye'ur gyur to/_/sa'i 'og tu gter du bcug pa nyid bye ba brgyad cu'i nor rnams spel nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin pa chen po phul te chos mnyan nas skyabs su 'gro ba'i sdom pa la gnas so/_/
[\[209b.2\]]rab tu byung nas nags tshal du byon no/_/de yang ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgya bar lung bstan no/_/bcom ldan 'das blo gros bzang po'i grong khyer ni blta na sdug ces bya bar gyur to/_/yab ni legs sbyin zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'o/_/yum ni legs sbyin ma zhes bya ba'o/_/nges 'byung dang thams 
[\[209b.3\]]cad 'dod ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/rgya mtsho zhes bya ba ni nye gnas so/_/dga' ma dang shin tu dga' ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni shing nI pa chen po'o/_/sku mtho tshad du khru brgyad cu rtsa brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag dgu bcu'o/_/pad ma mchog gi 'og tu ni/_/
[\[209b.4\]]'dren pa blo bzang zhes bya ba/_/'od zer drag cing ring la sems/_/thub pa 'jig rten kun gyi mchog_/de'i 'og gi char legs skyes zhes bya ba'i ston pa byon no/_/de'i yang nyan thos kyi 'dus pa gsum du gyur te/_'dus pa dang po la dge slong stong phrag drug cu'o/_/gnyis pa la stong 
[\[209b.5\]]phrag lnga bcu'o/_/gsum pa la stong phrag bzhi bcu'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur te/_sangs rgyas byon zhes thos nas nye bar song ste/_chos thos nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun la rin po che sna bdun dang bcas pa'i gling chen po 
[\[209b.6\]]bzhi'i rgyal srid sbyin par btang nas/_ston pa'i drung du rab tu byung ngo /_/yul thams cad na gnas pa'i yul du skyes pa'i nor blangs nas gtsug lag khang rnams rdzogs par bya ste/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong rnams la sbyin pa chen po phul lo/_/de yang ma 'ongs pa na ston pas sangs 
[\[209b.7\]]rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan no/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer ni bkra shis bzang po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/yab ni drag po zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'o/_/yum ni 'od ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/blta na sdug dang lha gnyis ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/mi sbyin ni nye gnas so/_/glu ma dang glu ma'i phreng ba 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]dang bcas pa ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni 'od ma chen po'o/_/de'i nang bug pa phra mo can no/_/sdong po ni sdug po'o/_/steng na yal ga rma bya'i gdugs ltar mdzes pa'i 'dab ma can no/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i sku'i mtho tshad du khru lnga bcu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni 
[\[210a.2\]]lo stong phrag dgu bcu'o/_/snying po'i bskal pa de nyid la/_/'dren pa legs skyes zhes bya ba/_/khyu mchog dpung pa seng ge'i 'gram/_/ring la sems zhing gzhal du med/_/de'i 'og gi char 'di nas bskal pa brgya dang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi mgo nas brtsams nas bskal pa gcig la dga' 
[\[210a.3\]]mthong dang /_don mthong dang /_chos mthong ste sangs rgyas gsum byon no/_/dga' mthong gi yang nyan thos 'dus pa gsum du 'gyur te/_'dus pa dang po la bye ba stong phrag brgya'i dge slong ngo /_/gnyis pa la bye ba dgu bcu'o/_/gsum pa la bye ba brgyad cu'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'od 
[\[210a.4\]]srung zhes bya ba'i bram ze'i khye'ur gyur to/_/rig byed gsum gyi pha rol tu phyin nas ston pa'i chos bstan pa thos te bye ba stong phrag brgya'i nor yongs su btang nas dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang byed cing skyabs su song nas tshul khrims la gnas so/_/de nas ston pas bskal pa brgya dang [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad 
[\[210a.5\]]'das nas sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan no/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer ni yid ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/_/yab ni legs sbyin zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'o/_/yum ni zla ba ma zhes bya ba'o/_/bskyangs pa dang kun mthong gnyis ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/mdzes byed ni nye gnas so/_/
[\[210a.6\]]legs skyes ma dang chos sbyin ma gnyis ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni pri yaM ku'i shing ngo /_/sku'i mtho tshad du khru brgyad cu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag dgu bcu'o/_/legs skyes kyi ni 'og tu ni/_/rang byung 'jig rten 'dren pa nyid/_/mtshungs dang mi mtshungs ring 
[\[210a.7\]]du sems/_/dga' mthong grags pa chen po'o/_/de'i 'og gi char bcom ldan 'das don mthong zhes bya ba byon no/_/de'i yang nyan thos kyi 'dus pa gsum du 'gyur te/_'dus pa dang po la 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad kyi dge slong ngo /_/gnyis pa la 'bum phrag brgyad cu rtsa 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]brgyad do/_/de bzhin du gsum pa la yang ngo /_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' mtshams bzang zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i dka' thub par gyur to/_/lha'i 'jig rten gyi man dA ra ba'i me tog gi gdugs blangs nas ston pa la mchod do/_/de yang des lung bstan 
[\[210b.2\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer ni mdzes byed ces bya bar gyur to/_/yab ni rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'o/_/yum ni blta na sdug ma'o/_/zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/'jigs med ni nye gnas so/_/chos ma dang chos bzang ma ni nyan thos ma'i 
[\[210b.3\]]mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni tsam pa ka'i shing ngo /_/sku'i mtho tshad du khru brgyad cu rtsa brgyad do/_/sku'i 'od kun nas 'khor ba la dus thams cad du dpag tshad gcig gi bar du khyab cing gnas so/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum phrag gcig go/_/snying po'i bskal pa de nyid 
[\[210b.4\]]la/_/don mthong mi yi khyu mchog ni/_/mun pa chen po bsal nas ni/_/yang dag byang chub mchog thob bo/_/de'i 'og gi char chos mthong zhes bya ba'i ston pa byon no/_/de'i yang nyan thos 'dus pa gsum du 'gyur te/_'dus pa dang po la bye ba brgya'i dge slong ngo /_/gnyis pa 
[\[210b.5\]]la bye ba bdun cu'o/_/gsum pa la bye ba brgyad cu'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' lha'i rgyal po brgya byin du gyur to/_/lha'i dri bzang dang me tog dang lha'i rol mo rnams kyis mchod de/_de yang ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgya bar lung bstan to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer ni 
[\[210b.6\]]skyabs zhes bya bar gyur to/_/yab ni skyabs kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/yum ni shin tu dga' ma zhes bya ba'o/_/pad ma dang lhar gyur pa ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/legs spyan zhes bya ba ni nye gnas so/_/dge ma dang bden ma zhes bya ba ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni pim pa dzA 
[\[210b.7\]]la'i shing ngo /_/sku'i mtho tshad du khru brgyad cu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum phrag gcig go/_/snying po'i bskal pa de nyid la/_/chos mthong grags pa chen po yis/_/mun pa chen po bcom nas ni/_/lha dang bcas pa snang bar mdzad/_/de'i 'og gi char 'di nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa bzhi nas mgo 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]brtsams nas bskal pa gcig la don grub zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas gcig byon no/_/de'i yang nyan thos kyi 'dus pa gsum du 'gyur te/_'dus pa dang po la bye ba 'bum phrag gcig gi dge slong ngo /_/gnyis pa la bye ba dgu bcu'o/_/gsum pa la bye ba brgyad cu'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzi 
[\[211a.2\]]brjid drag po dang /_mngon par shes pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'i dka' thub pa bkra shis bzang po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/shing 'dzam bu chen po'i 'bras bu blangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo/_/ston pas 'bras bu de gsol nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa bzhi'i 'og tu byang chub sems dpa' ma 'ongs pa na sangs 
[\[211a.3\]]rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan no/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer ni bai b+hA ra zhes bya bar gyur to/_/yab ni rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'o/_/yum ni legs gyur ma zhes bya ba'o/_/mang du 'byung dang bshes gnyen bzang po ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/nam gru can ni nye gnas so/_/zhi byed len ma dang legs 
[\[211a.4\]]brtan ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni karni ka'i shing ngo /_/sku'i mtho tshad ni khru drug cu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum phrag gcig go/_/chos mthong gi ni 'og nyid du/_/'jig rten 'dren pa don grub kyi/_/mun pa thams cad bcom nas ni/_/nam mkhar nyi ma shar ba bzhin/_/de'i 'og gi char 'di nas 
[\[211a.5\]]bskal pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis nas mgo brtsams nas bskal pa gcig la dkar rgyal dang gyur pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas gnyis byon no/_/bcom ldan 'das dkar rgyal de'i yang 'dus pa gsum du 'gyur te/_'dus pa dang po la bye ba brgya'i dge slong ngo /_/gnyis pa la bye ba dgu bcu'o/_/gsum pa la 
[\[211a.6\]]bye ba brgyad cu'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' longs spyod chen po dang grags pa chen po dang ldan pa'i legs skyes zhes bya ba'i rgyal rigs su gyur pa dka' thub pa'i rab tu byung ba la rab tu byung nas rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par gyur te sangs rgyas byon pa thos nas lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang pad ma dang pA ri ts+tshat+t+ra'i me tog rnams 
[\[211a.7\]]blangs nas 'khor bzhi'i nang du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod nas/_nam mkha' me tog gi bla res bres so/_/sangs rgyas des yang 'di nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gnyis nas 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer ni dge ma zhes bya ba'o/_/yab ni skye bo dad pa can 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'i rigs so/_/yum ni pad ma zhes bya ba'o/_/tshangs pa'i lha dang 'char byed ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/yang dag mchog ni nye gnas so/_/myur ma dang legs sbyin ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni a sa na'i shing ngo /_/sku'i mtho tshad la khru drug cu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo 'bum phrag 
[\[211b.2\]]gcig go/_/don grub kyi ni 'og nyid du/_/gang zag zla med mtshungs med pa/_/tshul khrims dpag med mtha' yas grags/_/'jig rten 'dren pa dkar rgyal mchog_/de'i 'og gi char gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ston pa byon no/_/de'i yang 'dus pa gsum du 'gyur te/_'dus pa dang po la 'bum phrag drug cu'i dge slong ngo /_/
[\[211b.3\]]gnyis pa la 'bum phrag lnga bcu'o/_/gsum pa la 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa gnyis so/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal byed zhes bya ba'i rgyal rigs su gyur te/_rgyal po chen po'i rgyal rigs spangs nas ni ston pa'i drung du rab tu byung ste sde snod gsum bslabs nas skye bo mang po la dam pa'i chos ston cing 'chad 
[\[211b.4\]]pa dang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par byas nas de yang de bzhin du 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer ni gsal ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/_/yab ni rgyal ba'i sde zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'o/_/yum ni dpal ldan ma zhes bya'o/_/legs bsrangs dang chos kyi sde ni nyan thos 
[\[211b.5\]]kyi mchog go/_/'jigs bcas ni nye gnas so/_/phreng ba ma dang nye ba'i phreng ba ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni skyu ru ra'i shing ngo /_/sku'i mtho tshad du khru lnga bcu rtsa brgyad do/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag dgu bcu'o/_/snying po'i bskal pa de nyid la/_/ston pa bla na med par gyur/_/mtshungs dang mi 
[\[211b.6\]]mtshungs dpe med pa/_/'jig rten mchog gi 'dren par gyur/_/de'i 'og gi char 'di nas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig la bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba byon no/_/de'i yang 'dus pa gsum du gyur te/_'dus pa dang po la dge slong 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad do/_/gnyis pa la 'bum 
[\[211b.7\]]phrag gcig go/_/gsum pa la stong phrag brgyad cu'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing mthu che bas mtshungs pa med pa'i klu'i rgyal por gyur te/_rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa'i gser gyi ba dan chen po bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/des yang 'di nas bskal pa dgu 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]bcu rtsa gcig nas sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan no/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer ni blo gros gnyen zhes bya bar gyur to/_/yab ni gnyen gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'o/_/yum ni blo gros gnyen ma zhes bya ba'o/_/phung po dang dkar rgyal ni nyan thos kyi mchog 
[\[212a.2\]]go/_/mya ngan med ni nye gnas so/_/zla ba ma dang zla ba'i bshes gnyen ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni pA Ti li'i shing ngo /_/sku'i mtho tshad du khru brgyad cu'o/_/sku'i 'od la rtag tu dpag tshad bdun du 'phro zhing gnas so/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag brgyad
