[\[212a.3\]]cu'o/_/gyur pa yi ni 'og tu ni/_/rkang gnyis mchog gi rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/mtshan ni rnam par gzigs zhes bya/_/spyan ldan 'jig rten bskyed pa'o/_/de'i 'og gi char 'di nas bskal pa sum cu rtsa gnyis nas gtsug tor can dang thams cad skyob ces pa'i sangs rgyas byon 
[\[212a.4\]]no/_/gtsug tor can gyi yang nyan thos kyi 'dus pa gsum du 'gyur te/_'dus pa dang po la 'bum phrag gcig gi dge slong ngo /_/gnyis pa la 'bum phrag brgyad cu'o/_/gsum pa la 'bum phrag bcu'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sgra'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i rgyal por 
[\[212a.5\]]gyur te/_sangs rgyas dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun rnams la chos gos dang bcas pa'i sbyin pa chen po phul lo/_/rin po che sna bdun gyis so sor brgyan pa'i glang po che phul nas/_glang po che'i tshad tsam ri zhing rung ba'i yo byad rnams phul lo/_/des yang 'di nas bskal pa 
[\[212a.6\]]sum cu rtsa gcig nas sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer ni skya rengs ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/_/yab ni skya rengs ldan zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'o/_/yum ni 'od ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/mngon 'byung dang yang dag 'byung ni nyan 
[\[212a.7\]]thos kyi mchog go/_/dge bar byed pa ni nye gnas so/_/ma gi la dang pad ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni pu Na Da rI ka'i shing ngo /_/sku'i mtho tshad du khru sum cu rtsa bdun du 'gyur ro/_/sku'i 'od dpag tshad gsum du 'phro zhing gnas so/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]lo stong phrag sum cu rtsa bdun no/_/rnam par gzigs kyi 'og tu ni/_/rkang gnyis mchog gi rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/mtshungs med rgyal ba gtsug tor can/_/gang zag zla med mtshungs med do/_/de'i 'og gi char thams cad skyob ces bya ba'i sangs rgyas byon no/_/de'i 
[\[212b.2\]]yang 'dus pa gsum du 'gyur te/_'dus pa dang po la 'bum phrag brgyad cu'i dge slong ngo /_/gnyis pa la 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa bdun no/_/gsum pa la 'bum phrag drug cu'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' blta na sdug ces bya ba'i rgyal por gyur te/_sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i 
[\[212b.3\]]dge 'dun la chos gos dang bcas pa'i sbyin pa chen po phul nas de'i drung du rab tu byung ste/_spyod pa dang /_yon tan dang ldan pas sangs rgyas dkon mchog la ri mor byas te dga' bar gyur to/_/de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di nas bskal pa sum cu rtsa gcig nas sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhes lung 
[\[212b.4\]]bstan to/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer ni yid ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/_/yab ni legs par gnas zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'o/_/yum ni grags ldan ma zhes bya ba'o/_/nyan pa dang mchog ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/nye bar zhi ba ni nye gnas so/_/phreng ba ma dang phreng 
[\[212b.5\]]ba dang bcas pa ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni sA la'i shing ngo /_/sku'i mtho tshad ni khru drug cur 'gyur ro/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag drug cu'o/_/snying po'i bskal pa de nyid la/_/gang zag zla med mtshungs pa med/_/mtshan ni thams cad skyob ces pa/_/rgyal 
[\[212b.6\]]ba de ni 'jig rten bskyed/_/de'i yang 'og gi char bskal pa 'di la sangs rgyas bzhi byon no/_/log par dad sel dang gser thub dang 'od srung dang bdag cag gi bcom ldan 'das so/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das log par dad sel gyi nyan thos kyi 'dus pa ni gcig go/_/de la stong 
[\[212b.7\]]phrag bzhi bcu'i dge slong ngo /_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dge ba zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur to/_/sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge 'dun la lhung bzed chos gos dang bcas pa'i sbyin pa nyid dang /_mig sman dang sman la sogs pa phul nas ston pa'i chos bstan pa thos nas rab tu 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]byung ngo /_/de yang ston pas lung bstan to/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das log par dad sel de'i grong khyer dge ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/yab ni mi sbyin bram ze zhes bya ba'o/_/yum ni bram ze mo grogs ma'o/_/pi d+hu ra dang yang dag 'tsho ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/bram ze blo gros ni nye gnas 
[\[213a.2\]]so/_/mnyam byed dang tsam pa ka ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni shing shi ri Sha chen po'o/_/sku'i mtho tshad la khru bzhi bcur 'gyur ro/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag bzhi bcu'o/_/thams cad skyob kyi 'og tu ni/_/rkang gnyis mchog gi rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/mtshan ni log par dad sel 
[\[213a.3\]]zhes/_/gzhal med ring la sems pa'o/_/de'i 'og gi char ston pa gser thub ces bya ba byon no/_/de'i yang nyan thos kyi 'dus pa gcig ste/_de la stong phrag sum cu'i dge slong du 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' ri zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur to/_/blon po'i tshogs mang po 
[\[213a.4\]]'khor dang bcas pa chos bstan pa thos nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams mgron du gnyer nas sbyin pa chen po phul te ston pa'i drung du song ste/_/lhung bzed dang /_rgya'i dar dang /_grong khyer gsal ldan gyi yul gyi ras dang /_la ba dang /_du ku la'i ras dang /_dar gos gser 
[\[213a.5\]]ma rnams phul te/_ston pa'i drung du rab tu byung ngo /_/de yang sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar lung bstan no/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer ni mdzes ldan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/yab ni gnod sbyin zhes bya ba'i bram ze'o/_/yum ni mchog ma zhes bya ba'i bram ze mo'o/_/'jigs byed dang mchog ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/bkra 
[\[213a.6\]]shis zhes bya ba ni nye gnas so/_/rgya mtsho ma dang mchog ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni u dum bA ra'i shing ngo /_/sku'i mtho tshad la khru nyi shu'o/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag sum cu'o/_/log par dad sel 'og tu ni/_/rkang gnyis mchog gi rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/mtshan ni rgyal ba gser thub bo/_/
[\[213a.7\]]mi yi khyu mchog 'jig rten gtso/_/de'i 'og gi char 'od srung zhes bya ba'i ston pa byon no/_/de'i yang 'dus pa gcig ste/_de la dge slong stong phrag nyi shu'o/_/de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'od bskyor zhes bya ba'i bram ze'i khye'ur gyur nas/_rig byed gsum gyi pha rol du son te/_sa dang bar snang thams cad 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]la grags so/_/bum pa byed pa'i rdza mkhan gyi grogs por gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' rdza mkhan dang 'grogs te ston pa'i drung du nye bar song ste/_chos kyi gtam thos nas rab tu byung ngo /_/brtson 'grus cher bskyed nas sde snod gsum bslabs te spyod pa dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa mdzes par byed do/_/
[\[213b.2\]]de yang ston pas lung bstan no/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i bltam pa'i grong khyer ni bA rA Na sI zhes bya ba'o/_/yab ni tshangs byin zhes bya ba'i bram ze'o/_/yum ni 'byor ldan ma zhes bya ba'i bram ze mo'o/_/dkar rgyal dang b+hA ra d+h+wa dza ni nyan thos kyi mchog go/_/thams cad bshes gnyen ni nye gnas so/_/
[\[213b.3\]]rjes su len ma dang stong rgyas ma ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go/_/byang chub kyi shing ni n+ya gro ta'i shing ngo /_/sku'i mtho tshad du khru nyi shu par gyur to/_/sku tshe'i tshad ni lo stong phrag nyi shu'o/_/gser thub kyi ni 'og tu ni/_/rkang gnyis mchog gi rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/mtshan ni rgyal ba 'od srung ngo /_/
[\[213b.4\]]chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad do/_/gzhan yang bskal pa gang la stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mar me mdzad pa de la/_gzhan yang sangs rgyas gsum byon par gyur te/_de rnams kyi drung du byang chub sems dpa' lung ma bstan no/_/de'i phyir 'dir yang ma bstan te/_gzhan yang don gyi gtam 'di'i bskal 
[\[213b.5\]]pa nas bzung nas sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba'i don du 'dir bshad do/_/sred mdzad dang ni blo gros mdzad/_/de nas skyabs ni mdzad pa yin/_/mar me mdzad ni rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/rkang gnyis mchog ni kau Di n+ya/_/bkra shis dang ni thugs bzang dang /_/thub pa nam gru mdzes byed dang /_/
[\[213b.6\]]thugs ldan mthong dang pad ma dang /_/mi sbyin dang ni pad ma'i mchog_/blo gros bzang dang legs skyes dang /_/grags chen blta na sdug pa dang /_/don mthong dang ni chos mthong dang /_/'jig rten 'dren pa don grub dang /_/rdzogs sangs rgyas ni dkar rgyal gyur/_/rnam gzigs gtsug 
[\[213b.7\]]tor thams cad skyob/_/log dad sel dang gser thub dang /_/'dren pa 'od srung zhes bya'o/_/yang dag rdzogs sangs de rnams ni/_/mnyam par bzhag cing 'dod chags bcom/_/'od zer brgya pa bzhin du 'khrungs/_/mun pa chen po rnam par 'joms/_/me yi phung po bzhin 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]du 'bar/_/nyan thos dang bcas mya ngan 'das/_/de la bdag cag gi byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i drung du smon lam btab nas bskal pa grangs med pa bzhi dang 'bum phrag gcig lhag pa nas byon no/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 
[\[214a.2\]]'das 'od srung de'i 'og gi char gnas te yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di las sangs rgyas gzhan med do zhes mar me mdzad la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i drung du lung bstan pa thob bo/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang des/_mi yi bdag nyid rtags dang ldan/_/sgyu 
[\[214a.3\]]dang ston pa'i lta ba dang /_/rab tu byung zhing yon tan ldan/_/gzhi rnams dang ni 'dun pa dang /_/chos brgyad po ni tshogs pa dang /_/smon lam rnams ni yang dag rdzogs/_/chos brgyad po 'di rnams tshogs par byas nas mar me mdzad kyi zhabs drung du smon lam btab cing sangs rgyas su byed pa'i chos 
[\[214a.4\]]'di rnams gang dang gang du tshol ba'i spro ba skyes so/_/btsal ba de rnams mthong bas na/_/dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pas sangs rgyas thob par byed pa'i chos rdzogs par byed pa nyid thams cad sgrol gyi bdag nyid byon no/_/byon nas gang de rnams byas pa'i 
[\[214a.5\]]smon lam byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis phan yon bsngags par mdzad do/_/de bzhin yan lag thams cad ldan/_/mi yi byang chub nges pa dang /_/'khor ba yun ring gzhi med pa/_/bskal pa bye ba brgya nyid dam/_/mnar med du ni mi skye'o/_/de bzhin du ni 'jig rten par/_/bkres skom sred dang 
[\[214a.6\]]'bar ba dang /_/yan lag thams cad mi 'chad 'gyur/_/srog chags phra mor mi 'gyur zhing /_/ngan 'gro rnams su skye mi 'gyur/_/mi ru skyes par gyur pa na/_/de ni dmus long mi 'gyur zhing /_/'on par yang ni mi 'gyur la/_/lkugs dang gzhogs phyed na mi 'gyur/_/bud med du ni skye mi 'gyur/_/za ma 
[\[214a.7\]]ma ning mtshan gnyis dang /_/mtha' 'khob tu ni skye mi 'gyur/_/mi yi byang chub nges pa yin/_/mtshams med pa las grol ba dang /_/dag pa'i spyod yul thams cad du/_/log pa'i lta ba mi brten no/_/las kyi bya ba mthong ba dang /_/mtho ris la ni gnas nas su/_/'du shes med par skye 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]mi 'gyur/_/gtsang ma ris kyi lha rnams su/_/sgyu dang ming ni skye ba med/_/skyes bu dam pa nges 'byung sems/_/dngos dang dngos med ldan pa med/_/gang zhig 'jig rten don du 'gro/_/pha rol phyin kun rdzogs par byed/_/phan yon de rnams lhag par thob pa'am des pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[214b.2\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/grags pa dang ldan pa'i bram ze'i dus su dang /_dung gi bram ze'i dus su dang /_nor rgyal gyi rgyal po'i dus su dang /_blta na sdug chen po'i rgyal po'i dus su dang /_khyab 'jug chen po'i dus su dang /_rgyu mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dus su dang /_zla ba gzhon nu'i dus 
[\[214b.3\]]su dang /_yul gyi mchog gi dus su dang /_shi bi pa'i rgyal po'i dus su dang /_thams cad sgrol gyi dus su ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid de tshad med pa zhes bya'o/_/mtha' gcig tu yang dang yang byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa ri bong gi skyes rabs 
[\[214b.4\]]las/_nyer 'ongs slong ba mthong ba na/_/rang gi lus ni yongs su btang /_/bdag gi sbyin la mnyam pa med/_/'di rnams sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin/_/de ltar lus yongs su gtong bar byed pas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya 
[\[214b.5\]]ba skyes so/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i klu'i rgyal po'i dus su dang /_tsam po spya'i klu'i rgyal po'i dus su dang /_sa sbyin klu'i rgyal po'i dus su dang /_mche ba drug pa'i glang po'i rgyal po'i dus su dang /_rgyal ba dang mtshungs pa'i rgyal po'i bu zhum pa med pa'i 
[\[214b.6\]]dgra gzhon nu'i dus su ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par skyes pa la tshad med do/_/mtha' gcig tu gzhan yang /_de yi dung skyong skyes rabs las/_gsal shing gis ni phug nas ni/_/mtshon cha blangs nas rdeg pa dang /_/grong dpon bu la khro mi byed/_/
[\[214b.7\]]tshul khrims phar phyin bdag gi 'di/_/de bzhin du lus yongs su gtong bar byed pa ni/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so/_/de bzhin du yid [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gzhon nu'i dus su dang /_glang chen nor skyong gzhon nu'i dus su dang /_
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]lcags khyim mkhas pa'i dus su ni/_rgyal srid chen po spangs nas nges par 'byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag nyid la skyes pa ni tshad med do/_/gzhan yang mtha' gcig tu de'i bu zhi ba chung ngu'i skyes rabs las/_rgyal po chen po lag tu thob/_/mchil ma'i dbu ba bzhin 
[\[215a.2\]]du spangs/_/rgyal srid spangs kyang zhen pa med/_/bdag gi nges 'byung phar phyin 'di/_/de bzhin du nges par bdag gi rgyal srid spangs nas nges par 'byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so/_/de bzhin du mkhas pa bi d+hu ra'i dus su 
[\[215a.3\]]dang /_mkhas pa khyab 'jug chen po'i dus su dang /_mkhas pa tog tse pa'i dus su dang /_mkhas pa a ra'i dus su dang /_kun du rgyu byang chub kyi dus su dang /_mkhas pa sman chen po'i dus su ni/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par bdag la skyes pa la 
[\[215a.4\]]tshad med do/_/gzhan yang mtha' gcig tu de'i sde snod kyi skyes rabs las/_mkhas pa sde can gyi dus su/_bdag gis shes rab tshol ba na/_/bram ze'i sdug bsngal grol ba dang /_/bdag gi shes rab mtshungs pa med/_/bdag gi shes rab phar phyin 'di/_/pha tshi'i 
[\[215a.5\]]nang gi sbrul bdag gis blta ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so/_/de bzhin du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par bdag la skyes pa tshad med do/_/gzhan yang mtha' gcig tu de'i skye bo chen po can gyi skyes rabs 
[\[215a.6\]]las/_/ngogs ma mthong ba'i rgya mtsho'i dbus/_/mi rnams thams cad shi bar gyur/_/sdug bsngal med pa'i sems kyis ni/_/bdag gi brtson 'grus phar phyin 'di/_/rgya mtsho chen po las sgrol bar byed pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so/_/
[\[215a.7\]]bzod par smra ba'i skye rabs las/_sems med pa la gcod pa bzhin/_/bdag la rno ba'i dgra sta yis/_/gsal ldan rgyal po la mi khro/_/bdag gi bzod pa'i phar phyin 'di/_/de ltar sems med pa'i dngos po bzhin du bdag sdug bsngal chen po la lhag par gnas pa ni bzod 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so/_/bu zhi ba chen po'i skyes rabs las/_bden pa'i tshig ni rjes su bsrung /_/bdag gi srog ni spangs nas su/_/rgyal rigs brgya phrag grol bar byas/_/bdag gi bden pa'i phar phyin 'di/_/
[\[215b.2\]]de ltar srog spangs nas bden pa rjes su bsrung ba de ni bden pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so/_/lkugs pa dang gzhogs phyed na ba'i tshul gyi skyes rabs las/_pha ma bdag la mi dgos shing /_/nor dang grags pa'ang dgos pa 
[\[215b.3\]]med/_/bdag ni thams cad mkhyen la dga'/_/de phyir brtul zhugs gnas pa'o/_/de ltar srog gi 'dod pa yongs su btang nas brtul zhugs la lhag par gnas pa ni/_lhag par gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so/_/
[\[215b.4\]]rgyal po gcig gi skyes rabs las/_gang zhig bdag la skrag byed med/_/bdag gis gang la'ang 'jigs ma byas/_/byams pa'i stobs kyi steng gnas zhing /_/de tshe stong pa nyid la dga'/_/de ltar srog yongs su gtong ba la mi blta zhing byams par byed pa de'i byams pa 
[\[215b.5\]]ni pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so/_/ngang pa'i spu yi skye rabs las/_dur khrod du ni gnas par sems/_/rus gong la ni brten byas nas/_/bdag gi gnas su nye bar 'ongs/_/gzugs la lta ba nyung ba med/_/de ltar grong gi khye'u la rdo la sogs pa 
[\[215b.6\]]blangs nas rdung ba nyid dang /_me tog phreng ba dang /_spos kyis nye bar spyod pa la sogs pas bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal bskyed kyang btang snyoms su 'dor ba de ni btang snyoms kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_don dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba skyes so/_/de rnams 'dir mdor bsdus pa'o/_/rgya cher yang 
[\[215b.7\]]slar 'di'i don spyod pa'i sde snod las blang bar bya'o/_/de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs nas thams cad sgrol gyi bdag nyid du gnas so/_/sems med pa yi sa gzhi yis/_/bde dang sdug bsngal mi shes kyang /_/bdag gi sbyin pa'i stobs de yis/_/lan bdun du ni rab tu g.yos/_de ltar sa gzhi chen po g.yo 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]ba la sogs pa bsod nams chen po byed cing tshe'i mthar shi 'phos te dga' ldan du skyes so zhes pa mar me mdzad kyi zhabs drung nas bzung ste ji srid dga' ldan du skyes pa de rnams kyi bar ni ring po'i gzhi zhes bya bar rig par bya'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[216a.2\]]dpa' dga' ldan du bzhugs pa nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi sgra cher sgrogs pa zhes bya ba skyes pa na 'jig rten 'dir sgra cher sgrogs pa gsum byung ste/_bskal pa'i sgra cher sgrogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sgra cher sgrogs pa dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i sgra cher sgrogs pa'o/_/de 
[\[216a.3\]]la lo 'bum phrag gcig gi mthar bskal pa 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes pa 'jig rten gyi ming du brjod pa ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha mgo g.yogs kyis ma bsgribs pa dang /_skra grol ba dang /_ngu ba'i kha can lag pas mig gi mchi ma 'phyi ba gos dmar po gyon pa lhag par gzugs 
[\[216a.4\]]mi sdug pa'i cha byad 'dzin par gyur pa'i mi rnams lam la 'gro zhing 'di ltar brjod do/_/'jig rten pa 'di nas lo 'bum phrag gcig 'das nas bskal pa 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/'di yi 'jig rten rnams 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtsho chen po yang bskams par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[216a.5\]]sa gzhi chen po 'di dang ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang thal bar 'gyur cing 'jig go/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'jig rten 'jig par 'gyur ro zhes brjod do/_/'jig rten pa rnams byams pa sgoms shig_/snying rje sgoms shig_/dga' ba sgoms shig_/btang snyoms sgoms 
[\[216a.6\]]shig_/ma la rim gro gyis shig_/pha la rim gro gyis shig_/rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro gyis shig ces pa 'di ni bskal pa'i sgra cher sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'o/_/lo stong phrag gcig 'das nas slar yang sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa 'jig rten du byon no zhes brjod pa 
[\[216a.7\]]'di 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams 'di nas 'jig rten pa rnams lo stong phrag gcig 'das nas gzhan yang sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byon no zhes rjod cing sgra cher sgrogs pas rgyu ba 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi sgra cher sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/gzhan yang lo brgya 'das nas 'khor 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byon no zhes brjod pa ni lha nyid de/_'jig rten pa rnams lo brgya 'das nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du byon zhes sgra cher rjod cing rgyu ba 'di ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i sgra cher sgrogs pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/gsum po 'di ni sgra cher sgrogs pa yin 
[\[216b.2\]]no/_/de rnams las sangs rgyas kyi sgra cher sgrogs pa thos nas stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi lha thams cad gnas gcig tu 'dus te/_che ge mo zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar rtogs nas zhu ba'i phyir nye bar song ste/_zhus nas kyang sngar gyi mtshan ma 
[\[216b.3\]]skyes pa la zhus so/_/de'i tshe slar yang thams cad kyi re re'i khor yug gi rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris dang /_brgya byin dang 'thab bral dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_tshangs pa chen po dang bcas pa'i lha dang /_khor yug gi lha rnams 'dus 
[\[216b.4\]]pa'o/_/dga' ldan gyi gnas su byang chub sems dpa'i drung du song ste/_drang srong chen po khyod kyis pha rol du phyin pa bcu rdzogs pa ni brgya byin gyi phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/_bdud kyi phyir ma yin/_tshangs pa'i phyir don du gnyer ba rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ma yin 
[\[216b.5\]]'khor los sgyur ba'i phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir don du gnyer ba rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ma yin no/_/gzhan yang 'jig rten bsgral ba'i phyir dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa don du gnyer ba'i phyir rdzogs par byed do/_/de rnams ni da lta'i dus nas drang srong chen po sangs rgyas 
[\[216b.6\]]su 'gyur ba'i dus ni drang srong chen po sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhes zhus so/_/sems dpa' chen po lha la gnang ba ma byin te/_dus dang gling dang yul dang rigs dang yum dang /_tshe dang tshe'i bye brag lhag ma las med do/_/chen po lnga po zhes bya ba legs par gzigs shing gzigs 
[\[216b.7\]]so/_/de la dus dang dus ma yin pa zhes bya ba ste/_dang po dus la gzigs so/_/de la lo 'bum phrag gcig gi thog ma nas 'phel ba ni tshe'i dus dang dus ma yin pa'o/_/gang gi phyir de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi skye ba dang rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba rnams la gzigs so/_/
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos ston pa ni mtshan nyid lnga spangs nas gzhan pa ni med do/_/de rnams ni mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_bdag med pa ston cing 'di rnams ci'i phyir 'chad pa nyid mi nyan pa dang mi dad pa dang mi sems pa'o/_/de ni dus ma yin 
[\[217a.2\]]no/_/de'i phyir mi sems pa dang ma nges pa'i bstan pa yin no/_/de'i phyir de ni dus ma yin pa'o/_/lo brgya pa dman pas tshe'i dus kyang de'i dus ma yin no/_/gang gi phyir de'i tshe sems can nyon mongs pa shin tu che ba yin no/_/nyon mongs pa shin tu che bas gdams pa byin no/_/
[\[217a.3\]]gdams pa la mi gnas na chu la dbyug pa rgyab pa'i ri mo bzhin myur du 'gag go/_/de'i phyir de yang dus ma yin pa'o/_/lo 'bum phrag gcig nas bzung ba'i 'og tu lo brgya ba'i mgor tshe'i dus te dus zhes bya ba yin no/_/de'i tshe yang lo brgya pa yin no/_/de nas sems dpa' 
[\[217a.4\]]chen po skye bar rigs so zhes dus la gzigs so/_/de nas gling la gzigs te gling bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa la gzigs nas gling gsum po rnams su sangs rgyas mi 'byon no/_/'dzam bu'i gling nyid du 'byon no/_/gling la gzigs pa'o/_/de nas 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya ba 
[\[217a.5\]]dpag tshad stong phrag bcu'i tshad kyis che ba'o/_/yul gyi phyogs gang zhig tu sangs rgyas 'byon par 'gyur zhes yangs shing grol ba'i gnas blta zhing yul dbus la gzigs te yul dbus zhes bya ba ni shar gyi phyogs na ka dzaM ga la zhes bya ba'i grong rdal lo/_/de'i pha rol na shing sA 
[\[217a.6\]]la chen po'o/_/de nas gzhan yang bas mtha'i ljongs nye ba'i nang ngo /_/shar lho'i mtshams su sA la can zhes bya ba'i chu klung ngo /_/de nas gzhan yang bas mtha'i ljongs dang nye ba'i nang ngo /_/lho phyogs su sau ta kar Ni ka zhes bya ba'i grong rdal lo/_/de nas gzhan yang bas mtha'i ljongs 
[\[217a.7\]]dang nye ba'i nang ngo /_/nub phyogs ka pa zhes bya ba bram ze'i grong rdal lo/_/de nas gzhan yang bas mtha'i ljongs dang nye ba'i nang ngo /_/byang gi phyogs u shi ra'i ri'o/_/de nas gzhan yang bas mtha'i ljongs dang nye ba'i nang ngo /_/'di ltar 'dul bar bshad cing bstan no/_/dkyus su 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]dpag tshad sum brgya'o/_/zheng du dpag tshad phyed dang sum brgya'o/_/mtha' bskor la dpag tshad dgu brgya'o/_/yul phyogs de rnams su ni sangs rgyas dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang nyan thos mchog rnams dang /_nyan thos chen po brgyad cu dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /_
[\[217b.2\]]gzhan yang skyes bu chen por grags pa'i rigs dang /_bram ze'i rigs dang /_shing sA la chen po lta bu'i khyim bdag rnams 'khrungs pa'i gnas so/_/de rnams las grong khyer ser skya zhes bya ba 'di'o/_/der bdag 'khrung bar rigs so zhes thugs kyis nges par byas so/_/de 
[\[217b.3\]]nas rigs la gzigs pa zhes bya ba ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba rje'u'i rigs sam/_gdol pa'i rigs la mi 'khrung ngo /_/slar yang 'jig rten pa mos pa'i rgyal rigs sam bram ze'i rigs gnyis la 'khrung ngo /_/da lta ni rgyal rigs la 'jig rten pa sems so/_/de la 'khrung ngo /_/
[\[217b.4\]]bdag gi yab ni zas gtsang ma zhes bya ba'i rgyal po yin te rigs la gzigs so/_/de nas yum la gzigs te 'dod pa dang chang la dga' ba ni sangs rgyas kyi yum zhes bya ba ma yin no/_/gzhan yang bskal pa 'bum phrag gcig la pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs par byas nas 'khrung ngo /_/
[\[217b.5\]]nyams pa med pa'i tshul khrims lnga po nyid len no/_/lha mo sgyu 'phrul chen mo zhes bya ba 'di de dang 'dra ba bdag gi yum yin no/_/gzhan yang gang de tsam gyi tshe'o/_/zla ba bcu'i mgo nas zhag bdun du gzigs so/_/'di ni chen po lnga la gzigs so/_/gzigs nas drang srong chen 
[\[217b.6\]]po bdag gi dus te sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i lha rnams kyis tshig gis gnang ngo /_/khyed rnams gshegs par zhu zhes lha de rnams btang nas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis yongs su bskor te/_dga' ldan gyi dga' ba'i tshal du zhugs so/_/'jig rten gyi lha thams cad 
[\[217b.7\]]dga' ba'i tshal na yod pa nyid do/_/de la 'di'i lha 'di nas shi 'phos nas bde ba'i 'gro bar skyes te 'di nas shi 'phos nas bde ba'i 'gro bar skyes so/_/sngar byas pa'i dge ba'i las byas pa rjes su dran zhing rgyu'o/_/de de ltar lha rnams kyis dge ba rjes su dran pa rnams 'khor 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]du byas shing der rgyu'o/_/shi 'phos nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma chen mo'i mngal du zhugs so/_/de la legs par brjod pa'i phyir 'di [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du sngon gyi gtam brjod do/_/de'i tshe grong khyer ser skyar dbyar zla 'bring po'i rgyu skar du brjod par skye bo thams cad rgyu skar la rtse zhing lha mo sgyu 
[\[218a.2\]]'phrul chen po yang nya'i sngun du zhag bdun nas me tog gi phreng ba dang spos kyi 'byor pa dang ldan pas rgyu skar la rtse zhing longs spyod do/_/zhag bdun gyi mthar snga dro langs nas dri bzang gi chus khrus byas te/_'bum phrag bzhi'i longs spyod spel te sbyin pa chen po btang nas rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan/_kha zas bzang 
[\[218a.3\]]po zos te/_gso sbyong yan lag brgyad pa la gnas so/_/rgyan du byed pa la rigs pa'i dpal gyi khang pa'i nang du zhugs nas dpal gyi mal cha la nyal te gnyid du song nas 'di lta bu'i rmi lam mthong ngo /_/rgyal po chen po bzhi pos mal stan dang bcas pa nyid blangs nas gangs can gyi nang du song ngo /_/dpag 
[\[218a.4\]]tshad drug cu pa'i man shi la'i steng du dang dpag tshad bdun pa'i shing sA la chen po'i 'og tu bzhag nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas de'i lha mo 'ongs nas lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma chen mo mtsho ma dros par khrid do/_/mi'i dri ma bsal ba'i phyir khrus byas te/_lha'i gos gyon nas dri bzang pos byug 
[\[218a.5\]]cing lha'i me tog 'dogs so/_/de nas mi ring bar dngul gyi ri de'i nang na gser gyi gzhal yas khang 'dug go/_/der shar du mgo bstan pa'i lha'i mal cha la der nyol zhes zer nas nyal lo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' glang po che dkar po cig tu gyur to/_/de nas mi ring bar gser gyi ri cig la der 
[\[218a.6\]]'dzeg cing de nas mar babs nas/_dngul gyi ri la 'dzeg go/_/byang gi phyogs nas 'ongs te/_dngul gyi phreng ba dang mtshungs pa'i glang po che'i snas pad ma dkar po 'dzin cing /_glang po che'i sgra sgrogs pas gser gyi gzhal yas khang du zhugs te/_rang gi mal cha la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas 
[\[218a.7\]]glo g.yas pa phug nas ltor zhugs pa bzhin du gyur to/_/de ltar bre'i skar ma mchog la lhums su zhugs so/_/nyi ma gnyis pa la de'i snga dro sad de lha mos rgyal po la rmi lam rnams smras so/_/rgyal pos bram ze drug cu rtsa bzhi bos nas me tog phreng ba la sogs pa dang /_bkra shis dang bsti stang 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]byed cing sa la mal stan chen po bshams te de la bzhugs pa'i bram ze rnams la mar gsar dang sbrang rtsi dang ka ra rnams dang bsres pa'i 'o thug rnams gser dang dngul las byas pa'i sder ma bkang ste gser dang dngul gyi sder mas so sor bkab nas bram ze rnams la phul lo/_/gzhan yang rgyal po gyon 
[\[218b.2\]]pa dang mtshungs pa'i gos dang gser rgya ma la sogs pa byin nas de rnams tshim par byas so/_/de nas de thams cad 'dod pa thams cad kyis tshim par gyur nas rmi lam bshad de ci 'dra bar 'gyur zhes dris so/_/bram ze rnams kyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po 'jigs par ma byed cig_/khyod kyi lha mo'i 
[\[218b.3\]]lto'i nang du sems can zhugs te/_de yang nang gi de skyes bu'o/_/mngal gyi nang gi de bu mo ni ma yin no/_/de khyed kyi sras por 'gyur ro/_/de gal te khyim na gnas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/gal te khyim spangs nas rab tu byung na sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten du bzlog 
[\[218b.4\]]nas slar khyim na gnas nas skye ba med do/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi mngal du zhugs pa de ma thag tu thun gcig nyid la stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yang dag par g.yos so/_/yang dag par rab tu g.yos so/_/yang dag par sgra sgrogs so/_/mtshan ma sum 
[\[218b.5\]]cu rtsa gnyis sngon gyi mtshan mar gyur to/_/stong phrag bcu'i khor yug rnams su snang ba tshad med par khyab cing gnas so/_/de yang de'i dpal blta ba 'di lta bu ste long ba rnams kyis mig thob bo/_/'on pa rnams kyis rna bas sgra thos so/_/lkugs pa rnams kyis smra shes so/_/sgur po rnams drang por 
[\[218b.6\]]gyur to/_/gong po rnams kyis 'gro shes par gyur to/_/bcings pa'i sems can thams cad ni rjes su bcings pa las grol bar gyur to/_/dmyal ba thams cad kyi me zhi bar gyur to/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul pa rnams bkres pa dang skom pa zhi bar gyur to/_/dud 'gro rnams phan tshun 'jigs pa med 
[\[218b.7\]]par gyur to/_/sems can thams cad kyi nad zhi bar gyur to/_/sems can thams cad dga' bzhin du smra bar gyur to/_/rta rnams skad snyan pa'i rnam par gyur to/_/glang po rnams ni sgra sgrogs so/_/rol mo rnams rang byung gi sgra sgrogs so/_/mi rnams kyi rkang pa dang lag pa'i rgyan rang 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]rang ma reg par so sor 'byin to/_/phyogs thams cad rab tu dngas par gyur to/_/sems can rnams bde ba bskyed pa'i phyir rlung 'jam po ldang bar gyur to/_/dus ma yin par sprin la char 'bab bo/_/sa la chu byung nas phyogs thams cad chur gyur to/_/bya rnams nam mkha' la 'gro ba spong ngo /_/
[\[219a.2\]]chu klung rnams 'gro ba med par gnas so/_/rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ni dngar bar gyur to/_/gnas thams cad nyid du kha dog lnga pa'i pad mas sa'i steng thams cad khyab par gyur to/_/thang dang chu las skyes pa'i me tog rnams kha bye bar gyur to/_/ljon shing rnams kyi sdong po la sdong po'i pad ma'i me tog go/_/yal 
[\[219a.3\]]ga rnams la yal ga'i pad ma'i me tog go/_/'khri shing rnams la 'khri shing gi pad ma'i me tog kha bye'o/_/thang dang rdo'i steng du brtol nas steng nas steng du bdun bdun du gyur nas dan dra pad ma zhes bya ba phyung ngo /_/nam mkha' nas thur du pad ma 'phyang ngo /_/thams cad du me tog gi char 'bab bo/_/nam 
[\[219a.4\]]mkha' la lha'i rol mo'i sgra sgrogs so/_/stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad me tog dang bdug spos dang dri chab mchog tu skal ba bzang bar gyur to/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' mngal du zhugs pa nyid nas byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyi nye bar 'tshe ba 
[\[219a.5\]]bzlog pa'i phyir ral gri lag tu thogs pa'i lha'i bu bzhis srung bar byed do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yum ni skyes pa la 'dod chags mi skye zhing /_rnyed pa dang grags pa thob par gyur to/_/skyid pa sku la dub pa med par byang chub sems dpa' de yang rum du zhugs nas/_nor bu rin po che rab tu 
[\[219a.6\]]dngas pa srad bu dmar po la brgyus pa bzhin du mthong ngo /_/gang gi phyir yang byang chub sems dpa' zhugs pa'i rum zhes bya ba ni mchod rten gyi nang bzhin du sems can gzhan gyis reg pa dang longs spyod par mi nus so/_/de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i yum byang chub sems dpa' 'khrungs nas zhag 
[\[219a.7\]]bdun nas dus las 'das nas dga' ldan du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar yang bud med gzhan zla ba bcu las dman pa'am/_lhag pa'am/_'dug pa'am/_nyal nas skye'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i yum ni de lta bu ma yin te/_de yang byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur rum du bsrungs 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]nas 'greng ba la skye'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i yum thams cad kyi chos nyid do/_/lha mo sgyu 'phrul ma chen mo yang snod kyi nang gi 'bru mar bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcur rum du 'tsho zhing rum yongs su rdzogs nas gnyen gyi grong du 'gro'o zhes rgyal po chen po zas gtsang gi drung 
[\[219b.2\]]du smras so/_/lha rigs kyi rgyud kyi grong khyer chen po lha bstan du bdag 'gro bar 'dod do/_/rgyal pos legs so zhes brjod nas gnang ngo /_/ser skya'i gzhi dang /_grong khyer lha bstan gnyis kyi bar gyi lam mtshungs par byas nas/_chu shing dang /_bum pa gang ba dang /_rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la 
[\[219b.3\]]sogs pa'i rgyan 'dzugs su bcug nas lha mo gser gyi do li la bzhugs te/_blon po stong phrag gcig gis bteg ste 'khor mang po dang bcas pa btang ngo /_/grong khyer gnyis kyi bar du yang gnyis ka'i grong khyer pa gnas pa'i lum+bi nI'i tshal zhes bya ba la bkra shis pa'i shing sA la'i shing yod do/_/de'i dus 
[\[219b.4\]]su rtsa ba nas rtse mo'i yal ga'i bar thams cad du bar ma chad par me tog kha bye bar gyur to/_/yal ga'i bar nyid dang /_me tog gi bar kha dog sna lnga pa'i bung ba mang po lding ba dang /_rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bya mang po'i tshogs ni snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs sgrogs shing spyod do/_/lum+bi nI'i tshal thams cad ni shing 
[\[219b.5\]]rta sna tshogs pa'i tshal bzhin du mthu dang dbang phyug ni rgyal po'i mdzes par byas pa'i 'dun sa lta bu de lha mos gzigs nas shing sA la'i tshal du rtse bar bsams pa skyes so/_/blon po rnams kyis lha mo bteg nas shing sA la'i tshal du bzhugs so/_/de bkra shis pa'i shing sA la'i rtsa bar gshegs pa 
[\[219b.6\]]te des shing sA la'i yal ga gzung bar sems par gyur te/_des shing sA la'i yal ga shin tu legs pa me la bsros nas bkug pa bzhin du mdud pa la lha mo'i lag par nye bar 'phyang ngo /_/de'i lag pa brkyang nas yal ga'i rtse mo bzung ngo /_/de ma thag tu las kyi rlung gis bskyod do/_/de nas de'i 
[\[219b.7\]]phyogs kun du yol ba byas nas skye bo thams cad phyir ring du gyur te shing sA la'i yal ga bzung nas 'dug pa nyid la de ltar de'i mngal nas bltams par gyur to/_/de ma thag rnam par dag pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i tshangs pa bzhi pos gser gyi dra ba blangs nas sleb bo/_/de rnams kyis der 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]gser gyi dra bas byang chub sems dpa' blangs te yum gyi mdun na 'dug go/_/lha mo sems sdug bsngal bar ma byed cig_/khyed kyi sras dbang phyug dang grags pa dang bcas pa bltams so zhes smras so/_/de ltar yang sems can gzhan rnams ma'i rum nas 'thon pa na mi gtsang bas 
[\[220a.2\]]gos shing skyug bro ba can 'thon no/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni de lta bu ma yin no/_/gzhan yang chos kyi khri nas chos 'chad pa 'bab pa bzhin dang skas la 'bab pa'i skyes bu bzhin du lag pa gnyis dang rkang pa gnyis brkyang nas 'dug pa nyid bzhin no/_/ma'i rum nas mi gtsang ba cung zad kyis kyang ma gos 
[\[220a.3\]]par dag cing 'jigs pa med pa bzhin no/_/yul ka shi ka'i ras kyi nang du nor bu rin po che bcug pa bzhin du 'od 'gyed cing yum gyi rum nas 'thon no/_/de ltar gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dang byang chub sems dpa'i yum de dag par bya ba'i phyir nam mkha' nas chu'i rgyun gnyis babs pas byang 
[\[220a.4\]]chub sems dpa' dang yum gyi sku dag par byas so/_/de yang gser gyi dra bas blangs nas tshangs pa 'dug pa'i lag nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis bkra shis pa dang /_bde ba la reg par gnas par bya ba'i phyir gzig gi pags pas sngar gyi bzhin du blangs so/_/de rnams kyi lag nas mi 
[\[220a.5\]]rnams kyis du gu la'i ras kyi steng du blangs so/_/mi rnams kyi lag tu btang nas sa la gnas so/_/shar phyogs la gzigs te stong phrag du ma'i khor yug rnams phan tshun du mthong ngo /_/de'i lha dang mi rnams kyis me tog gi phreng ba dang spos la sogs pas mchod cing skyes bu chen po khyod lta 
[\[220a.6\]]bu 'di na med khyod kyi gong na gzhan su yang med do zhes smras so/_/de bzhin du phyogs bzhi dang mtshams bzhi dang 'og dang steng ste phyogs bcu po thams cad legs par gzigs nas bdag dang mtshungs pa med par mthong ngo /_/de nas byang gi phyogs su gom pa bdun bgrod do/_/tshangs pa chen po'i gdugs 
[\[220a.7\]]dkar po 'dzin cing 'thab bral bas rnga yab g.yob pa/_lha gzhan rnams kyis rgyal po la nye bar mkho ba'i dngos po ma lus pa lag tu thogs nas rjes su 'gro'o/_/de nas gom pa bdun pa la gnas pa na 'jig rten pa rnams las bdag mchog go zhes pa la sogs pa'i shis pa brjod pa'i gtam brjod cing /_
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang skye ba gsum du rum nas 'thon tsam na gtam du brjod do/_/sman chen por skyes pa dang thams cad sgrol du skyes pa dang 'dir skyes pa'o/_/sman chen po skyes pa na yum gyi rum nas 'thon ma thag nyid du brgya byin lha'i rgyal po 'ongs te tsan dan gyi snying po 
[\[220b.2\]]lag tu thogs nas song ngo /_/de de rnams kyi khu tshur du bcug nas 'thon no/_/de nas yang yum gyis dris pa/_bu ci khyer nas 'ongs/_ma sman yin no/_/'dis sman khyer nas 'ongs pa'i phyir sman gyi khye'u zhes bya bar ming btags so/_/des sman blangs nas chu'i snod kyi nang du bcug go/_/'ongs 
[\[220b.3\]]shing 'ongs pa'i long ba dang 'on pa la sogs pa de rnams de nyid kyis nad thams cad nye bar zhi bas na sman par gyur to/_/de nas sman chen po sman chen po zhes brjod cing skyes pa'i tshig gi rgyus sman chen po nyid de'i ming du gyur to/_/gzhan yang thams cad sgrol du skyes pa na ma'i rum nas skyes tsam na 
[\[220b.4\]]lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas yum bdag cag gi khyim na sbyin pa btang rgyu 'dra bdog ge zhes brjod cing 'thon no/_/de nas de'i mas/_bu 'byor pa dang ldan pa'i rigs su khyod skyes so/_/bu'i lag pa rang gi lag pa'i steng du bzhag ste nor bu rin po che stong phrag gcig gi snod bzhag go/_/gzhan yang 'di skyes 
[\[220b.5\]]pa na 'dis seng ge'i sgra sgrogs so/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gsum du ma'i rum nas skyes tsam nas gtam brjod do/_/ji ltar yang rum du zhugs tsam dang bltams tsam na sum cu rtsa gnyis sngon gyi mtshan ma bzhin du skyes par gyur to/_/gzhan yang gang gi tshe bdag cag gi byang 
[\[220b.6\]]chub sems dpa' lum+bi nI'i tshal du bltams so/_/de ma thag tu lha mo sgra gcan 'dzin gyi ma dang /_blon po 'dun pa dang /_blon po nag po 'char ka dang /_rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan dang /_byang chub kyi shing dang /_gter bzhi'i bum pa skyes so/_/de la gcig la rgyang grags bzhi dang /_
[\[220b.7\]]gcig la rgyang grags brgyad dang /_gcig la rgyang grags bcu gnyis dang /_gcig la rgyang grags bcu drug go/_/bdun po 'di lhan cig tu skyes pa yin no/_/grong khyer gnyis na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' khrid nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi kho nar phyin no/_/nyi ma de nyid 
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]la grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi la rgyal po chen po zas gtsang gi sras por bltams so/_/gzhon nu 'di byang chub shing gi drung du bzhugs nas sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes pa la sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas kyi lha rnams kyis dga' ba dang tshim pas lag pa gyen du bskyod nas rtse zhing bstod 
[\[221a.2\]]pa byed do/_/de'i tshe rgyal po chen po zas gtsang gi mchod gnas snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad thob pa'i dka' thub pa nag po lha len zhes bya ba kha zas bzang po la longs spyod do/_/nyin mo nyi ma la mi gnas pa'i phyir sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su 'gro zhing der bde bar 'dug nas lha de rnams blta'o/_/
[\[221a.3\]]khyed rnams ci'i phyir 'di ltar dga' ba'i sems kyis rtse/_bdag kyang 'di rnams kyi ched du bya ba kho bo la ston cig ces dris so/_/lha rnams kyis smras pa/_drang srong chen po rgyal po chen po zas gtsang gi sras bltams so/_/des byang chub shing gi drung du bzhugs nas sangs rgyas su gyur nas 
[\[221a.4\]]chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/de nas mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rol mo blta ba dang /_chos thams cad thob bo snyam pa 'di rnams kyi rgyu mtshan gyis dga' bar gyur to/_/dka' thub pas de'i tshig thos nas myur du lha'i yul nas babs te rgyal po'i gnas su 'ongs nas/_gdan bshams pa la 'dug 
[\[221a.5\]]ste/_bu rnams rgyal po chen po'i sras su gyur pa de bdag gis blta'o zhes smras so/_/rgyal pos rgyan dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu blangs nas dka' thub pa la phyag bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs kyis bskor nas dka' thub pa'i ral pa'i steng na 'dug go/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang de rnams kyi lus 
[\[221a.6\]]kyis phyag byed par rig pa gzhan med do/_/gal te mi shes pas byang chub sems dpa'i dbu la dka' thub pa'i rkang pa bzhag na de'i mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas par 'gyur ro/_/dka' thub pas bdag nyams pa'i phyir du rigs pa ma yin no/_/stan las langs nas byang chub sems dpa' la thal mo sbyar ro/_/
[\[221a.7\]]rgyal pos ya mtshan che ba gzigs nas rang gi sras la phyag byas so/_/dka' thub pas 'das pa'i bskal pa bzhi bcu dang ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa bzhi bcu ste/_bskal pa brgyad cu rjes su dran no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan nyid phun sum tshogs pa mthong nas sangs rgya bar 'gyur ram mi 'gyur 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]zhes brtags pas the tshom med par sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar rtogs te/_'di ya mtshan che ba'i skyes bu yin no zhes bsams nas bgad do/_/de nas 'di nas sangs rgyas nas bdag gis mthong ngam mi mthong zhes brtags pas mi mthong ngo /_/bar du dus las 'das nas sangs rgyas brgya 'am sangs rgyas stong gshegs 
[\[221b.2\]]nas brtag par mi nus pa'i gzugs med pa'i gnas su skye bar nges par mthong ngo /_/'di lta bu'i tshul gyi ya mtshan che ba'i skyes bu mthong bar mi nus so snyam ste bdag gi sems shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur nas ngus so/_/de mi rnams kyis mthong ste/_bdag cag gi 'phags pa res 'ga' ni dgod res 'ga' ni 
[\[221b.3\]]ngu ba'i rgyu mtshan ci lags/_bdag cag gi sras 'phags pa la bar du gcod pa 'ong ngam zhes dris so/_/'di la bar du gcod pa mi 'byung zhing the tshom med par sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/'o na gang gi phyir ngu zhes dris so/_/'di lta bu'i tshul gyis skyes bu sangs rgya bar 'gyur ba bdag 
[\[221b.4\]]gis mthong bar mi 'gyur bas bdag shin tu nges par sdug bsngal lo/_/de'i phyir rang gi ched du mya ngan gyis ngu'o zhes smras so/_/des na ci'i phyir rang gi nye du rnams las 'ga' zhig gis 'di sangs rgyas su gyur nas mthong bar 'gyur ram mi 'gyur zhes brtags pas tsha bo nA la ka'i gzhon nus mthong ngo /_/
[\[221b.5\]]de sring mo'i khang par song ste/_nA la ka gzhon nu de gang na yod/_'phags pa khang pa na yod do/_/de bos la shog_/de rang gi gnas su 'ongs nas nA la ka la smras so/_/tsha bo rgyal po chen po zas gtsang gi rigs kyi bu 'khrungs so/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi myu gu'o/_/lo sum cu rtsa lnga 'das 
[\[221b.6\]]nas sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhing khyod kyis 'di mthong bar 'gyur bas da lta nyid du rab tu byung ba gyis shig ces smras so/_/bye ba brgyad cu rtsa bdun gyi nor gyi rigs la skyes pa'i gzhon nus zhang po 'dis bdag la don med cing dgos pa med do zhes brjod par bsams so/_/de ma thag tu rang gi tshong gnas 
[\[221b.7\]]su ngur smrig gi gos nyid dang sa'i lhung bzed blangs nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/_ngur smrig gi gos gyon nas gang zhig 'jig rten pa'i gang zag gi mchog gi mchog la bsams shing bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bsams te byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs su thal mo sbyar nas yan lag lngas 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]phyag byed do/_/lhung bzed snod du bcug nas phrag pa la gzer te gangs can du gshegs nas dge sbyong gi chos byed do/_/des mchog tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du nye bar song ste/_nA la ka'i so so'i rtogs pa'i gtam thos nas slar yang gangs 
[\[222a.2\]]can du gshegs te dgra bcom pa thob bo/_/mchog tu rtogs dka' ba rtogs nas zla ba bdun nyid kyi nang du tshe 'das te gser gyi ri gcig la brten nas 'dug de lhag ma med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang zhag lnga nas 
[\[222a.3\]]dbu 'khru bar byed cing ming 'dogs par rigs so zhes bsams nas rgyal po'i pho brang la dri bzhi'i rigs kyis byug pa byas te/_rin po che lnga'i me tog gcal du bkram nas chu med pa'i 'o ma btsos pa'i 'o thug 'tshod cing rig byed gsum gyi pha rol tu son pa'i bram ze brgya rtsa brgyad mgron du gnyer te rgyal po'i pho 
[\[222a.4\]]brang du bzhugs nas kha zas bzang po la longs spyod cing bkur sti chen po byas nas mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhes dris so/_/de rnams las dga' byed dang /_rgyal mtshan dang mtshan nyid dang rigs kyi sngags pa dang /_kauN+Di n+ya dang lag pa can dang gshin rje bzang dang /_legs sbyin te de rnams de'i tshe bram ze brgyad yin 
[\[222a.5\]]no/_/yan lag drug gi sngags brda sprad nas bram ze brgyad po 'di lta bu nyid kyi mtshan nyid so sor brjod nas dga' ldan gnas nas ma'i mngal du zhugs pa'i mtshan nyid 'di rnams kyis bshad do/_/de rnams las bram ze bdun gyis mdzub mo gnyis bsgrengs te don gnyis lung bstan no/_/mtshan nyid 'di 
[\[222a.6\]]dang ldan pas khyim na gnas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro/_/rab tu byung na sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad bshad pa rdzogs nas gzhan de rnams kyi nang nas thams cad kyi gzhon shos kyi rigs ni kauN+Di n+ya bram ze'i khye'u'o zhes bya ba'o/_/byang 
[\[222a.7\]]chub sems dpa' de'i ming tshad mchog rnams rdzogs par btags so/_/'di ni khyim na gnas pa'i rgyu med pas mtha' gcig nyid du khyim na mi gnas par sangs rgya'o/_/mdzub mo gcig bsgrengs te 'di ltar lung bstan no/_/'di ni sngar gyi gzhi byas pas phyis mir gyur pa na shes rab dang ldan no/_/bram ze 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]bdun las lhag par gyur nas 'di'i mtshan nyid rig par ldan nas khyim du gnas pa'i ming yang med do/_/the tshom med par sangs rgya bar 'gyur te 'gro ba gcig las gzhan ma mthong ngo /_/de'i phyir mdzub mo gcig bsgrengs te 'di ltar lung bstan no/_/de nas bram ze de rnams rang gi khyim du 'gro zhing 
[\[222b.2\]]bu rnams bos te/_bu bdag cag rnams rgan por gyur pas rgyal po chen po zas gtsang gi sras thams cad mkhyen pa thob par gyur pa na bdag cag dang mjal bar 'gyur ram mi 'gyur cha med kyis/_khyod de'i sras kyis thams cad mkhyen pa thob par gyur nas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung cig ces smras so/_/
[\[222b.3\]]bram ze bdun po rnams kyis kyang ji srid tshe gnas kyi bar ji ltar byas pa'i las rtogs so/_/bram ze'i khye'u kauN+Di n+ya nyid nad med par gyur nas gnas so/_/de'i sems dpa' chen po blo dang ldan pa nges par 'byung ba chen pos mngon par byung nas [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du lteng rgyas su song ngo /_/sa phyogs 'di ni 
[\[222b.4\]]nyams dga' bas rigs kyi bus phyogs 'di dka' ba spyod pa'i gnas su rig par sems skyes pas der gnas te skyes bu chen po rab tu byung ngo zhes thos nas bram ze'i bu'i gnas su nye bar song ngo zhes smras so/_/gzhon nu don grub rab tu byung nas the tshom med par de sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te khyed 
[\[222b.5\]]rnams kyi pha nad med par gnas na de ring phyin nas rab tu byung ba byed do/_/gal te khyod kyang 'dod na 'dir 'ongs nas bdag gis skyes bu de'i rjes su rab tu 'byung bar bgyi'o/_/de thams cad 'dun pa gcig par ma nus par skye bo bzhi po las kauN+Di n+yas gtso bo byas nas skye bo lnga po rab tu byung ste/_de 
[\[222b.6\]]rnams kyi skye bo lnga po ni gnas brtan lnga sde zhes bya ba'i rigs su gyur to/_/gzhan yang de'i tshe rgyal po 'di skad du gang mthong nas bdag gi bu rab tu 'byung zhes 'dri'o/_/sngon gyi mtshan ma bzhi mthong bas de gang dang rgas shing 'khogs pa dang na ba dang 'chi ba dang rab tu byung ba'o/_/rgyal pos 'di rnams 
[\[222b.7\]]bzung nas 'di lta bu'i tshul bdag gi bu dang nye bar 'ong du ma 'jug cig bdag gi sras kyis sangs rgyas thob kyang don med do/_/bdag gi sras stong phrag gnyis kyi gling 'khor dang bcas pa'i gling chen po bzhi po rnams kyi dbang phyug gi bdag po'i rgyal po byed cing dpag tshad sum cu rtsa drug gi khor yug 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]gi 'khor nam mkha'i dbyings su gshegs pa la blta bar 'dod do/_/slar yang 'di ltar brjod cing 'di lta bu'i rnam pa bzhi'i skyes bu gzhon nu'i mig lam du 'ong ba bsrung zhing phyogs bzhir rgyang grags bzhi bzhir bsrung ba bzhag go/_/de'i nyi ma la yang bkra shis pa'i gnas su 'dus pa'i 
[\[223a.2\]]rigs kyi nye du stong phrag brgyad cu po re re'i bu brgya yongs su ster bar bsams so/_/'di sangs rgyas su 'gyur ram rgyal por 'gyur ram bdag gi bu re re ster ro/_/gal te sangs rgyas par gyur na rgyal rigs kyi dge sbyong nyid kyis mdun rgyab thams cad du bskor nas 'gro ba yin no/_/gal te rgyal por gyur 
[\[223a.3\]]na rgyal rigs kyi gzhon nu nyid kyis mdun rgyab kun nas bskor nas 'gro'o zhes smra zhing 'bul lo/_/rgyal pos kyang byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs mchog dang ldan pa skyon thams cad spangs pa'i nu ma snun pa nyid gnas pa byin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'khor mtha' yas pa dpal dang skal ba 'phel 
[\[223a.4\]]ba dang ldan no/_/de nas nyi ma gcig la rgyal po'i 'bras 'debs pa la bkra shis byed do/_/de'i nyi ma la grong khyer thams cad du lha gshegs pa bzhin du brgyan no/_/bran dang las byed pa la sogs pas gos legs po gyon nas spos dang me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pas brgyan par byas nas rgyal 
[\[223a.5\]]po'i pho brang gi nang du 'dus so/_/rgyal po'i gzhis rnams la zhing rmo ba stong phrag gcig rigs so/_/slar yang de'i nyi ma la gcig gis dman pa'i zhing rmo ba brgyad brgya dang bcas pa'i glang gi gnya' shing gi thag pa dngul las byas pa dang /_rgyal po 'dzin pa'i zhing rmo ba'i thong pa slar yang gser las 
[\[223a.6\]]byas par gyur to/_/glang gi rwa gnyis la gser gyis bskus so/_/kha dang ske'i thag pa ni gser la'ang byas so/_/rgyal po'i 'khor chen po dang bcas pa byon nas sras blangs te gshegs so/_/gzhis kha'i gnas na shing 'dzam bu gcig la lo ma mang pos grib ma stug por gyur pa 
[\[223a.7\]]zhig yod pa'i 'og tu gzhon nu'i mal stan chen po byas nas steng du bla res gser gyi skar ma dang mtshungs pa bres te/_lcags ri ltar yol bas phyogs kun nas bskor to/_/rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par byas nas blon po 'khor dang bcas pa zhing rmo ba'i gnas su gshegs te/_
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]der rgyal pos gser gyi thong pa bzung ngo /_/gcig gis dman pa'i brgyad brgya'i dngul gyi thong pa blon pos bzung ste so nam byed pa'i skye bo rnams kyis thong pa lhag ma rnams bslangs so/_/de rnams kyis thong pa bzung nas de dang der sgal rmo'o/_/rgyal pos slar yang 'di nas phar 'gro zhing pha rol 
[\[223b.2\]]nas tshur 'ongs so/_/de'i gnas phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro zhes bsams nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i nu ma snun pa rnams rgyal po'i phun sum tshogs par blta'o/_/yol ba'i nang nas phyir 'thon no/_/byang chub sems dpa' de dang der gzigs pas gcig 
[\[223b.3\]]kyang mi snang ngo /_/myur bar langs nas skyil krung bcas te/_rlung 'byung ba dang rngub cing bzung bas bsam gtan dang po skyes so/_/nu ma snun pa rnams kha zas za ba'i phyir phan tshun du 'gro zhing de ma thag cung zad thogs par gyur to/_/shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma mi ldog cing gzhan yang shing 
[\[223b.4\]]de'i grib ma rnams kun nas gnas so/_/nu ma snun pa rnams kyis sras 'phags pa zhes gcig tu brjod cing myur du yol ba steng du brdzes te nang du zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' ma la stan la skyil krung gis bzhugs pa de'i cho 'phrul mthong nas song ste rgyal po la zhus so/_/lha gzhon nu 'di lta 
[\[223b.5\]]bu'i tshul gyis bzhugs so/_/'di ltar shing gzhan rnams grib ma mi bzlog go/_/shing 'dzam bu'i grib ma ni kun nas gnas so/_/rgyal po myur du byon nas cho 'phrul blta ste/_sras 'di la phyag gnyis pa ste zhes brjod nas sras la phyag btsal lo/_/de nas [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du byang chub 
[\[223b.6\]]sems dpa' lo bcu drug pa'i na tshod du gyur to/_/rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' la dus gsum du rjes su rigs par khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gsum byas nas gcig dgu thog gcig la bdun thog gcig la lnga thog go/_/stong phrag bzhi bcu'i gar byed pa'i bud med rnams nye bar gnas par byas so/_/byang 
[\[223b.7\]]chub sems dpa' ni lha bzhin du lha dang 'dra ba'i bud med rnams 'khor du byas nas rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i bud med du ma dang bcas pa skyes pa med pa'i rol mo sgrogs pa 'khor du bya ste phun sum tshogs pa chen po rjes su myong bar byed do/_/dus kyi res dang dus kyi res la de dang de'i khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]bzhugs so/_/gzhan yang sgra gcan 'dzin gyi ma de nyid btsun mo rnams kyi gtso mor gyur to/_/de'i de bzhin du phun sum tshogs pa chen po rjes su myong bar byed do/_/nyi ma gcig la nye du'i nang du 'di lta bu'i gtam byung ngo /_/don grub rtsed mos brjed nas gshegs shing bzo 
[\[224a.2\]]cung zad kyang mi slob bo/_/g.yul so so nas nye bar gyur na ci byed/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' bos nas bu khyod kyi nye du rnams don grub bzo cung zad kyang mi slob cing rtsed mos gshegs nas 'gro'o zhes zer ro/_/'dir g.yul byung na ji ltar byed ces bas nas/_lha ngas bzo bslabs pa la 
[\[224a.3\]]dgos pa med do/_/grong khyer gyi mi rnams bdag gi bzo blta ba'i sems yod na dril sgrogs shig_/'di nas zhag bdun pa la nye du rnams la bzo bstan par bgyi'o/_/rgyal pos de bzhin du byas so/_/byang chub sems dpas sgra la 'phen pa dang /_spun la 'phen pa dang /_gzhu thogs 
[\[224a.4\]]pa 'dus par byas nas skye bo mang po'i nang du gzhan gzhu thogs pa dang thun mong ma yin pa nye du rnams la bzo bcu gnyis bstan no/_/de rnams mda' 'joms pa'i skyes rabs las 'byung ba'i tshul bzhin du rig par bya'o/_/de'i nye du rnams kyi the tshom sel lo/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[224a.5\]]dpa' skyed mos tshal du gshegs par bsams nas kha lo sgyur ba bos te/_shing rta chas su chug cig ces smras so/_/des legs so zhes brjod cing tshig thos nas shing rta chen po'i 'khor lo'i mchog la ji ltar rigs pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas ku mu da'i 'dab ma'i mdog dang 'dra ba'i 
[\[224a.6\]]bkra shis pa'i rta bzhis shing rta khrid nas byang chub sems dpa' gshegs so/_/zhes smras so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gzhal med khang bzhin du shing rta la zhon nas skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs su gshegs so/_/lha rnams kyis gzhon nu don grub kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i dus 
[\[224a.7\]]ni nye bar gyur to/_/sngar gyi mtshan ma rnams blta bar rigs so/_/lha'i bu cig gis rgas pa 'khogs pa so byi ba skra dkar ba sgur ba rgyab grum pa'i lus can lag tu 'khar ba thogs pa skad 'dzer bar byed pa bstan no/_/de byang chub sems dpa' dang kha lo sgyur bas mthong ngo /_/de nas 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]byang chub sems dpas kha lo sgyur ba la dris so/_/skyes bu 'di gang zhig yin/_skra yang gzhan dang mi 'dra ba ji lta bu/_gtso bo chen po'i mdo nas byung ba bzhin 'dri bar bya'o/_/de'i tshig thos nas skye ba mi rtag cing skyes par gyur pa thams cad rgas par 'gyur ro zhes sems sdug bsngal zhing de nyid du 
[\[224b.2\]]bzlog nas rang gi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nyid du gshegs so/_/rgyal pos rgyu mtshan ci'i phyir bdag gi sras po myur du ldog pa ci'i phyir dris so/_/lha rgas shing 'khogs pa'i mi gcig mthong bas rab tu 'byung ngo /_/myur du bu la gar byed pa rnams sta gon gyis shig_/phun sum tshogs pa nyams su myong 
[\[224b.3\]]bar byas pas rab tu 'byung ba rjes su dran par mi 'gyur ro zhes smras nas srung bar byed pa spel te phyogs thams cad du rgyang grags brgyad brgyad du bzhag go/_/gzhan yang nyi ma gcig la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du skyed mos tshal du gshegs pa na lhas sprul pa'i nad pa gcig mthong nas sngar 
[\[224b.4\]]bzhin du dris so/_/sems sdug bsngal bar gyur te slar yang bzlog nas rang gi khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]gshegs so/_/rgyal pos yang dris pa sngar de bzhin du byas nas slar yang spel te thams cad du rgyang grags bcu gnyis kyi sa'i char srung bar byed pa bzhag go/_/yang nyi ma gzhan la byang chub sems 
[\[224b.5\]]dpa' de bzhin du skyed mos tshal du gshegs pa na lhas sprul pa'i dus la 'das pa gcig mthong nas sngar bzhin du dris te sems sdug bsngal bar gyur nas/_slar yang bzlog ste khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]gshegs nas rgyal pos dris pa sngar bzhin du byas nas/_slar yang bsrung ba spel te kun nas 
[\[224b.6\]]bskor bar dpag tshad gcig gi tshad la bsrung ba bzhag go/_/slar yang nyi ma gzhan la skyed mos tshal du gshegs pa na de bzhin du lhas sprul pa'i gos bzang po legs pa gyon pa'i rab tu byung ba gcig gzigs nas/_'di'i ming ci zhes kha lo ba la dris so/_/gang du yang sangs rgyas byon par 
[\[224b.7\]]ma gyur cing rab tu byung ba'i yon tan mi shes lha'i mthus slar yang lha rab tu byung ba yin zhes brjod do/_/rab tu byung ba'i yon tan la bsngags pa brjod do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba la 'dun pa skyes nas de'i nyin mo skyed mos tshal du gshegs so/_/slob dpon kha cig 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]'di skad zer te/_sngun gyi mtshan ma bzhi pa nyi ma gcig nyid la mthong ngo zhes zer ro/_/de ni mi 'thad do/_/de la nyin mo'i char rtse zhing bkra shis pa'i rdzing bur khrus byas nas nyi ma nub pa na bkra shis pa'i rdo leb kyi stan la bzhugs so/_/rang la rgyan gyis brgyan par 
[\[225a.2\]]sems so/_/de nas rjes su 'brang ba'i skyes bu rnams kha dog sna tshogs pa'i gos dang rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pas brgyan/_me tog gi phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa la sogs pa bslangs nas phyogs kun du bskor nas 'dug go/_/de ma thag par brgya byin sdod pa'i gdan dro bar gyur to/_/gang 
[\[225a.3\]]zhig bdag gi gnas 'dor ba'i sems su zhig la skyes par gyur zhes brtags so/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rgyan byed pa'i dus mthong ngo /_/las thams cad pa bos so/_/las thams cad pa gzhon nu don grub de ring gi mtshan phyed kyi dus su nges par 'byung ba chen pos 'thon no/_/'di 
[\[225a.4\]]de'i phyi ma'i rgyan yin no/_/skyed mos tshal du song la skyes bu chen po lha'i rgyan gyis brgyan par gyis shig_/des de thos nas legs so zhes brjod de lha'i mthus de ma thag par nye bar song ste/_de'i rim gro pa dang mtshungs par gyur nas rim gro pa'i lag tu ras bslangs nas byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[225a.5\]]dbu la bcings so/_/byang chub sems dpas mgo la lag pas reg pa na 'di mi ma yin te lha'i bu yin par shes so/_/bcings pa tsam na bcings pa'i dbu'i cod pan nor bu rin po che'i rnam pa la stong phrag gcig gi du gu la'i ras kyis bcings so/_/slar yang 'ching ba na du gu la'i ras stong 
[\[225a.6\]]phrag gcig gis lan bcu dkris nas stong phrag bcus du gu la'i ras bcings so/_/dbu ni chung zhing du gu la'i ras ni mang bas ji ltar bcing zhes mi bsam mo/_/de rnams thams cad la khri zhing sA ka la'i me tog gi tshad tsam che ba'o/_/yang na ku ba'i me tog gi tshad tsam du gyur to/_/byang chub 
[\[225a.7\]]sems dpa'i dbu ki dza la ka'i me tog ltar mtshungs pa'o/_/yang na gu spya ka'i me tog ltar gyur pa'o/_/de nas rgyan thams cad kyis so sor brgyan nas rol mo thams cad rang rang gi sgra 'byin zhing bram ze rnams rgyal bar gyur cig dga' bar gyur cig ces rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bkra shis kyis bstod 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]pa'i dbyangs byed do/_/rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas mchog gi shing rta la chibs so/_/de'i tshe grags 'dzin ma la bu btsas so/_/rgyal po zas gtsang gis thos nas bdag gi bu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir pho nya ba btang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpas de thos nas sgra gcan 'dzin skyes pas 'ching ba skyes 
[\[225b.2\]]so zhes gsungs so/_/rgyal po bdag gi bu la ci'i phyir 'dri/_de'i tshig thos te 'di nas bzung ste bdag gi tsha bo gzhon nu sgra gcan 'dzin nyid ming du gyur to zhes smras so/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang grags pa chen pos shin tu dga' ba dang dpal dang skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa'i grong khyer du gshegs 
[\[225b.3\]]so/_/de'i tshe gau ta mI skem mo zhes bya ba rgyal rigs kyi bu mo khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du 'dug pas grong khyer la bskor ba byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dpal dang ldan pa'i gzugs mthong nas/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/_/de yi ma ni zhi bar gyur/_/de yi pha ni nges 
[\[225b.4\]]par zhi/_/de yi bud med nges zhir gyur/_/de yi yang ni de bdag mtshungs/_/byang chub sems dpas thos nas bsams pa/_'di 'di lta bur smra ba/_'di lta bu'i tshul gyi bdag nyid kyi lus mthong bas ma'i sems zhi bar gyur/_pha'i sems zhi bar gyur/_skye dgu dang skye dgu'i bdag mo'i sems zhi 
[\[225b.5\]]bar gyur zhes smra'o/_/ci'i phyir sems zhi ba zhes bya ba'i don gang /_de nas nyon mongs pa'i chags pa med pa'i sems la de skad brjod do/_/'dod chags kyi me zhi bar gyur pa ni zhi ba'i ming du gyur to/_/skyon gyi me dang gti mug gi me zhi bar gyur pa ni zhi ba'i ming du gyur to/_/nga rgyal dang lta ba la 
[\[225b.6\]]sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa kun skyes pa thams cad zhi ba ni zhi ba'i ming du brjod do/_/'di bdag la tshig snyan pa brjod cing bdag ni mya ngan las 'das pa tshol du 'gro zhing tshol lo/_/de ring nyid nas bdag khyim na gnas pa spangs nas nges par 'byung bas rab tu byung nas mya ngan las 'das pa tshol bar rigs 
[\[225b.7\]]so/_/'di ni bdag gis slob dpon mar gyur to/_/gau ta mI skem mo la 'bum phrag gcig ri ba'i mu tig gi dra ba mgrin pa nas bkrol te bskur ro/_/des don grub gzhon nu bdag la chags shing zhen par gyur pas sems rten bskur ba yin pas des sems bde ba skyes par gyur to/_/byang 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]chub sems dpa' ni dpal dang ldan skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa'i rang gi khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]gshegs nas dpal gyi mal stan la gzims so/_/de ma thag tu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i glu dang gar rnams legs par bslabs pa'i lha'i bu mo dang 'dra ba'i gzugs mchog dang ldan pa'i 
[\[226a.2\]]bud med rnams kyis rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rol mo bzung nas de la yongs su bskor nas mngon par dga' bar byed cing gar dang glu dang rol mo la sogs pa byed par rtsom mo/_/byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa la mi dga' ba'i sems kyis gar la sogs pa la mngon par dga' ba med pas yud tsam gyis 
[\[226a.3\]]mnal du bzhud do/_/bud med de rnams kyang gang gi don du nged rnams kyis gar la sogs pa byed pa la de mnal du gshegs so/_/da ni ci'i phyir bdag cag ngal bar byed gang dang gang bslabs pa'i rol mo rnams sa la bzhag nas nyal lo/_/dri bzang dang ldan pa'i 'bru mar gyi mar me dang ldan pa'i byang 
[\[226a.4\]]chub sems dpa' rab tu sad nas mal gyi steng du skyil krung gis bzhugs nas gzigs pas bud med rnams rol mo bzhag nas gnyid du song ba gzigs so/_/kha cig mchil ma lug pa dang /_kha cig ni lus la mchil mas gos pa'i dri ma can du gyur pa dang /_kha cig ni so 'cha' ba dang /_
[\[226a.5\]]kha cig ni ngar ngar 'byin pa dang /_kha cig ni rnya ma rmi 'chad pa dang /_kha cig ni kha gdangs pa dang /_kha cig ni gos zhus pa dang /_'ga' zhig gi ni mtshan ma snang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpas de rnams kyi rnam 'gyur gzigs nas thugs 'jigs pas 'dod pa la mi dga' bar gyur to/_/
[\[226a.6\]]de'i rgyan du byas pa ni nye bar ldan pa brgya byin gyi pho brang dang mtshungs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]chen po yangs shing rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dri nga bas gang ba'i ro dang ldan pa'i dur khrod dang mtshungs par bsams so/_/srid pa gsum po me 'bar ba'i khyim dang mtshungs par bsams so/_/bdag la gnod 
[\[226a.7\]]par byed pa dang /_'tshe bar byed pa'o zhes ched du brjod pa 'chad cing shin tu rab tu 'byung bar 'dod par gyur to/_/de bdag gi de ring nas nges par 'byung ba chen pos 'thon par bsams te mal nas bzhengs nas sgo dang nye bar gshegs te 'di na su yod ces dris so/_/blon po 'dun pa them pa la 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]sngas byas nas nyal lo/_/'phags pa bu bdag blon po 'dun pa yin no zhes smras so/_/da ni nges par 'byung ba chen pos 'thon par 'dod do/_/bdag gi rta gcig la sga gyis shig_/des lha legs so zhes brjod nas rta'i sga khyer te rta rar song nas dri bzang po dang ldan pa'i 'bru mar gyi mar me spar 
[\[226b.2\]]ba su ma na'i me tog can gyi dar gyi bla res kyi 'og na shin tu dga' ba'i sa phyogs la sdod pa'i rta'i rgyal po bsngags ldan mthong ngo /_/da ni bdag gis 'di nyid kyi sga bya bar rig nas bsngags ldan la sga sgron no/_/des sga sgron par shes nas 'di sga sgron pa na glo bsdams so/_/nyi ma gzhan la skyed mos 
[\[226b.3\]]tshal du rtsed mo la 'gro ba'i dus su sga 'di ltar ma byas so/_/bdag gi sras 'phags pa/_da ni nges par 'byung ba chen pos 'thon par 'dod par gyur to snyam nas sems dga' bas rta skad tsher tsher 'don pa de'i sgra grong khyer thams cad du grag par byed pa slar yang lha rnams kyis de'i sgra bkag nas sus kyang 
[\[226b.4\]]mi thos par byas so/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang blon po 'dun pa rta'i gnas su btang nas re zhig bu la blta bar bsams so/_/grags 'dzin ma'i gnas su gshegs te sgo phye nas de ma thag par nyal sa'i nang du dri bzang po dang ldan pa'i 'bru mar gyi mar me spar ba grags 'dzin ma su ma na'i me tog dang /_
[\[226b.5\]]mal li ka'i me tog la sogs pa'i me tog mal gyi steng du khal gcig tsam bkram pa'i steng du bu'i mgo'i steng du lag pa bzhag nas gnyid du song ba la byang chub sems dpas sgo'i them pa'i steng du zhabs ya gcig bzhag ste 'khod pas gzigs so/_/gal te bdag gis lha mo'i lag pa nas 'then 
[\[226b.6\]]nas rang gi bu bslang bar bsams te/_lha mo gnyid sad na bdag nyid 'gro ba'i bar gcod du 'gyur zhing sangs rgyas su gyur nas bu blta'o snyam du sems te khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nas babs so/_/slar yang slob dpon kha cig 'di ltar smra ste/_de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gshegs pa'i sngon rol gyi nyi ma 
[\[226b.7\]]bdun gyi gong du skyes so zhes zer ro/_/de 'dra gzhan du ma bshad pas de'i phyir 'di kho na gzung bar bya'o/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]nas babs nas rta'i ra ba nyid du gshegs te 'di ltar gsungs so/_/bu bsngags ldan khyod kyis da ni nub gcig bsgral bar gyis shig_/
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]bdag khyod kyi drin gyis sangs rgyas su gyur nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad bsgral bar bya'o/_/de nas bsngags ldan gyi rgyab tu chibs so/_/bsngags ldan gyi ske nas bzung nas mchu ru khru [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa/_de dang 'thun pa'i mtho tshad dang ldan zhing mthu dang mgyogs 
[\[227a.2\]]pa dang ldan la dung phyis pa'i kha dog ltar thams cad dkar ba dang mtshungs pa'o/_/gal te tsher tsher sgrogs pa'am rmig pa'i sgra sgrogs pa'i sgras grong khyer thams cad grag par 'gyur ba'o/_/de'i phyir lha rang gi mthus de sus kyang mi thos par de 'di ltar sgra sgrogs pa bkag go/_/khrab khrab 'gro 
[\[227a.3\]]ba'i rkang lag gi rmig pa re re lha'i lag pa'i mthil du nye bar bzhag go/_/byang chub sems dpas rta'i rgyab kyi dbus su bzhugs so/_/blon po 'dun pa rta'i mjug ma nas zung cig ces mtshan phyed kyi dus su sgo chen po dang nye bar phyin to/_/de'i tshe slar yang 'di ltar rgyal po chen pos 'di ltar byang 
[\[227a.4\]]chub sems dpa' gang gi dus su yang grong khyer chen po'i sgo phye nas phyi rol du 'gro bar mi nus par phyed sgo ma'i sgo glegs re re la mi stong phrag re res dbye dgos par bskos so/_/byang chub sems dpa' stobs dang ldan pas glang po che'i grangs bye ba stong phrag bcu'i glang po che'i stobs 'dzin no/_/mi'i grangs 
[\[227a.5\]]kyis mi bye ba 'bum phrag gcig gi mi'i stobs 'dzin no/_/byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/_gal te sgo ma phyed na da ni bsngags ldan gyi rgyab tu bzhugs pa nyid ni blon po 'dun pas rnga ma nas bzung ba dang lhan cig nyid du bsngags ldan brla btsir nas khru [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'i lcags ri'i mtho tshad la 
[\[227a.6\]]mchongs te 'da' bar bsams so/_/blon po 'dun pas bsams pa/_gal te sgo ma phyed na bdag gis 'phags pa sras dpung pa la khyer nas lag pa g.yas pas bsngags ldan gyi gsus pa mchan khung du bcug nas lcags ri la mchongs te 'da' bar bsams so/_/bsngags ldan gyis 
[\[227a.7\]]bsams pa/_gal te sgo ma phyed na bdag gis rang gi bdag po ji ltar rgyab tu bzhugs pa de bzhin nyid du blon po 'dun pas rnga ma nas bzung nas lhan cig tu gnas pa nyid du khur nas lcags ri la mchongs te 'da' bar bsams so/_/gal te sgo ma phyed par gyur na ji ltar bsams pa de bzhin du gsum 
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]po'i nang nas gang yang rung ba gcig nges par 'gyur ro/_/slar yang sgo srung ba'i lha rnams kyis sgo phye'o/_/de ma thag nyid du bdud kyis byang chub sems dpa' bzlog par bsams nas 'ongs te nam mkha' la 'dug nas smras pa/_drang srong chen po nges par 'byung bas ma 'gro cig_/'di nas nyi ma 
[\[227b.2\]]bdun pa la khyod kyis rin po che'i 'khor lo thob par 'gyur ro/_/gling phran stong phrag gnyis kyis yongs su bskor ba'i gling chen po bzhi'i rgyal srid byed par 'gyur ro/_/drang srong chen po zlog cig ces smras so/_/khyod su zhig yin zhes dris so/_/bdag ni 'jig rten gyi dbang po yin zhes smras 
[\[227b.3\]]so/_/bdud rin po che'i 'khor lo bdag la yong bar bdag gis shes te bdag la rgyal po'i dgos pa med do/_/stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sgra sgrogs shing sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod do/_/bdud kyis smras pa/_'di nas bzung nas 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa'am/_gnod sems 
[\[227b.4\]]kyi rnam par rtog pa'am/_rnam par 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pa sems la bsams pa'i dus bu bdag gis shes so zhes smras so/_/grogs dang ma bral bar grib ma bzhin du rjes su 'brel bar 'gro'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid lag tu thogs kyang mchil 
[\[227b.5\]]ma'i thal ba bzhin du ltas pa med par dor nas bkur sti chen pos grong khyer nas phyir 'thon no/_/dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya la mchog gi skar ma bre'i dus su phyir 'thon nas slar yang grong khyer la bzlog nas blta bar brjod par bsams so/_/'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i thugs la 'khrungs tsam nyid 
[\[227b.6\]]na'o/_/skyes bu chen po khyod kyis log nas blta ba'i las kyi bsod nams khyod kyis byas pa med dam zhes brjod pa bzhin du sa gzhi chen po rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo bzhin du phug nas bzlog go/_/byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer la sngon du phyogs shing 'khod nas grong khyer la gzigs te de'i sa phyogs 
[\[227b.7\]]zhig tu bsngags ldan ldog pa'i mchod rten gyi gnas gcig bstan no/_/bsngags ldan 'gro ba'i lam la mngon du phyogs par byas nas byon no/_/bkur sti chen po dang dpal dang skal ba bzang po dang ldan no/_/de'i tshe lha rnams kyis de'i mdun du stong phrag drug cu'i mar me chen po spar ro/_/
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]rgyab kyi phyogs su yang mar me chen po stong phrag drug cu spar ro/_/g.yas kyi phyogs su yang mar me chen po stong phrag drug cu spar ro/_/g.yon gyi phyogs su yang mar me chen po stong phrag drug cu spar ro/_/lha gzhan rnams kyis kyang khor yug gi ri'i steng du grangs med pa'i mar me stong 
[\[228a.2\]]phrag mang po spar ro/_/lha gzhan rnams dang klu dang 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la sogs pas lha'i spos dang me tog gi phreng ba dang phye ma dang bdug pa la sogs pas mchod cing 'gro'o/_/pA ri ts+tshat+ta'i me tog nyid dang man dA ra 'i me tog sprin ltar mthug pa rgyun du 'bab pa bzhin du nam mkha' las rgyun mi 'chad par 
[\[228a.3\]]me tog gi char babs par gyur to/_/lha'i glu dbyangs sgrogs par gyur to/_/kun nas bskor bar stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi rol mo'i sgra sgrogs so/_/rgya mtsho'i dbus su 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa bzhin no/_/ri bo gnya' shing 'dzin gyi 'gram du rgya mtsho'i sgra sgrogs pa'i dus bzhin du 'jug 
[\[228a.4\]]go/_/'di ni dpal dang skal ba bzang po dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig la rgyal srid gsum spangs nas dpag tshad sum cu'i mthar yid ldan zhes bya ba'i chu klung gi 'gram du bzhud do/_/ci'i phyir yang rta 'di'i pha rol du yang 'gro bar mi nus sam/_mi nus pa ni 
[\[228a.5\]]ma yin te/_de ni khor yug gcig gi nang du snga dro gcig la song nas bskor te de ma thag tu snga dro nyid du 'ongs shing rang gi mdun du kha zas byin pa za bar nus so/_/de'i tshe slar yang lha dang klu dang 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la sogs pa nam mkha' la 'khod nas spos dang me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa babs 
[\[228a.6\]]te/_ji srid rta'i brla'i bar du lus nub pas 'thon par mi nus pa spos dang me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa ni ral pa ltar gdon par mi nus par shin tu thogs par gyur to/_/de'i phyir dpag tshad sum cu rtsa gnyis su song ngo /_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chu klung gi 'gram du 'khod nas blon po 
[\[228a.7\]]'dun pa la dris pa/_chu klung 'di'i ming ci/_lha yid ldan zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/bdag kyang rab tu 'byung ba la yid dang ldan pa zhes bya bar gyur to/_/zhabs kyis brgyab ste rta bskul ba byas te/_rta yis mchongs nas glang brgyad kyi skad tsam gyi chu klung gi zheng 'gram gyi pha rol du 'khod 
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]do/_/byang chub sems dpa' rta'i rgyab nas babs te dngul dang mtshungs pa'i bye ma'i phung po'i steng du 'khod do/_/'dun pa bos nas khyod kyis bdag gi rgyan rnams dang bsngags ldan khrid la song cig_/bdag rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/lha bdag kyang rab tu 'byung du gsol/_byang chub sems 
[\[228b.2\]]dpas khyod kyis rab tu 'byung ba mi 'thob pas song cig_/lan gsum du zhus kyang ma gnang ngo /_/rgyan dang bsngags ldan lag pas gtad de bsams pa/_bdag gi skra 'di dge sbyong dang mi 'thun no snyam nas byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis kyang skra breg par rung ba gzhan med do/_/de nas bdag 
[\[228b.3\]]nyid kyi ral gris breg par bsams so/_/phyag g.yas pas ral gri bzung nas phyag g.yon pas cod pan dang bcas pa'i nor bu bzung ste bcad do/_/dbu skra ni sor gnyis par gyur cing g.yas phyogs nas 'khyil bas dbu la gnas so/_/de rnams ji srid 'tsho'i bar de nyid kyi tshad du gyur to/_/kha 
[\[228b.4\]]spu yang med par gyur to/_/slar dbu skra dang kha spu bzhar mi dgos par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpas cod pan dang bcas pa'i nor bu bzung nas gal te bdag sangs rgya bar 'gyur na nam mkha' la 'khod cig_/ma yin na sa la lhung bar gyur cig ces nam mkha' la dor ro/_/de 
[\[228b.5\]]ni gtsug gi nor bu bcings pa dpag tshad gcig gi tshad tsam du song nas nam mkha' la 'khod do/_/lha'i rgyal po brgya byin gyi lha'i mig gis bltas pas dpag tshad gcig gi tshad tsam gyi rin po che'i za ma tog gi nang du bcug nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi pho brang du gtsug gi nor bu bzhugs pa'i 
[\[228b.6\]]mchod rten bzhengs so/_/mchog gi dri yis bsgos pa'i gtsug phud bcad/_/gang zag mchog gis nam mkha' la ni dor/_/mig stong pa yis dbu skra mgo steng bzung /_/gser gyi za ma tog tu lha gnas khyer/_/slar yang byang chub sems dpas bsams pa/_yul ka shi ka'i 
[\[228b.7\]]ras 'di dge sbyong bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin no zhes bsams so/_/de nas sangs rgyas 'od srung gi dus su sngon gyi grogs po rdza mkhan tshangs pa chen por gyur to/_/sangs rgyas gcig gi bar du grogs po dang ma phrad do zhes bsams te de ni bdag gi grogs po nges par 'byung ba chen pos 'thon 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]no/_/dge sbyong gi yo byad 'di bzung nas 'gro'o zhes bsams so/_/chos gos gsum dang lhung bzed dang /_/spu gri khab dang ska rags dang /_/chu tshags dang bcas brgyad yin no/_/dge sbyong rnams la rigs shing mkho/_/dge sbyong gi mkho ba'i yo byad brgyad po 'di bslangs nas 
[\[229a.2\]]phul lo/_/byang chub sems dpas mchod par 'os pa'i rgyal mtshan gyon nas rab tu 'byung ba mchog gi cha byad bslangs te 'dun pa la bdag gi tshig gis ma dang yab la bdag la nad med par gyur to zhes smros shig ces pas btang ngo /_/'dun pas byang chub sems dpa' la phyag byas bskor ba byas 
[\[229a.3\]]nas song ngo /_/slar yang bsngags ldan gyis 'dun pa dang byang chub sems dpa' gsung gleng byed cing 'dug pa thos na/_bdag ni jo bo dang phrad par mi 'gyur zhes bsams so/_/mig lam du spangs nas mya ngan la shin tu gnas pa bsran par ma nus te snying gas nas dus las 'das te sum cu rtsa 
[\[229a.4\]]gsum gyi gnas su bsngags ldan zhes bya ba'i lha'i bur skyes so/_/'dun pa la dang po'i mya ngan du gyur pa gcig go/_/slar yang bsngags ldan dus las 'das pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis mya ngan gnyis pas gzir te/_ngu zhing smre sngags 'don zhing grong khyer du song ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' de'i phyogs 
[\[229a.5\]]nyid du rjes su dga' ba zhes bya ba'i a mra'i tshal yod do/_/der nyi ma bdun nas rab tu 'byung ba'i bde bas gnas shing nyin mtshan 'da'o/_/nyi ma gcig nyid la dpag tshad sum cu'i lam du zhabs kyis gshegs nas rgyal po'i khab tu byon no/_/byon nas sgo mthar chags su bsod snyoms 
[\[229a.6\]]la gshegs te grong khyer pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sku mthong nas glang po che nor skyong zhugs pa'i rgyal po'i khab bzhin dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po zhugs pa'i lha'i grong khyer bzhin du kun du 'khrugs par gyur te/_rgyal po'i mi 'ongs shing /_lha 'di lta bu'i gzugs kyi sems can 
[\[229a.7\]]gcig grong khyer na bsod snyoms byed de/_lha 'am mi'am 'dab [{]bzangs te [,]bzang ste [}]'di gang yin bdag cag gis ma shes so zhes smras so/_/rgyal po khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng du 'khod nas skyes bu chen po mthong ste ya mtshan dang rmad du byung ba skyes so/_/mi gcig bos nas song la rtogs shig_/
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]gal te mi ma yin par gyur na grong khyer nas phyi rol du song ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te lha yin par gyur na nam mkha' la 'gro'o/_/gal te klu yin na sa'i 'og tu 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mi yin na ji ltar thob pa'i kha zas za'o zhes bsgo'o/_/skyes bu chen pos kyang kha zas 
[\[229b.2\]]'dres pa rnams bsdus nas bdag la 'di tsam gyis chog par rtogs te/_zhugs pa'i sgo nyid nas grong khyer gyi phyi rol du 'thon te/_ri skya bo'i grib ma la shar du sngun du phyogs pas bzhugs nas kha zas la longs spyod par brtsams so/_/de nas gang gi sgyu ma phyin ci log ste kha nas 'thon pa'i rnam par 
[\[229b.3\]]bsams par gyur to/_/de nas de'i bdag nyid kyi lus kyis 'di lta bu'i tshul gyi kha zas mig gis mthong ba yang dkon no/_/de'i phyir rigs so so'i kha zas la mi dga' bar bsams nas 'di ltar rang la rang gis gdams so/_/don grub khyod rnyed sla ba'i bza' ba dang btung ba'i rigs lo gsum pa'i 
[\[229b.4\]]'bras dri zhim po'i bza' ba sna tshogs pa'i ro dang bcas pa'i bza' ba'i gnas su skyes par gyur nas phyag dar khrod pa gcig mthong ste/_nam du'ang bdag ni 'di lta bu'i tshul du gyur nas bsod snyoms la 'gro zhing kha zas longs spyod do/_/de'i dus su bdag la de ltar 'gyur ro zhes bsams nas 'thon 
[\[229b.5\]]no/_/da ni 'di ci byed pa yin zhes 'di ltar rang la rang gis gdams nas rtog pa med par kha zas la longs spyod do/_/rgyal po'i mis 'di'i 'jug pa mthong nas song ste rgyal po la smras so/_/rgyal pos pho nya pa'i gtam thos nas myur bar grong khyer gyi phyi rol du 'thon nas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[229b.6\]]dang nye bar song ste spyod lam la dad par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' la dbang phyug thams cad rdzogs par phul lo/_/byang chub sems dpas rgyal po chen po bdag la dngos po'i 'dod pa'am nyon mongs pa'i 'dod pa'i don med do/_/bdag ni mchog gi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa 
[\[229b.7\]]don du gnyer bas 'ongs so/_/rgyal pos rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i sbyin pa byin yang de'i thugs la mi 'phrod do/_/nges par khyod sangs rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas su gyur nas slar yang dang por bdag gi grong khyer du byon par zhu zhes dam bca' bzung ngo /_/'di ni 'dir mdor bsdus pa ste/_
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]rgyas par ni slar yang 'di rab tu 'byung ba'i mdo dang bcas par don dang gtam 'di ni blta zhing rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang rgyal po la dam bca' byin nas [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du spyod pa la gshegs shing kun nas tshon dang nag po can dang /_'char byed gser dang /_dga' 
[\[230a.2\]]byed bu'i gnas su nye bar gshegs nas snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed de sangs rgyas thob pa'i lam ni 'di ma yin no/_/de la snyoms par 'jug pa skyes kyang dgyes par ma gyur nas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa'i rang gi stobs dang brtson 'grus rnams la legs par blta bar 'dod pas dka' ba chen po 
[\[230a.3\]]spyod pa'i bsam pas lteng rgyas su byon te sa phyogs 'di ni shin tu dga' ba yin no snyam nas de nyid du nye bar gnas par byas te dka' ba chen po spyod do/_/de yang kauN+Di n+ya la sogs pa rab tu byung ba lnga grong dang grong rdal dang rgyal po'i pho brang rnams su bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[230a.4\]]gnas der 'ongs so/_/de nas lo drug tu dka' ba chen po spyad do/_/da ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro da ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes zhus pa'i gnas la byi dor la sogs pa byed cing sku la rim gro byed par gyur te nye bar gnas par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang phyi ma'i mthar thug par 
[\[230a.5\]]dka' ba spyad par bsams so/_/til gcig dang 'bras kyi nyag ma gcig la sogs pa'i nyi ma 'da' zhing thams cad du yang kha zas thams cad spangs so/_/lha rnams kyis kyang ba spu'i bu ga re re nas mdangs ston to/_/de nas de'i kha zas med par sku rid par gyur te/_gser gyi kha dog can gyi 
[\[230a.6\]]sku yang nag por gyur to/_/skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang mi snang bar gyur to/_/nyi ma gzhan la yang rlung dal bus bsam gtan byed cing sku la zug gzer chen po skyes nas 'du shes med par gyur te 'chag pa'i gnas su 'gyel lo/_/de nas lha gcig gis dge sbyong gau ta ma 
[\[230a.7\]]dus las 'das so zhes brjod do/_/gcig gis 'gyel ba na dgra bcom pa thob bo zhes brjod do/_/der gang zhig gis dus las 'das so zhes brjod nas de song ste rgyal po chen po zas gtsang la smras pa khyed kyi sras dus las 'das so/_/bdag gi sras sangs rgyas ma thob par dus las 'das sam/_
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]thob nas dus las 'das zhes dris so/_/sangs rgyas thob par ma nus so/_/dka' ba spyod pa'i gnas su 'gyel nas dus las 'das so/_/'di thos nas rgyal po yid ma ches par gyur to/_/bdag gi sras sangs rgyas ma thob par dus las 'da' ba med do zhes bkag go/_/gang gi phyir slar yang 
[\[230b.2\]]rgyal po yid ma ches nas dka' thub pa nag po lha len gyis phyag byed pa'i dus dang 'dzam bu'i shing gi drung nyid du cho 'phrul mthong ba'i rgyu mtshan nyid kyis so/_/slar yang byang chub sems dpas 'du shes thob nas bzhengs so/_/lha de song nas rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras po de nad med par gyur to zhes smras so/_/
[\[230b.3\]]rgyal pos sras po mi na bar bdag gis shes so zhes smras so/_/sems dpa' chen po lo drug tu dka' ba byed cing 'di lta bu'i sems su gyur te/_'di lta bu'i dka' thub spyod pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi lam ma yin no zhes bsams nas kha zas cung zad la longs spyod par byed cing grong dang grong rdal rnams su 
[\[230b.4\]]bsod snyoms la rgyu bas bsod snyoms spyod do/_/de nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gsal bar gyur to/_/sku gser gyi kha dog lta bur gyur to/_/dge slong lnga sde na re 'dis lo drug tu dka' ba spyad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par ma gyur to/_/da ni grong la sogs par 
[\[230b.5\]]bsod snyoms spyod cing kha zas bslangs nas za ste/_ro la chags par gyur na ci nus 'dis dka' ba spyad par 'khrul lo/_/lus la khrus byed par 'dod pas lus kyi ba spu re re'i sgor chu zhugs nas 'dod pa'i thig ler gyur pa dang mtshungs so/_/bdag cag de'i 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa yod pa'i gnas su 
[\[230b.6\]]'dug pas ci zhig bya/_skyes bu chen po spangs shing rang rang gi chos gos dang lhung bzed thogs nas dpag tshad [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi lam du song ste drang srong lhung ba'i tshal du gnas so/_/de'i tshe de'i dus su lteng rgyas na sde can gyi grong rdal ba zhing pa'i khyim du skyes pa'i legs skyes ma zhes bya ba'i bu mo na tshod
