[\[230b.7\]]ldan par gyur te n+ya gro d+ha'i shing gcig don du gnyer to/_/gal te bdag dang mnyam par skyes pa'i rigs kyi khyim du song nas dang por mngal chags te/_bu rnyed na de la lo so sor 'bum phrag gcig ri ba'i gtor ma'i las bya'o/_/de'i don du gnyer ba 'grub bo/_/des sems dpa' chen po lo 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]drug gi mthar dka' ba spyod pa rdzogs par byed do/_/dpyid zla tha chung gi nya la gtor ma'i las byed par sems so/_/de'i sngun nyid du stong phrag gcig gi ba bzhon ma shing mngar gyi nags su shing mngar za ba de rnams kyi 'o ma bzhos nas bzhon ma'i ba lnga brgya la byin no/_/de 
[\[231a.2\]]rnams kyi 'o ma bzhos nas ba bzhon ma phyed dang sum brgya la byin no/_/de bzhin du ba bzhon ma bcu drug gi 'o ma bzhos nas ba bzhon ma brgyad la byin no/_/de srid kyi 'o ma bska mo dang mngar ba dang mdangs dang mdog dang ldan pa don du gnyer bar 'dod cing 'o ma bskol lo/_/des dpyid zla tha chung gi 
[\[231a.3\]]nya'i nyin mo'i snga dro gtor ma'i las byed par sems shing mtshan mo'i nam langs ka'i dus su ba 'jo mkhan langs nas ba bzhon ma brgyad po 'jo ru song ba/_be'u ba'i nu ma la nye bar ma gyur par yang /_ba'i nu ma'i gam du snod sar pa nye bar gnas pa byas pa tsam na rang gi chos nyid kyis 'o ma'i 
[\[231a.4\]]rgyun gyis snod gang bar gyur to/_/legs skyes mas ya mtshan che ba de mthong ste/_'o ma rang gi lag pas khyer nas snod gsar par blugs pa la rang gi lag gis me btang ste 'tshod par brtsams nas/_der 'o thug bskol bas lbu ba chen po 'thon nas g.yas phyogs su 'khor zhing thur ma gcig 
[\[231a.5\]]tsam yang sa la ma lhung la/_thab na du ba cung zad kyang med do/_/de'i tshe 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po 'ongs nas thab srun par byed do/_/tshangs pa chen pos ni gdugs 'dzin no/_/brgya byin gyis ni ji ltar rigs pa'i me gtong bar byed do/_/stong phrag gnyis kyis yongs su bskor ba'i gling 
[\[231a.6\]]chen po bzhi'i lha dang mi rnams kyis ji ltar rigs pa'i mdangs rnams lha rang rang gi mthus bsdus nas bcug go/_/mi rnams kyis kyang de bzhin du byas nas dus gzhan la lha rnams zan gyi gong bu re res mdangs 'jug go/_/slar yang byang chub pa'i nyin mo dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 
[\[231a.7\]]nyin mo snod nyid du 'jug par byed do/_/legs skyes mas nyi ma gcig nyid la der rang nyid gsal bar gyur nas ya mtshan che ba du ma mthong ste bran mo rdzogs ma zhes bya ba bos nas/_rdzogs ma de ring bdag cag gi lha shin tu dgyes par gyur te/_bdag gis de rnams kyi dus su 'di lta bu'i 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]tshul gyi ya mtshan che ba ma mthong bas myur du song la lha'i gnas su byi dor legs par gyis shig_/des legs so zhes brjod nas 'phags ma de'i tshig bzung ste myur ba myur bar shing gi drung du phyin no/_/byang chub sems dpas kyang de'i mtshan mo'i cha la rmi lam chen po lnga gzigs pa yongs 
[\[231b.2\]]su rtog cing the tshom med par bdag de ring sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur bar bya'o snyam du thugs brtan por mdzad nas/_de'i nub mo 'das te sku'i byi dor mdzad nas bsod snyoms la gshegs pa'i dus kyi snga dro byon te/_shing n+ya gro d+ha'i drung du bzhugs nas rang gi 'od kyis shing thams cad snang bar mdzad 
[\[231b.3\]]do/_/de nas yang rdzogs ma de 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa' shing gi drung na shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams la gzigs shing gzigs pa mthong la sku la 'od zer 'thon pa'i 'od kyis shing thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo /_/des 'di ltar bsams te/_de ring bdag cag gi lha shing la 
[\[231b.4\]]babs nas rang gi lag nyid kyis gtor ma len cing bzhugs so zhes bsams pas sems tshim pa thob nas myur du song ste legs skyes ma la don de rnams smras so/_/legs skyes mas de'i tshig thos nas sems tshim par gyur te/_de ring nas bzung nas bdag gi bu mo chen mo gnas su sdod cig ces 
[\[231b.5\]]bu mo la ji ltar rigs pa'i rgyan thams cad byin no/_/slar yang gang gi phyir sangs rgyas kyi yongs su rdzogs par thob pa'i nyin mo 'bum phrag gcig gi grangs kyang gser gyi sder ma chen po thob par rigs so/_/de'i phyir gser gyi sder ma chen po'i nang du 'o thug ldugs pa'i sems skyes nas 'bum phrag 
[\[231b.6\]]gcig ri ba'i gser gyi sder ma chen po bslangs te/_'o thug btsos pa'i nang du kha sbub nas blug go/_/'o thug thams cad pad ma'i 'dab ma'i nang gi chu bzhin du chu'i thigs pa gcig tu gyur nas gser gyi sder du byung ngo /_/gser gyi sder ma gcig gang ba'i tshad tsam du gyur to/_/des gser gyi 
[\[231b.7\]]snod de la gser gyi snod gzhan gyis bkab nas gos kyis dril lo/_/legs skyes ma rgyan gyis lus thams cad brgyan nas gser gyi sder ma de rang gi mgor bzhag ste/_mthu chen pos shing n+ya gro d+ha'i drung du phyin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mthong nas shin tu yid bde ba skyes par 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]gyur te/_shing gi lha yin nam zhes bsams nas blta ba'i gnas su dud cing dud cing song ste mgo'i steng gi gser gyi sder ma phab nas kha phyes te/_gser gyi ril ba spyi blugs kyis dri bzang pos bsgos pa'i chu bzung nas byang chub sems dpa' dang nye bar song ste 'khod do/_/grogs 
[\[232a.2\]]po rdza mkhan tshangs pa chen por gyur pas phul ba'i sa'i lhung bzed ni de rnams kyi dus su byang chub sems dpas ma spangs kyang de de ma thag tu mi snang bar gyur/_byang chub sems dpas lhung bzed ma gzigs so/_/phyag g.yas pa brkyang nas chu bslangs te/_legs skyes mas snod dang bcas 
[\[232a.3\]]pa nyid kyi 'o thug skyes bu chen po'i phyag tu phul lo/_/skyes bu chen pos legs skyes ma la brtags pa na/_des rnam 'gyur shes nas 'phags pa bdag gis nyid la yongs su phul gyis bzhes la ji ltar bzhed pa bzhin gshegs par zhu zhes phyag byas nas/_ji ltar bdag gi 'dod pa 
[\[232a.4\]]yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/'di ltar nyid kyis kyang bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces smras so/_/'bum phrag gcig ri ba'i gser gyi sder ma chen po gcig shing gi lo ma rnyings pa bzhin du ltos pa med par song ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pa las bzhengs nas 
[\[232a.5\]]shing la bskor te/_gser gyi sder ma bslangs nas chu klung nai ra ny+dza na'i 'gram du gshegs te/_byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa 'bum phrag mang po rnams kyis mngon par byang chub pa'i nyin mo babs nas khrus byed pa'i gnas su legs par rab tu gnas pa'i mu gnas zhes bya ba yod do/_/
[\[232a.6\]]de'i 'gram du sder ma bzhag ste babs nas khrus mdzad do/_/'bum phrag du ma'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis na bza' dang mchod par 'os pa gyon nas shar phyogs su sngon du phyogs pas bzhugs nas ta la'i shing tog gi nang gi rus pa gcig gi tshad tsam dang mnyam pa gcig gis dman pa'i lnga 
[\[232a.7\]]bcu'i gong bu byas nas chu med cing dngar ba'i 'o thug thams cad gsol lo/_/de 'di ltar gang gis sangs rgyas su gyur nas zhag bzhi bcu zhe dgu ru byang chub kyi snying por bzhugs te zhag bzhi bcu zhe dgu'i kha zas su gyur to/_/de rnams kyi dus su kha zas gzhan med pa dang /_khrus byed 
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]pa med pa dang /_zhal shol ba med pa dang /_sku lus kyi bya ba byed pa med do/_/bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang /_lam gyi bde ba dang /_'bras bu'i bde ba nyid kyis nyin mtshan 'da'o/_/gzhan yang de'i 'o thug gsol nas gser gyi sder ma phyag tu bzhes te/_gal te bdag ni de ring 
[\[232b.2\]]sangs rgyas su 'gyur nus na sder ma 'di chu'i steng du gyen du 'gro bar gyur cig_/ma yin na thur la 'gro bar gyur cig ces chu la dor ro/_/des chu'i rgyun gyi rlabs chu klung gi dbus su song nas dbus dbus kyi gnas nyid du rta mgyogs por 'gro ba bzhin du/_khru brgyad cu'i tshad tsam gyi steng du 
[\[232b.3\]]song zhing /_chu lan cig 'khyil bas bying nas klu'i rgyal po nag po'i gnas su song ngo /_/de nas sangs rgyas gsum po rnams kyis bshos gsol ba'i gser gyi sder ma chen po sil sil zhes sgra sgrogs par byed cing phyogs gcig tu de rnams thams cad kyi 'og tu gyur nas gnas so/_/klu'i rgyal 
[\[232b.4\]]po nag pos de'i sgra thos nas kha sang sangs rgyas gcig thob par gyur cing /_slar yang de ring sangs rgyas nyid thob par gyur nas mang pos bstod par byed par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpas ni chu klung gi 'gram shing sA la'i tshal du nyin mo bzhugs nas srod kyi dus su me tog ku mu da kha 'bye ba'i dus 
[\[232b.5\]]la lha rnams kyis brgyan par byas nas/_zheng la glang gi skad brgyad kyis thos pa'i tshad du lam byed pa la seng ge bzhin du sgra bsgrags nas/_byang chub kyi shing la sngun par phyogs pas bzhud do/_/klu dang gnod sbyin dang 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la sogs pa rnams kyis lha'i spos dang me tog la sogs pa dang /_
[\[232b.6\]]lha'i glu dbyangs la sogs pas mchod do/_/stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams dri bzang por gyur cing me tog gi phreng bar gyur nas thams cad legs so zhes brjod par gyur to/_/de'i tshe rtswa 'tshong bkra shis zhes bya bas rtswa blangs nas lam gyi sngon du 'ongs te skyes bu chen po'i rnam 'gyur rtogs 
[\[232b.7\]]nas rtswa spar mo brgyad phul lo/_/byang chub sems dpas rtswa blangs nas byang chub kyi snying po dang nye bar gshegs te lho phyogs kyi char zhal byang du mngon par phyogs pas 'khod do/_/de ma thag par lho phyogs kyi khor yug gis bying nas 'gro ba ni 'og mnar med pa'i bar du gyur pa bzhin no/_/lho 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]phyogs kyi khor yug steng du langs nas 'gro ba ni srid pa'i rtse mor gyur pa bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpas 'di yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob pa'i gnas ma yin no zhes dgongs zhing bskor nas nub kyi phyogs kyi char gshegs te shar phyogs su mngon du phyogs 
[\[233a.2\]]pas 'khod do/_/de nas nub phyogs kyi khor yug 'og tu bying nas 'gro ba ni mnar med pa'i bar du gyur pa bzhin no/_/shar phyogs kyi khor yug steng du langs nas 'gro ba ni srid pa'i rtse mor gyur pa bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'khod cing 'khod pa'i gnas ni mu khyud kyi mthar thug par mnan 
[\[233a.3\]]zhing so sor gnas pa'i shing rta'i 'khor lo chen po lta bur sa gzhi chen po la bying zhing bying nas 'gro bar gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpas 'di ni byang chub thob pa'i gnas ma yin no zhes bskor nas byang phyogs kyi char gshegs te/_lho phyogs su sngun du phyogs pas 'khod do/_/de nas byang gi khor yug 
[\[233a.4\]]sa la bying nas mnar med kyi bar du gyur pa bzhin no/_/byang gi khor yug gyen du langs nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du gyur pa bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpas 'di ni byang chub thob pa'i gnas ma yin no zhes bsams te bskor nas shar phyogs kyi char gshegs nas nub phyogs su sngun du phyogs pas 'khod 
[\[233a.5\]]do/_/slar yang shar phyogs kyi char sangs rgyas thams cad kyis skyil krung bcas pa'i gnas de g.yo bar mi 'gyur zhing mi ldeg go/_/sems dpa' chen pos 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma spangs shing mi g.yo ba'i gnas/_nyon mongs pa'i dra ba thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i gnas su rtogs so/_/
[\[233a.6\]]de'i rtswa rnams rtse mo nas bzung ste bkram nas de ma thag tu khru bcu bzhi pa'i tshad tsam gyi gdan du gyur to/_/de yang de lta bu'i tshul gyis ji ltar bzhag pa de bzhin du mi gnas so/_/ji ltar gzugs la mkhas pa'i ri mo byed pa rnams kyis ri mo bris pa bzhin du byang chub sems dpas byang chub shing gi sdong po 
[\[233a.7\]]la sku rgyab brten par byas nas zhal shar du mngon du phyogs par mdzad do/_/brtan pa'i sems su gyur nas bdag gi pags pa dang rgyus pa dang rus pa dang khrag dang sha rnams skams par gyur kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma thob bar du ni stan 'di las lus bskyod par mi bya'o/_/thog brgya 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]phrag babs kyang mi phyed cing pha rol gyis mi tshugs par stan la skyil krung gis bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe lha'i bu'i bdud kyis gzhon nu don grub bdag gi dbang du byed par 'dod pas da ni bdag las 'da' bar byed du mi ster ro zhes bsams nas bdud kyi dmag dang nye bar song ste/_don 'di smras shing 
[\[233b.2\]]bdud kyi sgra zhes pas sgra bsgrags nas bdud kyi dmag khrid de 'thon nas/_bdud kyi sde bdud kyi mdun du dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi sar 'gro'o/_/g.yas phyogs g.yon phyogs rnams su dpag tshad bcu gnyis 'gro'o/_/rgyab phyogs su ji srid khor yug gi mthar thug par byas nas gnas 
[\[233b.3\]]so/_/steng du dpag tshad dgu'o/_/'khor thams cad kyi gtam byed pa'i sgra dpag tshad stong phrag gcig gi bar du sa gzhi 'bugs pa tsam gyi sgra thos so/_/de nas lha'i bu'i bdud dpag tshad phyed dang nyis brgya'i ri'i 'og pag zhes bya ba'i glang po che'i rgyab tu zhon nas lag pa stong phrag 
[\[233b.4\]]gcig sprul nas mtshon cha sna tshogs pa blangs so/_/gzhan yang bdud kyi 'khor gyi grogs gnyis gcig dang mtshungs par mtshon cha'i rigs gnyis mi len no/_/kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i gdong can sems dpa' chen po gzhom par bya ba'i phyir 'ongs so/_/
[\[233b.5\]]stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi lha rnams slar yang sems dpa' chen po la bstod pa byed cing gnas so/_/brgya byin lha'i rgyal pos rnam par rgyal ba bla na med pa'i dung 'bud cing 'khod do/_/slar yang dung de khru brgya nyi shur gyur to/_/gal te legs par bus na zla ba bzhi'i bar du rgyun mi 'chad 
[\[233b.6\]]cing de nas rgyun 'chad do/_/klu'i rgyal po nag po chen pos brgya phrag du ma'i bstod pa byed cing gnas so/_/tshangs pa chen po gdugs dkar po bzung nas gnas so/_/slar yang bdud kyi dmag byang chub kyi snying por 'ongs shing 'ongs so/_/lha de rnams gcig tu 'khod par ma nus pas rang gi 
[\[233b.7\]]gnas su bros nas song ngo /_/klu'i rgyal po nag po sa la bying nas dpag tshad lnga brgya'i snye ma can gyi klu'i pho brang du song ste/_lag pa gnyis kha la bkab nas nyal lo/_/brgya byin gyi rnam par rgyal ba bla na med pa'i dung rgyab tu bkal te khor yug gi steng du 'khod do/_/tshangs pa chen pos 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]gdugs dkar po khor yug gi steng du btsugs nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du song ngo /_/lha gcig gis kyang 'khod par ma nus te/_skyes bu chen po nyid gcig pu bzhugs so/_/bdud kyis rang gi 'khor la smras pa/_bu zas gtsang gi bu don grub dang 'dra ba'i skyes bu gzhan med 
[\[234a.2\]]pas/_bdag gis de'i mdun du g.yul 'gyed par mi nus kyis/_rgyab kyi phyogs su g.yul bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/skyes bu chen pos kyang phyogs gsum la gzigs pas lha thams cad bros pa'i phyir gnas thams cad stong par mthong ngo /_/gzhan yang byang phyogs su gzigs pas bdud kyi dmag 
[\[234a.3\]]rnams bdag gzhom pa'i phyir 'ong ba gzigs so/_/'di rnams kyi dmag gi tshogs bdag gcig pu'i phyir rtsol ba chen pos pha rol gnon par byed cing gnas 'dir 'ongs te/_bdag gi ma'am pha'am spun nam su yang rung ba'i gnyen las gzhan med do/_/gzhan yang gang gi phyir pha rol du 
[\[234a.4\]]phyin pa bcu po nyid bdag gis dus yun ring por gnyer la dga' ba bzhin goms pa de'i phyir bdag gis pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyis phub byas nas/_pha rol du phyin pa nyid kyi mtshon thogs te/_'di'i dmag gi tshogs rnams gzhom par rigs so snyam nas pha rol du phyin pa bcu po thugs la 
[\[234a.5\]]bsams nas bzhugs so/_/de nas lha'i bu'i bdud kyis don grub de ma thag tu 'bros par byed par rigs so zhes smras nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor nye bar gnas nas 'ongs so/_/de ma thag kho nar shar phyogs la sogs pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor rnams langs nas 'ongs te dpag tshad phyed dang yang gnyis la 
[\[234a.6\]]sogs pa'i tshad kyi ri'i phung po blangs nas nags thibs po dang shing la sogs pa sa la bton zhing /_thams cad du grong dang grong rdal phye ma dang rnam par phye mar byed pa'i nus pa ni skyes bu chen po'i bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyi mthus gyes te/_byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs nas bla gos kyi grwa 
[\[234a.7\]]tsam yang bsgul bar mi nus so/_/de nas chu yis gzhom pa'i phyir 'ongs nas gsod par bsams pa na char pa chen po 'bab cing gnas so/_/de'i mthus steng nas steng du brgya phrag du ma brtsegs pa dang /_stong phrag du ma brtsegs pa'i sprin chen po 'dus nas char 'bebs so/_/char pa'i rgyun 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]gyi shugs kyis sa gzhi 'bugs par gyur to/_/nags tshal dang shing la sogs pa'i steng gi char sprin chen po 'ongs nas sems dpa' chen po chu thigs gcig tsam gyis kyang sbang bar ma nus so/_/de nas rdo'i char bkug nas ches che ba'i ri'i phung po du bar byed cing 'bar bar byas nas nam mkha' 
[\[234b.2\]]nas 'ongs te byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs nas/_lha'i me tog gi chun bu'i gzugs 'bab bo/_/de nas mtshon cha'i char thams cad bkug nas mtshon so gcig pa dang so gnyis pa dang ral gri dang mdung thung dang spu gri la sogs pa'i mtshon cha rnams du bar byed cing 'bar bar byas nas nam mkha' las 'ongs te/_
[\[234b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa'i drung du 'ongs nas lha'i me tog tu gyur to/_/de nas sol ba'i char bkug nas rgya skyegs kyi me tog gi kha dog can gyi sol ba nam mkha' nas 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs drung du lha'i me tog tu gyur nas 'bab bo/_/de nas thal ba'i char pa rnams bkug nas shin tu 
[\[234b.4\]]dro ba me'i kha dog can gyi thal ba nam mkha' nas 'ongs nas byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs drung du tsan dan gyi phye ma ltar gyur pa'i char 'bab bo/_/de nas bye ma'i mar bkug nas shin tu phra ba'i bye ma rnams du bar byed cing 'bar bar byas nas nam mkha' nas 'ongs te byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs drung du 
[\[234b.5\]]lha'i phye ma ltar gyur nas char 'bab bo/_/de nas 'jim pa'i char pa rnams bkug nas 'jim pa rnams du bar byed cing 'bar bar byas nas nam mkha' nas 'ongs te byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs drung du lha'i byug par gyur nas 'bab bo/_/de nas 'di bzhin du 'jigs par byed pas don grub 
[\[234b.6\]]'bros par bya ba'i phyir mun pa nye bar gnas par bya'o/_/de ni yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa'i mun nag chen por gyur nas byang chub sems dpa'i drung du sleb nas nyi ma'i 'od kyis mun pa bcom pa bzhin du mi snang bar gyur nas 'di ltar bdud dgu po 'di rlung dang char dang rdo dang mtshon cha dang sol ba 
[\[234b.7\]]dang thal ba dang bye ma dang 'jim pa dang mun pa ste/_de rnams char du babs nas byang chub sems dpa' 'bros par byed par ma nus so/_/cis brjod cing ci'i phyir sdod/_gzhon nu 'di la zung cig rgyob cig thon cig ces 'khor rnams bos nas rang gis kyang ri'i 'og pag glang po che'i rgyab tu 
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]zhon nas 'khor lo'i mtshon cha bslangs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i drung du nye bar 'ongs nas don grub stan las longs shig_/'di khyod la rigs pa ma yin gyi nged la rigs pa yin no zhes smras so/_/sems dpa' chen pos de'i tshig thos nas 'di ltar smras so/_/bdud khyod kyis pha 
[\[235a.2\]]rol tu phyin pa bcu ma rdzogs pa dang /_nye ba'i pha rol du phyin pa ma rdzogs pa dang /_don dam pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma rdzogs pa dang /_chen po lnga yongs su gtong ba med pa dang /_gnyen gyi don du spyod pa med pa dang /_'jig rten gyi don gyi spyod pa med pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yongs 
[\[235a.3\]]su ma rdzogs pas stan 'di khyod la rigs pa ma yin no/_/stan 'di bdag kho na la rigs pa yin no/_/bdud khros par gyur nas khros pa'i shugs bsran par ma nus te/_skyes bu chen po la mtshon cha'i 'khor lo 'phangs so/_/de'i pha rol du phyin pa bcu sems par byed cing bzhugs pa na 
[\[235a.4\]]steng gi char me tog gi phreng ba'i bla res bres pa bzhin du gyur to/_/de'i 'khor lo'i mtshon cha gzhan la de shin tu khros pas 'phangs te rdo ba mthug po'am/_rdo ba mthug po'i ka ba 'bugs shing 'gro ba'o/_/slar yang de ni de'i me tog gi bla res su gyur nas gnas pa na bdud kyi 'khor lhag ma rnams de 
[\[235a.5\]]nas stan las langs te 'gro bar bsams nas ches che ba'i ri'i phung po 'phangs so/_/de rnams kyang skyes bu chen po'i pha rol du phyin pa bcu la sems shing bzhugs pa na me tog gi chun por gyur nas sa la lhung ngo /_/lha rnams khor yug gi mthar 'khod pa rnams ske bteg nas blta zhing /_mgo 
[\[235a.6\]]bo bteg cing bteg nas don grub gzhon nu mchog gi sku'i bdag nyid nyams sam snyam nas ci byed na zhes bsams shing blta'o/_/de nas skyes bu chen pos pha rol du phyin pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i nyin mo thob pa'i stan bdag la rigs pa yin 
[\[235a.7\]]no zhes bshad nas/_'khod pa'i bdud la smras so/_/bdud khyod kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i dpang po su yod ces smras so/_/bdud 'di rnams thams cad bdag gi dpang po yin no zhes bdud kyi dmag rnams la lag pa brkyang ngo /_/de ma thag par bdud kyi 'khor rnams nga yang dpang po yin nga 
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]yang dpang po yin zhes brjod pa'i sgras sa gzhi yang ral ba bzhin du brjod pa'i sgrar gyur to/_/de nas bdud kyis skyes bu chen po la smras pa/_don grub khyod kyis sbyin pa btang ba'i dngos po la dpang po su yod ces smras so/_/skyes bu chen po khyod kyis re zhig sbyin pa byin pa'i dngos po la sems 
[\[235b.2\]]dang bcas pa rnams dpang po yin no/_/slar yang bdag la gnas 'di na sems dang bcas pa'i dpang po su yang med pas bdag nyid kyis skye ba'i mthar sbyin pa btang ba de srid gnas pa thams cad sgrol gyi lus kyi bdag nyid la gnas nas sbyin pa chen po bdun brgya pa bdun byin pa'i dngos po la sems med pa'i 
[\[235b.3\]]sa gzhi chen po mthug po 'di dpang po yin no zhes chos gos kyi nang nas phyag g.yas pa bton te/_thams cad sgrol gyi bdag nyid kyi lus su gnas nas bdag gis sbyin pa bdun brgya pa bdun byin pa'i dngos po de la khyod kyis dpang po yin nam ma yin pa smros shig ces sa chen po la mngon du phyogs pas phyag 
[\[235b.4\]]brkyang ba dang /_sa chen pos bdag ni de'i tshe dpang po yin no zhes sgra sgrogs par gyur nas/_sgra chen po sgrogs pa brgya dang stong phrag gcig dang /_sgra chen po 'bum phrag gcig po rnams kyis bdud kyi dmag gi sgra rnams zil gyis mnan pa bzhin du gyur to/_/de nas skyes bu chen po don grub kyi sbyin pa 
[\[235b.5\]]chen po byin pa ni mchog gi sbyin pa'o zhes thams cad sgrol gyi sbyin pa dran par byed cing dpag tshad phyed dang nyis brgya'i ri'i 'og pag gi glang po che pus mo sa la btsugs nas 'khod do/_/bdud kyi 'khor rnams phyogs dang mtshams rnams su bros nas gnyis lam gcig la 'gro ba med do/_/mgo'i rgyan 
[\[235b.6\]]nyid dang gyon pa'i gos dang por dor nas rang gi phyogs phyogs nyid du 'bros so/_/de nas lha'i tshogs rnams kyis bdud bros nas 'gro ba mthong ste/_bdud rnams pham pas don grub gzhon nu rgyal bar gyur to zhes rgyal ba'i mchod pa byed par sems so/_/klu ni klu rnams la bskul lo/_/'dab 
[\[235b.7\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ni 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnams la'o/_/lha ni lha rnams la'o/_/tshangs pas ni tshangs pa rnams bskul lo/_/spos dang me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pa lag tu thogs nas byang chub shing gi drung du skyil krung gis bzhugs pa'i skyes bu chen po dang nye bar 'ongs so/_/de ltar bdud rnams bros 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]nas song ngo /_/dpal ldan sangs rgyas rgyal bar gyur/_/sdig can bdud ni pham par gyur/_/rab dga' byang chub snying por sgrogs/_/de tshe drang srong klu tshogs rgyal/_/dpal ldan sangs rgyas rgyal bar gyur/_/sdig can bdud ni pham par gyur/_/rab dga' byang chub snying por 
[\[236a.2\]]sgrogs/_/'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]tshogs kyi drang srong rgyal/_/dpal ldan sangs rgyas rgyal bar gyur/_/sdig can bdud ni pham par gyur/_/rab dga' byang chub snying por sgrogs/_/lha tshogs de tshe drang srong rgyal/_/dpal ldan sangs rgyas rgyal bar gyur/_/sdig can bdud ni pham par gyur/_/rab 
[\[236a.3\]]dga' byang chub snying por sgrogs/_/tshangs tshogs de tshe rgyal bar sgrogs/_/mthar stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi lha rnams kyis me tog dang spos dang byug pa rnams kyis mchod par byed do/_/rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i bstod pa byed cing 'khod do/_/'di ltar skyes bu chen po nyi ma nub pa'i tshe bdud 
[\[236a.4\]]rnam par bcom nas chos gos kyi steng du byang chub kyi shing gi 'dab ma myu gu lta bu lhung zhing byi ru dmar pos mchod par byed pa lta bu'o/_/thun dang po la sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa ye shes kyis rtogs pa dang /_thun bar pa la lha'i spyan rnam par dag pas ye shes thob pa dang /_thun tha ma 
[\[236a.5\]]la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ye shes thob bo/_/de nas rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi rkyen gyis rnam par 'jug pa dang mi 'jug pa'i lugs las 'byung ba dang lugs las bzlog pa dran par byed cing dran par byed do/_/stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chu'i mthar thug par byas nas lan bcu 
[\[236a.6\]]gnyis su yang dag par g.yos so/_/slar yang skyes bu chen pos stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sgra chen po sgrogs shing skya rengs shar ba'i dus su thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so sor myong ngo /_/stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad brgyan bzhin du rigs par gyur to/_/
[\[236a.7\]]shar phyogs kyi khor yug gi steng du rgyal mtshan dang ba dan btsugs pa'i sham bus nub kyi khor yug gi steng du chags so/_/de bzhin du nub kyi phyogs kyi khor yug gi mtha'i steng du rgyal mtshan dang ba dan btsugs pa'i sham bus shar gyi khor yug gi steng du chags so/_/byang gi phyogs kyi khor 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]yug gi steng du rgyal mtshan dang ba dan btsugs pa'i sham bus lho'i khor yug gi steng du chags so/_/lho'i phyogs kyi khor yug gi steng du rgyal mtshan dang ba dan btsugs pa'i sham bus byang gi khor yug gi steng du chags so/_/sa gzhi las langs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan tshangs pa'i gnas su chags so/_/
[\[236b.2\]]tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi gnas su bcings pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sa gzhi'i steng du chags so/_/stong phrag bcu'i khor yug la me tog gi shing la me tog kha bye'o/_/'bras bu'i shing la 'bras bu mang por gyur to/_/sdong po rnams la sdong po'i pad ma'i me tog kha bye'o/_/yal ga rnams la yal 
[\[236b.3\]]ga'i pad ma'i me tog go/_/'khri shing rnams la 'khri shing gi pad ma'i me tog go/_/nam mkha' nas thur du pad ma'i me tog 'phyang ngo /_/thang dang rdo'i steng du brtol nas steng nas steng du bdun bdun du gyur te rgyun chags pa'i pad ma'i me tog ces bya ba phyung ngo /_/stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[236b.4\]]khams khyad par du 'phags pa'i me tog gi gdan bzhin du gyur to/_/khor yug gi bar dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad kyi 'jig rten gyi bar gyi dmyal ba nyi ma bdun gyi 'od kyis kyang snang bar byed pa med pas na dkon no/_/de dang mtshungs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar gyi dmyal ba de ma thag tu snang bar gyur to/_/
[\[236b.5\]]dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong tsam gyis zab pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i chu dngar por gyur to/_/chu klung rnams ni 'gro bar gnas so/_/dmus long rnams kyi mig gis gzugs mthong ngo /_/'on pa rnams kyi rna bas sgra thos so/_/gong po rnams kyis 'gro shes par gyur to/_/bcings pa'i 
[\[236b.6\]]sems can rnams ni rjes su bcings pa las grol bar gyur to/_/'di ltar tshad med pa'i dpal du gyur nas mchod pa dang ya mtshan pa'i chos rab tu skyes so/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so sor rig go/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bshad pa ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/_/skye 
[\[236b.7\]]ba'i 'khor ba ma lus pa/_/dug med rnam par dug med tshol/_/khyim med pa ni tshol ba na/_/skye ba'i sdug bsngal yang yang dang /_/khyim med pa ni mthong bar gyur/_/slar yang khyim ni byed pa med/_/de yi sdug bsngal thams cad bcom/_/dug gi ming can khyim 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]gyi phung /_/sems ni 'du byed pa las grol/_/sred pa zad nas med par gyur/_/zhes pa 'di ni dga' ldan gyi pho brang du gnas pa nas bzung ste ji srid byang chub snying po 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa thob pa de rnams kyi gnas ni gleng gzhi bar ma zhes bya ba yin no//_//gzhan yang nye ba'i gleng gzhi 
[\[237a.2\]]ni bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i gnas su bzhugs pa dang /_yangs pa can gyi nags tshal chen po khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas su bzhugs so/_/de ltar de dang de'i gnas rnams su bzhugs shing de dang de'i gnas nyid thob ces brjod do/_/gang 
[\[237a.3\]]ci yang 'di ltar brjod pa de nas yang de dang po nas bzung nas 'di ltar rig par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas ched du brjod cing ched du brjod pa de lta bu'i sems skyes so/_/bdag gis bskal pa grangs med pa bzhi dang 'bum phrag gcig lhag pa nas skyil krung bcas pa 'di'i ched du dus 'di rnams 
[\[237a.4\]]la bdag gi mgo rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i mgrin pa nas bregs te sbyin par btang ba dang /_spyan bzang po btang ba dang /_snying gi sha bregs nas btang ba dang /_gzhon nu dra ba 'dzin dang 'dra ba'i bu sbyin par btang ba dang /_kriSh+Na dzi na'i gzhon nu ma dang mtshungs pa'i bu mo sbyin par btang ba dang /_lha 
[\[237a.5\]]mo ma kri dang mtshungs pa'i chung ma rnams gzhan gyi bran gyi phyir sbyin par btang ngo /_/'di ni bdag gi 'dug stangs yin no/_/rgyal ba'i 'dug stangs yin no/_/mchog gi 'dug stangs yin no/_/'di la bdag bzhugs nas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs so/_/re zhig stan 'di las 
[\[237a.6\]]bdag mi ldang ngo snyam du bsams nas bye ba 'bum phrag du ma la snyoms par zhugs nas mnyam par gnas te zhag bdun du de nyid du bzhugs so/_/de'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhag bdun du 'dug stangs gcig gis bzhugs so/_/rnam par grol ba dang bde ba 
[\[237a.7\]]so sor rig cing bzhugs so/_/gzhan yang lha gang dang gang zhig da dung yang nges par don grub la bya ba yod dam 'dug stangs 'di la zhen pa ma spang ba dang rnam par rtog pa yongs su bskyed do zhes bsams nas ston pas lha rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa mkhyen nas/_de rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa nye 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug nas so sor cho 'phrul bstan to/_/byang chub kyi snying por mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_nye du dang 'dus pa'i dus su mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_klog pa'i mdo dang 'dus par mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad a mra srung ba dang a mra'i shing gi drung 
[\[237b.2\]]du mdzad pa'i so so'i cho 'phrul dang mtshungs par gyur to/_/'di ltar ston pas 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul mdzad nas lha rnams kyi rnam par rtog pa nye bar zhi bar mdzad do/_/'dug stangs kyis byang shar gyi char 'khod de 'di'i 'dug stangs kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so sor rtog par byed 
[\[237b.3\]]do/_/bskal pa grangs med pa bzhi dang 'bum phrag gcig gis pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu lhag par rtogs pa'i 'dug stangs kyis mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing zhag bdun du 'khod do/_/de'i gnas su mig mi 'dzums pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/de nas 
[\[237b.4\]]'dug stangs la 'khod pa'i gnas kyi bar du 'chag par byas nas shar dang nub tu rin po che la 'chag pas zhag bdun du 'khod do/_/gnas der rin po che la 'chag pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/gzhan yang zhag bdun pa bzhi pa la byang chub shing gi byang shar gyi char lha rnams kyis rin 
[\[237b.5\]]po che'i khang pa sprul lo/_/der 'dug stangs kyis bzhugs nas chos mngon pa'i sde snod ma lus par 'di rnams mtha' yas pa'i tshul gyis kun gnas par sems shing zhag bdun bzhugs so/_/chos mngon pa pa slar yang 'di skad smra'o/_/rin po che'i khang pa zhes bya ba rin po che las byung 
[\[237b.6\]]ba'i khang pa yin no zhes zer ro/_/sdud par byed pa po rnams slar yang 'di skad gsung ste/_rab tu byed pa bdun gyi chos mngon pa rjes su dran par byed pa'i rin po che'i khang pa yin zhes gsung ngo /_/gang gi phyir slar yang 'dir tshig gnyis ka yang 'thad do/_/de'i phyir 'di gnyis ka 
[\[237b.7\]]yang gzung bar bya'o/_/de nas slar yang gnas de rin po che'i khang pa'i mchod rten zhes bya ba byung ngo /_/'di ltar byang chub shing dang nye ba nyid du zhag bdun pa bzhi pa song nas zhag bdun pa lnga pa la byang chub shing gi drung nas ra lug skyong ba'i shing n+ya gro d+ha dang nye bar gshegs nas der yang chos la 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]rnam par sems pa nyid kyis rnam par grol ba dang bde bas so sor rig par mdzad nas bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe lha'i bu'i bdud dus 'di rnams kyi phyi ma la grib ma bzhin du phyogs gang du'ang ma spangs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' la skyon cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo /_/da ni nga'i dbang du bya 
[\[238a.2\]]ba las 'das pas yid mi bde ba thob par gyur cing lam chen por gnas nas rnam pa bcu drug gi rgyu mtshan la sems shing sa la ri mo bcu drug 'dri'o/_/bdag gis 'di bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa ma rdzogs pa de'i phyir bdag 'di dang 'dra bar ma gyur to zhes ri mo gcig bris so/_/de bzhin du 
[\[238a.3\]]bdag 'di dang mtshungs par tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_nges 'byung gi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_bden pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_lhag par gnas pa'i pha rol du 
[\[238a.4\]]phyin pa dang /_byams pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_btang snyoms kyi pha rol du phyin pa rnams ma rdzogs so/_/de'i phyir bdag 'di dang mtshungs par ma gyur to snyam nas ri mo bcu bris so/_/bdag 'di dang mtshungs pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i dbang po mchog gi gong ma'i ye shes so sor rig pa nye bar gnas 
[\[238a.5\]]par gyur pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bcu ma rdzogs pa de'i phyir bdag 'di dang mtshungs par ma gyur to snyam nas ri mo bcu drug bris so/_/de bzhin du bdag 'di dang mtshungs pa'i thun mong ma yin pa'i bsam pa'i bag la nyal dang ye shes kyi thugs rje chen po dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye 
[\[238a.6\]]shes dang /_so sor cho 'phrul gyi ye shes dang sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so sor gnas pa nye bar gnas par gyur pa'i pha rol du phyin pa bcu ma rdzogs pa'i de'i phyir bdag 'di dang mtshungs par ma gyur to snyam nas ri mo bcu drug bris so/_/'di ltar 'di'i 
[\[238a.7\]]rgyu mtshan sems shing lam chen por ri mo bcu drug bris nas gnas so/_/de'i tshe sred ma dang /_kun du dga' ma dang /_dga' ma sde gsum po ni bdud kyi bu mo bdag cag gi pha ni ma mthong bar gyur pas de ma thag par gan yod dam zhes blta zhing rgyu ba na de yid mi bde ba thob par gyur te/_sa 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]la ri mo byed pa mthong nas pha dang nye bar song ste pha gang gi phyir sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar byed ces dris so/_/bu mo dge sbyong chen po 'di bdag gi dbang du byed pa las 'das so zhes 'di rnams kyi dus su bltas pas skyon cung zad kyang ma mthong ngo /_/de'i phyir bdag sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ba skyes 
[\[238b.2\]]so/_/'di ltar gyur na de ltar ma bsams shig_/bdag cag gsum gyis de dbang du byas nas khrid la 'ong ngo /_/smras pa/_bu mos mi nus te sus kyang dbang du bya bar mi nus pas skyes bu 'di ni mi g.yo ba'i dad pa la gnas so/_/smras pa/_pha bdag cag bud med yin pas da lta nyid du de la 
[\[238b.3\]]'dod chags kyi zhags pas bcings te khrid la 'ong ngo /_/khyed ma sems shig_/de nas bud med de rnams/_bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar song ste dge sbyong khyed kyi zhabs la bsnyen bkur bdag cag gis bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis de rnams kyi tshig la thugs ma gtad do/_/
[\[238b.4\]]spyan rnam par grol ba yang ma gzigs so/_/ji ltar de bla na med pa'i nye bar skye ba zad pa rnam par grol ba'i bsam pas dben pa'i bde ba nyid la nyams su myong bar mdzad cing bzhugs so/_/gzhan yang bdud kyi bu mo bsam pa mang zhing skyes bu dang mtshungs pa'i sems so/_/gang dang gang 
[\[238b.5\]]gzhon nu la dga' bar gyur pa dang /_gang dang gang zhig na tshod dang por gyur pa la dga' ba dang /_gang dang gang zhig na tshod bar mar gyur pa la dga' ba dang /_gang dang gang zhig na tshod phyi mar gyur pa la dga' ba'o/_/bdag gis de lta bu'i rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i 'od la chags par bgyi'o zhes 
[\[238b.6\]]smas nas/_bu mo re res gzhon nu ma'i gzugs la sogs pa'i brgya phrag brgya phrag gis bdag nyid kyi lus sprul lo/_/gzhon nu ma'i gzugs dang lang tsho ma'i gzugs dang /_dang po bu dang bu mo lan cig skyes pa'i gzugs dang /_bar ma'i bud med kyi gzugs dang /_lus rags mor gyur 
[\[238b.7\]]nas lan drug tu bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar song nas dge sbyong khyod kyi zhabs la bdag cag gis bsnyen bkur bgyi'o zhes smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams kyi tshig la yang thugs ma gtad do/_/ji ltar de bla na med pa'i nye bar skye ba rnam par grol lo/_/gzhan yang slob dpon 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]gang zhig 'di skad smra'o/_/de rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas bud med 'ongs pa la blta zhing bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i gzugs kyis 'di rnams so byi ba dang /_skra dkar por gyur par byin gyis brlabs so zhes zer ro/_/de'i tshig gzung bar mi bya'o/_/ston pas 'di lta bu'i 
[\[239a.2\]]gzugs su byin gyis brlabs par ma mdzad do/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ci mthong 'di lta bu'i 'bad pa byed pa da song cig_/'di lta bu'i tshul gyis 'dod chags dang ma bral ba la sogs pa'i mdun du bya bar rigs so/_/de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang 'dod chags spangs shing 
[\[239a.3\]]nyes pa spangs pa dang gti mug spangs pas rang gi 'dod chags spangs pa'i phyir ro/_/gang zhig rgyal ba de la rgyal mi nus/_/gang zhig 'jig rten 'dir ni rgyal mi 'gyur/_/mtha' yas sangs rgyas spyod yul de mi gnas/_/rkang med kyis ni rkang yod la mi nus/_/gang gi srid pa'i dra ba 
[\[239a.4\]]bton gyur nas/_/de la sred pa rnams ni cung zad med/_/mtha' yas sangs rgyas spyod yul de nyid la/_/rkang med de yis rkang yod la mi nus/_/'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos mchog gi sde las tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs nas chos bstan to/_/bu mo rnams la pha zer ba yang bden 
[\[239a.5\]]pa yin no/_/dgra bcom pa bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mi'i mchog yin no zhes smras nas lha dang nye bar song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'dir zhag bdun bzhugs nas btang bzung gi gnas su gshegs so/_/der zhag bdun du sku la yul ngan dang grang ba zhi bar bya ba'i phyir 
[\[239a.6\]]klu'i rgyal po btang bzung zhes bya bas lus kyis lan bdun du dkris nas gdengs ka byas so/_/dri'i gtsang khang shin tu yangs par bzhugs pa bzhin rnam par grol ba dang bde ba so sor rig par byed cing zhag bdun du bzhugs nas shing rA dza ya ta na dang nye bar gshegs so/_/der yang rnam 
[\[239a.7\]]par grol ba dang bde ba so sor rig par byed pa nyid kyis bzhugs so/_/de rnams kyis re zhig zhag bdun phrag bdun yongs su rdzogs so/_/de rnams kyi bar du zhal shol ba med pa dang sku la byi dor byed pa med pa dang zhal zas gsol ba med par gyur to/_/bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang /_
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]lam gyi bde ba dang /_'bras bu'i bde ba nyid kyis nyin mtshan 'da'o/_/de nas de'i bdun phrag bdun gyi mthar gcig gis dman pa'i lnga bcu'i mtha'i nyi ma la der bzhugs nas zhal shol ba'i thugs skyes so/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis a ru ra mchog blangs nas phul lo/_/
[\[239b.2\]]ston pas de gsol bas sku dngas par gyur to/_/de nas brgya byin nyid kyis so rtsi'i so shing nyid kyi so shing dang /_zhal shol ba'i chu phul lo/_/ston pas so shing blangs nas sa brud de mtsho chen po ma dros pa'i chus zhal bshal lo/_/de nyid du shing rA dza ya ta na'i drung du bzhugs so/_/de'i 
[\[239b.3\]]tshe ga gon dang bzang po zhes bya ba'i tshong dpon gnyis shing rta lnga brgya dang bcas pa lho phyogs kyi ljongs nas yul dbus su 'gro ba na rang nyid kyi sngar gyi gnyen lhar gyur pas shing rta thams cad bying nas 'gro bar mi nus par byin gyis brlabs pas ston pa la kha zas ster ba'i phyir spro ba skyes so/_/sbrang bsrubs 
[\[239b.4\]]pa'i khur ba'i gong bu blangs nas btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bza' ba 'di thugs rje chen po skyed la so sor bzhes par zhu zhes ston pa'i drung du nye bar 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'o thug bzhes pa'i nyin mo nyid lhung bzed mi snang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yang phyag gis len nam 'on kyang lhung bzed 
[\[239b.5\]]kyis blang zhes bsams so/_/de nas sems kyis shes nas phyogs bzhi'i rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis nor bu in dra nI la'i lhung bzed blangs pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gnang ngo /_/slar yang sran ma mud ga'i kha dog can gyi rdo las byung ba'i lhung bzed bzhi phul lo/_/bcom ldan 
[\[239b.6\]]'das kyis lha'i bu bzhi po rnams la rjes su brtse bas lhung bzed bzhi po bzhes te steng nas steng du brtsegs nas bzhag ste gcig tu 'gyur bar byin gyis brlabs so/_/bzhi po yang blta ba'i phyir du kha la ri mo bzhir gyur te lhung bzed 'bring po'i tshad gcig tu gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das la de'i so 
[\[239b.7\]]sor phul ba rin thang med pa'i rdo las byung ba'i lhung bzed du bza' ba'i phyir du bzhes nas yongs su longs spyad nas rjes su yi rang bar mdzad do/_/tshong dpon spun gnyis sangs rgyas dang chos la skyabs su 'gro zhing tshigs gnyis pa'i dge bsnyen du gyur to/_/de nas de rnams kyis btsun pa mchod pa 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]bya bar rigs pa'i dngos po gcig bslang zhes zhus so/_/de nas phyag g.yas pa rang gi mgo la byugs nas skra'i gdung gnang ngo /_/de dag gis rang gi grong khyer du khyer song nas mchod rten bzhengs so/_/yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang de nas bzhengs nas slar yang ra lug skyong ba'i 
[\[240a.2\]]shing n+ya gro d+ha nyid du gshegs nas n+ya gro d+ha'i drung du bzhugs so/_/de nas de nyid du bzhugs tsam nyid na rang gis lhag par rtogs pa'i zab mo'i chos so sor bsam zhing sangs rgyas rnams kyis lhag par rtogs pa 'di ni chos so/_/gzhan gyis chos ston par mi nus par bsams nas rab tu 'jug pa'i rnam 
[\[240a.3\]]pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyes so/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'jig rten nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bsams nas stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi brgya byin dang /_'thab bral bzang po dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang phyug dang /_tshangs pa chen po rnams khrid nas ston 
[\[240a.4\]]pa'i drung du phyin nas/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos bstan du gsol/_dang po'i tshul gyis chos bstan du gsol zhes zhus so/_/ston pas de rnams la gnang ba byin no/_/gang zhig la bdag gis dang por chos bstan par bya'o zhes dgongs shing mkhas pa kun len de'i chos 'di myur du shes par 
[\[240a.5\]]'gyur ba'i thugs skyes so/_/slar yang gzigs te de dus las 'das nas zhag bdun lon par rtogs so/_/'char byed la brtags pas de yang dus las 'das par mkhyen no/_/dge slong lnga sdes bdag la bsnyen bkur mang po byas pas lnga sde'i ched du bsams nas de rnams gang na gnas pa yin zhes 
[\[240a.6\]]brtags so/_/grong khyer bA rA Na sI'i [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]rgyu ba'i nags tshal na yod par mkhyen no/_/der gshegs nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro zhes dgongs nas zhag 'ga' zhig tu byang chub kyi snying po kun du nye ba nyid du bsod snyoms mdzad cing bzhugs nas dbyar zla 'bring po'i nya la grong khyer bA rA Na sIr gshegs 
[\[240a.7\]]par dgongs nas tshes bcu bzhi'i mtshan gyi mthar nam langs pa na shin tu snga ba nyid du lhung bzed dang snam sbyar bsnams nas dpag tshad [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yod pa'i lam la gshegs shing lam gyi bar du nye bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i 'tsho byed gcig gzigs so/_/de la rang gi sangs rgyas su gyur pa bshad 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]do/_/nyi ma de nyid la srod kyi dus su drang srong lhung ba'i gnas su gshegs so/_/gnas brtan lnga sdes de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa ring po nyid nas mthong ste/_dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di bza' ba mang po'i phyir lus yongs su rdzogs par gyur/_dbang po yongs su rdzogs par gyur/_gser gyi kha dog tu 
[\[240b.2\]]gyur nas 'ongs kyis/_'di la phyag la sogs pa mi bya'o/_/'di rigs chen por skyes pa yin pas gdan shom pa tsam 'os so/_/de'i phyir gdan tsam rigs so zhes gtam byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams kyi sems dang spyod pa shes par nus pa'i ye shes 
[\[240b.3\]]yod do/_/de yang 'di rnams ji ltar sems pa yin zhes bsams nas sems shes pa yin no/_/de nas lha dang mi thams cad la mthong ba med pa'i dbang gis thams cad du khyab par nus pa'i byams pa'i sems yang dag par bsdus nas/_ma mthong ba'i dbang gis byams pa'i sems 
[\[240b.4\]]kyis khyab par bcom ldan 'das kyis bsgoms nas de bzhin gshegs pa nye bar gshegs shing gshegs pa na/_sngar gyi bca' khrims rnams gnas par mi nus pas phyag phul zhing bsrung ba dang bsnyen bkur thams cad byas so/_/gzhan yang dge slong de rnams yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[240b.5\]]rgyas grub pa mi shes pa'i phyir ming brjod pa na tshe dang ldan pa zhes smra ba tha mal pa'i tshig gis rjod par byed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag bcom ldan 'das dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming dang tshe dang ldan pa zhes tha mal pa'i tshig brjod par mi rung ngo /_/dge slong dag nga ni de bzhin gshegs 
[\[240b.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas so zhes bdag nyid sangs rgyas sgrub par byed pa dang gdan bshams pa mchog la sangs rgyas bzhugs te/_rgyu skar bre mchog gsum 'dzom pa la bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi tshangs pa'i 'khor gyis bskor nas gnas brtan lnga sde bos te chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[240b.7\]]bskor ba'i mdo'i mthar bshad do/_/de rnams la gnas brtan kun shes kauDi n+yas bshad pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas ye shes thob pa mdo'i mthar bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi tshangs pa rnams kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/ston pas de nyid du dbyar bzhugs so/_/sngar yang nyi ma gnyis pa la 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]gnas brtan brlangs pa la chos sbyin no zhes gtsug lag khang du bzhugs so/_/lhag ma bzhi po bsod snyoms la song ngo /_/gnas brtan brlangs pas nyi ma phyed kyi nang du rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/'di lta bu'i thabs nyid kyis slar yang nyi ma phyi ma la gnas brtan bzang ldan dang /_slar yang nyi ma 
[\[241a.2\]]phyi ma la gnas brtan ming can dang /_slar yang nyi ma phyi ma la gnas brtan rta thul rnams de thams cad kyis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par byas nas tshes nyi shu la dge slong lnga po 'dus pa la bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi mdo sde rnams bshad do/_/bshad pa'i mthar gnas brtan lnga sdes dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[241a.3\]]thob bo/_/de nas ston pas rigs kyi bu grags pa nye bar mi rten par gzigs nas/_de'i mtshan mo'i char sdug bsngal ba'i sems kyis khyim spangs nas 'thon pa la grags pa 'dir shog ces bos nas mtshan mo de nyid kyi cha la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang slar yang nyi ma gnyis pa la dgra bcom pa'i 'bras 
[\[241a.4\]]bu grub par byed do/_/gzhan yang slar de'i grogs po lnga bcu rtsa bzhis rab tu byung zhing dge slong du gyur nas dgra bcom pa byed do/_/'di ltar 'jig rten du dgra bcom pa drug cu rtsa gcig tu gyur to/_/ston pas dbyar bzhugs nas dgag dbye byas te dge slong drug cu po rnams phyogs phyogs su btang 
[\[241a.5\]]nas/_rang nyid lteng rgyas su gshegs pa'i bar gyi lam na ras bal can gyi tshal ni dpag tshad bcu pa'o/_/gzhon nu bzang sde btul lo/_/de rnams las thams cad kyi mtha'i phyi ma rgyun du zhugs par gyur la/_thog ma ni phyir mi 'ong du gyur to/_/de rnams kyang dge slong gi gzugs kyis 
[\[241a.6\]]rab tu byung ba bgyis nas phyogs phyogs su btang ste lteng rgyas su gshegs so/_/stong phrag phyed dang gsum gyi cho 'phrul lta zhing lteng rgyas 'od srung la sogs pa'i spun gsum po dang ral pa can stong phrag gcig btul ba dge slong gi gzugs kyis rab tu byung bar byas nas ri bo ga ya'i rtse mo na sdod pa 
[\[241a.7\]]rnams la nyi ma'i rnam grangs kyi mdo sde bstan nas dgra bcom par byas te/_des dgra bcom pa stong phrag rnams 'khor du byas nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po la khas blangs byin pa dgrol bar bya ba'i dgongs pas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dang nye ba'i shing dngar gyi tshal du byon no/_/skyed mos tshal skyong 
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]ba rnams kyis ston pa byon no zhes rgyal po la smras so/_/rgyal pos thos te/_khri phrag bcu gnyis kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag 'khor du byas nas ston pa dang nye bar song ste 'khor lo sna tshogs pa'i steng du gser gyi bla re dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer phyogs phyogs su 'phro zhing bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[241b.2\]]pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag legs par byas nas 'khor dang bcas pa phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas yang bram ze rnams dang khyim bdag la sogs pa 'di lta bu'i sems su gyur te/_'on kyang dge sbyong chen pos lteng rgyas 'od srung gi rjes su tshangs par spyod pa spyad dam/_yang na 
[\[241b.3\]]lteng rgyas 'od srung gis dge sbyong chen po'i rjes su tshangs par spyod pa spyad ces bsams so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas gnas brtan la tshigs su bcad pa gsungs so/_/lteng rgyas gnas su gnas nas ci zhig mthong /_/sbyin sreg 'dor ba'i 
[\[241b.4\]]rgyu mtshan ci zhig smra/_/'od srung 'di yi don ni dri bar bya/_/khyod kyis ji ltar sbyin sreg spong ba yin/_/gnas brtan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa shes nas/_gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin ro dang dri/_/bud med 'dod pa yang ni mchod sbyin spyod/_/'di rnams dri ma legs 
[\[241b.5\]]par rtogs byas nas/_/de phyir me yi sbyin sreg 'di spangs so/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di brjod nas rang nyid nyan thos kyi 'dod pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi bol du mgo bos reg nas/_bdag ston pa btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos yin no zhes 
[\[241b.6\]]smras so/_/shing tA la gcig dang shing tA la gnyis dang shing tA la gsum dang ji srid du shing tA la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la 'phags nas babs te de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de'i cho 'phrul lta zhing mi mang po rnams kyis e ma ho 
[\[241b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po 'di lta bu'i lta ba bstan pas/_dgra bcom pa zhes bya ba la sems shing /_lteng rgyas 'od srung gi lta ba'i dra ba bcad de de bzhin gshegs pas btul nas ston pa'i yon tan nyid brjod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bos kyang da lta kho na ma yin par 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]lteng rgyas 'od srung btul lo/_/'das pa nyid du'ang 'di ngas btul lo zhes brjod nas don 'di 'das pa na mi sbyin chen po 'od srung gi skyes rabs su bshad pa'i bden pa bzhi po gsal bar bstan no/_/de'i mod la yul ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po 'khor khri phrag bcu gcig dang bcas 
[\[242a.2\]]pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/khri phrag gcig dge bsnyen du gyur to/_/rgyal po ston pa dang nye ba nyid du 'dug ste bslab pa'i gzhi lnga so sor rab tu thos nas skyabs su song ste sang gi gdugs tshod la mgron du gnyer nas/_stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba 
[\[242a.3\]]byas nas song ngo /_/slar yang sang gi snga dro nyid bcom ldan 'das mthong ba dang ma mthong ba rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa rnams kyis bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi grangs kyi mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar 'dod pas snga dro nyid rgyal po'i khab nas shing dngar gyi tshal du song ste rgyang grags bcu gnyis 
[\[242a.4\]]su mi shong bar shing dngar gyi tshal thams cad rgyun mi 'chad par gyur to/_/mi thams cad kyis stobs bcu pa'i gzugs mchog thob par 'dod pa bdag nyid kyi sku la blta bas tshim par ma nus so/_/'di lta bu'i sa gzhi'i kha dog yin no/_/'di lta bu'i gzugs kyi gnas su de bzhin gshegs 
[\[242a.5\]]pa'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po la sogs pa'i rab tu byed pa thams cad kyang gzugs kyi sku dpal gyis bsngags par bya bar 'os so/_/'di ltar gzugs mchog thob pa'i stobs bcu pa'i sku blta ba'i phyir mi mang po rgyun mi 'chad do/_/skyed mos tshal dang lam du dge slong gcig gis kyang phyi ru 
[\[242a.6\]]'thon pa'i skabs med do/_/nyi ma de'i dus na bcom ldan 'das kyi gdugs tshod yol ba lta bur gyur to/_/de ma thag par brgya byin sdod pa'i stan dro ba'i rnam par mthong ste des rnam par brtags so/_/de'i rgyu mtshan shes nas bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su mngon par sprul te/_sangs rgyas dang 
[\[242a.7\]]chos dang dge 'dun so so la ji ltar rigs pa'i bstod pa rjod par byed do/_/stobs bcu pa'i sngun du chas nas lha'i mthu yis lam thob par byas so/_/'dul zhing 'dul ba'i grogs sngon bcas/_/bram ze rnam grol ral pa dang /_/seng ge'i gzugs kyis 'thon nas ni/_/bcom ldan rgyal 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]po'i khab nang byon/_/grol zhing grol ba'i grogs sngon bcas/_/bram ze rnam grol ral pa dang /_/seng ge'i gzugs kyis 'thon nas ni/_/bcom ldan rgyal po'i khab nang byon/_/bsgral zhing bsgral ba'i grogs sngon bcas/_/bram ze rnam grol ral pa dang /_/seng ge'i gzugs 
[\[242b.2\]]kyis 'thon nas ni/_/rgyal po'i khab nang bcom ldan byon/_/bcu po gsung ba'i stobs bcu pa/_/chos bcu la mkhas bcu la gnas/_/stong phrag bcu yi 'khor dang ldan/_/bcom ldan rgyal po'i khab nang byon/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ni ston pa la bsngags pas bstod cing 
[\[242b.3\]]sngun du 'gro ba'i mi rnams kyis bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs kyi dpal mthong nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di shin tu gzugs bzang ba'o/_/slar yang sngar mthong ba med do zhes bsams nas bram ze'i khye'u 'di gang na gnas pa yin/_gang zhig gi yin zhes smras so/_/de thos nas bram ze'i khye'us 
[\[242b.4\]]smras pa/_gang zhig bstan pa thams cad 'dul/_/gang zag zla med sangs rgyas te/_/dgra bcom bde gshegs 'jig rten du/_/de ni bdag gi nye bar gnas/_/tshigs su bcad pa brjod de ston pas brgya byin gyis skabs phye ba'i lam du dge slong stong phrag gcig 'khor du byas 
[\[242b.5\]]nas rgyal po'i khab kyi nang du gshegs so/_/rgyal pos sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun la sbyin pa chen po phul lo/_/btsun pa bdag dkon mchog gsum spangs nas sdod par mi nus so/_/dus dang dus ma yin par bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar 'ong bar 'dod do/_/shing dngar 
[\[242b.6\]]can gyi skyed mos tshal shin tu thag ring ngo /_/slar yang bdag cag gi 'od ma'i tshal zhes bya ba 'di shin tu nye bas gshegs pa dang /_'ong ba shin tu nye bas sangs rgyas la 'os pa'i gnas lags pas bzhes par zhu/_des gser gyi ril ba spyi blugs la me tog gi dris bsgos te/_
[\[242b.7\]]nor bu'i kha dog can gyi chu blangs nas 'od ma'i tshal yongs su gtong zhing stobs bcu pa'i phyag tu chu sbreng nas/_der kun dga' ra ba bzhes nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i gzhi zhes brjod cing sa gzhi chen po g.yos so/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi nang nas 'od ma'i tshal spangs pa'i sa gzhi g.yos 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]pa 'di bzhes te sde gzhan ni med do/_/siM g+ha gling gi gtsug lag khang chen po spangs nas sa gzhi chen po g.yos pa 'di bzhes te/_sde gzhan ni med do/_/ston pas 'od ma'i tshal gyi kun dga' ra ba bzhes nas rgyal po la rjes su yi rang bar mdzad cing stan 
[\[243a.2\]]las bzhengs te/_dge slong gi dge 'dun 'khor du byas nas 'od ma'i tshal du byon no/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu kun du rgyu gnyis po rgyal po'i khab la brten nas gnas shing bdud rtsi tshol bar sems so/_/de'i nang nas shA ri'i bus gnas brtan rta thul 
[\[243a.3\]]bsod snyoms la zhugs pa mthong bas sems rab tu dngas par gyur te bza' ba byin nas chos rnams gang dag rgyu las byung ba dang zhes pa'i tshigs bcad thos pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/rang gi grogs po kun du rgyu maud gal la yang tshigs su bcad pa de nyid smras so/_/
[\[243a.4\]]des kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/de gnyis kyis kyang rang nyid rgyal ba la bltas nas rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa ston pa'i drung du rab tu byung ngo /_/de rnams las maud gal gyi bu chen po zhag bdun nas dgra bcom pa thob bo/_/gnas brtan shA ri'i bus zla ba phyed nas dgra 
[\[243a.5\]]bcom pa thob ste de gnyis po yang ston pa'i nyan thos kyi mchog tu gnas par bzung ngo /_/gnas brtan shA ri'i bus dgra bcom pa thob pa'i nyin mo nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi 'dus pa dang por byas so/_/slar yang de bzhin gshegs pas 'od ma'i tshal de nyid du bzhugs so/_/de'i 
[\[243a.6\]]tshe rgyal po chen po zas gtsang gis bdag gi sras lo drug tu dka' ba spyad nas mchog gi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas rgyal po'i khab kyi 'od ma'i tshal du bzhugs so zhes pa thos nas blon po phan tshun rnams bos te 'dir shog cig skyes bu stong phrag 
[\[243a.7\]]gcig gis 'khor khrid de rgyal po'i khab tu song la nga'i tshig gis khyed kyi yab rgyal po zas gtsang khyed blta bar 'dod ces brjod pas bdag gi sras khrid la shog ces smras so/_/blon pos kyang lha de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes rgyal po'i gsung spyi bos blangs nas skyes bu stong phrag gcig gi 'khor 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]de khrid de myur ba nyid du dpag tshad drug cu'i lam du song nas stobs bcu pa 'khor bzhi'i nang du bzhugs nas chos ston pa'i dus su gtsug lag khang du zhugs so/_/de rgyal pos btang ba'i don re zhig bzhag nas 'khor thams cad kyi mthar 'khod de ston pa'i chos bstan pa thos nas ji ltar 'khod 
[\[243b.2\]]pa nyid bzhin du skyes bu stong phrag gcig dang lhan cig tu dgra bcom pa thob nas rab tu 'byung bar zhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun pa rnams 'dir shog cig ces phyag brkyang ngo /_/thams cad de nyid du rdzu 'phrul las byung ba'i lhung bzed dang chos gos gsum bzung nas/_lo brgya 
[\[243b.3\]]lon pa'i gnas brtan lta bur gyur to/_/dgra bcom pa thob pa'i dus nas bzung ste/_slar yang 'phags pa zhes bya ba re zhig bar mar gnas par gyur to/_/rgyal pos btang ba'i spring yig stobs bcu pa la ma brjod do/_/rgyal pos btang ba'i mi rnams las gcig kyang ma byung 
[\[243b.4\]]zhing spring yig kyang ma thos so/_/'dir shog la khyed song zhig dang de lta bu'i nges pas blon po gzhan gcig btang ngo /_/des song nas yang sngar bzhin du 'khor dang bcas pa dgra bcom pa thob nas cang mi gsung bar gnas so/_/rgyal pos de lta bur nges pas skyes bu stong phrag re re'i 
[\[243b.5\]]'khor dang bcas pa'i blon po dgu btang ngo /_/thams cad rang gi don rdzogs par byas nas cang mi smra bar gyur te de nyid du gnas so/_/rgyal pos spring yig tsam gyi lo rgyus kyang ma thob po zhes bsams nas mi 'di rnams nga la mi dga' ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis spring yig tsam gyi lo rgyus kyang mi 
[\[243b.6\]]brjod do/_/su zhig nga'i tshig bzhin byed par sems/_rgyal pos mi thams cad la brtags pas nag po 'char ka mthong ngo /_/de yang rgyal po'i don thams cad sgrub par byed pa'i blon po yin no nang mi yin no/_/shin tu thugs ches pa yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dang 
[\[243b.7\]]lhan cig la nyin gcig tu skyes pa yin no/_/de dang lhan cig tu brtse ba'i grogs po yin no/_/de nas blon po rgyal pos bos te/_bu nag po 'char ka bdag gi sras blta bar 'dod pas skyes bu stong phrag dgu btang ste mi gcig kyang ma 'ongs nas spring yig tsam gyi lo rgyus ci 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]yang ma byung /_slar yang thams cad nad kyis thebs pa yin nam tshe'i bar chad du gyur pa yin nam/_bdag 'tsho ba nyid kyi bar du sras po blta bar 'dod de bdag gi bu blta bar nus sam zhes smras so/_/lha nus lags so/_/gal te rab tu phyung yang blta bar 
[\[244a.2\]]nus so/_/bu khyod rab tu byung ba'am ma byung yang /_nga sras po blta'o zhes smras so/_/des lha legs so zhes rgyal po'i gsung blangs nas rgyal po'i khab tu song ste/_ston pa chos ston pa'i dus su 'khor rnams kyi mthar 'khod de chos thos nas 'khor dang bcas pa dgra bcom pa'i 'bras 
[\[244a.3\]]bu thob par gyur te dge slong gi dngos por so sor gnas so/_/ston pa sangs rgyas su gyur nas dang po'i lo la drang srong lhung ba'i gnas su dbyar bzhugs te/_dgag dbye byas nas lteng rgyas su gshegs shing der zla ba gsum bzhugs te/_ral pa can spun rnams btul nas dge slong stong phrag 
[\[244a.4\]]gcig gi 'khor dang bcas pa dgun zla 'bring po'i nya la rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs nas zla ba gnyis bzhugs so/_/de rnams ni grong khyer bA rA Na sI nas 'ongs pa'i bar te/_zla ba lnga song zhing dgun gyi dus thams cad 'das so/_/gnas brtan 'char ka 'ongs nas zhag bdun dang brgyad song 
[\[244a.5\]]ngo /_/des dpyid zla ra ba'i nya la bsams pa/_dgun gyi dus 'das nas dpyid ka'i dus su sleb pa dang /_mi rnams kyis 'bru rnams blangs te/_phyogs phyogs nas lam du byung bas rtswa rnams ljang gur gyur to/_/sa gzhi dang nags tshal gyi shing la sogs pa me tog shin tu mang 
[\[244a.6\]]ba kha bye ba ni lam du 'gro ba'i dus so/_/stobs bcu pa'i nye du dang phrad par byed pa'i lam du 'gro ba'i dus yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du nye bar song nas/_btsun pa ljon shing de ni ljang gur gyur/_/shing gi lo ma sa la dud pa dang /_/de rnams bar nas 'od zer 'gyed 
[\[244a.7\]]pa yin/_/dpa' bo chen po gnyen gnas gshegs pa'i dus/_/ha cang mi dro mi grang zhing /_/mu ge dang ni bkres pa med/_/sa steng shing rnams ljang gur gyur/_/thub pa chen po dus 'dir gyur/_/tshigs su bcad pa drug cu tsam gyis stobs bcu pa la rigs kyi grong khyer du 
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]gshegs pa'i phyir bsngags par 'os pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'o/_/de nas ston pa la 'char kas dbyangs snyan pos gshegs pa'i bsngags par 'os pa'i bsngags pa gsungs so/_/btsun pa khyed kyi yab rgyal po chen po zas gtsang blta bar 'dod pas nye du rnams rjes su 'dzin par zhu/_
[\[244b.2\]]legs so 'char ka nye du rnams rjes su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/zhes dge slong gi dge 'dun la smros shig/_/gshegs pa'i gnas thams cad la byi dor gyis shig ces smros shig_/btsun pa legs so zhes gnas brtan song nas smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis yul oM g+ha dang ma 
[\[244b.3\]]ga d+hA na gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu rnams stong phrag bcu dang bcas pa grong khyer ser skya'i gzhi na gnas pa'i stong phrag bcu po thams cad zag pa zad pa'i dge slong 'khor du byas nas rgyal po'i khab nas phyi rol du 'thon te/_nyi ma re re la dpag tshad re re bgrod cing rgyal po'i khab nas dpag 
[\[244b.4\]]tshad drug cu'i grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir zla ba gnyis kyis sleb par dgongs shing bul ba yang ma yin myur ba yang ma yin par 'bring por gshegs so/_/gnas brtan gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das byon no zhes rgyal po'i drung du smra'o zhes bsams nas nam mkha' la song ste rgyal po'i gnas 
[\[244b.5\]]su sleb par gyur to/_/rgyal pos gnas brtan gzigs nas thugs tshim par gyur te/_gdan bshams pa la bzhugs su bcug go/_/rang la byed pa bzhin bcos nas ro sna tshogs pa'i bza' bas lhung bzed bkang nas phul lo/_/gnas brtan langs nas 'gro bar bsams 
[\[244b.6\]]pa dang /_bu bzhugs la gsol cig_/rgyal po chen po ston pa dang nye bar song ste bza'o/_/slar yang bu ston pa ga na yod/_stong phrag nyi shu'i dge slong 'khor du byas nas rgyal po chen po nyid blta ba'i phyir byon no/_/rgyal po thugs tshim par gyur nas smras pa/_khyed 'di gsol la 
[\[244b.7\]]bdag gi sras grong khyer 'dir ma byon gyi bar la 'di nyid nas lhung bzed du bza' ba khyer la song cig ces smras so/_/gnas brtan gyis rgyal po'i gsung mnyan te rgyal pos gnas brtan gyi bza' ba gsol zin pa dang lhung bzed bkrus nas/_dri bzang po'i phye mas byugs te bza' ba mchog 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]gis gang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa la phul cig zhes smras nas gnas brtan gyi lag par byin no/_/gnas brtan mi thams cad kyis mthong ba dang lhung bzed nam mkha' la 'phangs so/_/rang nyid kyang nam mkha' la gshegs nas bza' ba'i lhung bzed bzung 
[\[245a.2\]]ste/_ston pa'i phyag tu phul nas ston pas kyang der bza' ba la longs spyod do/_/gnas brtan thabs 'di'i nyi ma re re bzhin du bza' ba phul lo/_/ston pas kyang lam gyi bar du rgyal po nyid kyi gdugs tshod la longs spyod do/_/gnas brtan gyis kyang gdugs tshod la longs spyod pa'i 
[\[245a.3\]]mthar nyi ma re re bzhin du de ring 'di tsam nas bcom ldan 'das byon no/_/de ring 'di tsam du bcom ldan 'das byon zhes pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang dag par ldan pa nyid brjod cing rgyal ris thams cad ston pa ma mthong ba nyid kyis ston pa'i drung du rang nyid kyi sems dngas par mdzad do/_/
[\[245a.4\]]de'i rgyu mtshan gyis gnas brtan la bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag bdag gi nyan thos kyi nang nas rigs dad par byed pa rnams kyi mchog gang yin na 'di ni 'char ka zhes pa'o/_/'di mchog tu bzung bas shAkya ba rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das rjes su byon pa'i sngun la bdag cag gi 
[\[245a.5\]]nye du'i gtso bo blta'o zhes 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i gnas rtog cing shAkya n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba yid du 'ong ba sta gon byas so/_/der thams cad nyer bsdogs byas nas spos dang me tog so so lag tu thogs te/_bsu ba byed cing rgyan thams cad kyis so sor brgyan nas 
[\[245a.6\]]gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma grong khyer gyi khye'u dang bu mo sngar dang por btang ba rnams dang /_de nas rgyal po'i gzhon nu dang gzhon nu ma dag de rnams kyi bar rang rang gis spos dang me tog dang phye ma la sogs pas mchod pa byed cing /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhes nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba 
[\[245a.7\]]nyid du byon no/_/der bcom ldan 'das kyis stong phrag nyi shu'i zag pa zad pa'i dge slong 'khor du byas nas gdan bshams pa mchog la sangs rgyas bzhugs so/_/shAkya'i rigs ni nga rgyal dang ldan pa yin/_sems rtsub pa yin pas 'di ni don grub gzhon nu nged dang lhan cig gzhon nu 
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]yin no/_/nged ni phu bo yin no/_/'di ni sring mo'i bu yin no/_/'di ni tsha bo yin no zhes bsams nas khye'u dang rgyal po'i gzhon nu zhes smras te/_khyed kyi phyag gis bdag khyed kyi rgyab tu sdod do zhes bsams so/_/de rnams de bzhin du gnas nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis de rnams 
[\[245b.2\]]kyi bsam pa gzigs nas gnyen rnams bdag la phyag mi byed par 'dod kyang da lta phyag byed du gzhug dgos te/_mngon par shes pa'i gzhi dang ye shes dang bsam gtan dang snyoms par 'jug pa bskyed dgos so snyam ste/_bzhengs nas nam mkha' la gshegs so/_/de 
[\[245b.3\]]rnams kyi mgo la zhabs kyi rdul lhung ba bzhin du a mra srung ba'i a mra'i shing gi drung du so so'i cho 'phrul dang mtshungs par cho 'phrul mdzad do/_/rgyal pos de'i ya mtshan che ba mthong ngo zhes smras so/_/bcom ldan 'das khyed 'khrungs pa'i nyin mo dka' thub pa nag po lha len 
[\[245b.4\]]gyis phyag byed cing nye bar gnas pas khyed kyis zhabs bskyod pa bram ze'i spyi bo la nye bar gnas so/_/de mthong nas bdag gis kyang khyed la phyag byas so/_/'di ni bdag gi phyag dang po yin no/_/bkra shis pa'i 'bru 'debs pa'i nyin mo 'dzam bu'i shing gi grib ma'i dpal 
[\[245b.5\]]gyi mal stan la khyed bzhugs pa na shing 'dzam bu'i grib mas ma btang bar mthong ba'i tshe yang zhabs la phyag byas so/_/'di ni bdag gi phyag gnyis pa yin no/_/da lta ni bdag gis sngar ma mthong ba'i cho 'phrul yang mthong bas khyed kyi zhabs la phyag bgyid do/_/'di ni bdag 
[\[245b.6\]]gi phyag gsum pa yin no/_/slar yang rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das la phyag byed cing phyag byed par mi nus pa'i shAkya'i rigs gcig kyang med do/_/thams cad kyis kyang phyag byed pa nyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la nye du rnams kyis phyag byed cing nam mkha' las babs nas 
[\[245b.7\]]gdan bshams pa'i mchog gi gung la bzhugs so/_/bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas nye du rnams dang 'dus par gyur pa la thams cad sems gcig tu gnas so/_/de nas sprin chen po las pad ma'i 'dab ma la chu mi 'chags pa lta bu'i char 'bebs so/_/chu zangs kyi mdog 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]can sa la sgra sgrogs shing 'bab bo/_/'bang bar 'dod pa rnams 'bang ngo /_/'bang bar mi 'dod pa rnams mi 'bang ngo /_/thigs pa tsam yang mi ltung ngo /_/de mthong nas thams cad du ya mtshan pa dang rmad du byung ba skyes so/_/e ma ho ngo mtshar che/_e ma ho rmad 
[\[246a.2\]]du byung ngo zhes rjod par byed do/_/ston pas 'di kho nam yin gyi bdag gi nye du dang phrad pa na pad ma'i 'dab ma la chu mi 'chags pa lta bu'i char 'bebs shing 'das pa'i dus su'ang ngas phab bo/_/'di'i don byung ba ni thams cad sgra la gyi skyes rabs su bshad do/_/chos bstan pa thos nas 
[\[246a.3\]]thams cad langs te phyag byas nas song ngo /_/gcig gis kyang rgyal po dang rgyal tshab dang blon po rnams sang bdag gi gnas su bsod snyoms khyer 'ong ngo zhes smra ba song ba de rnams las gcig kyang ma byung ngo /_/ston pas slar nyi ma gnyis pa la stong phrag nyi shu'i dge slong 'khor du byas 
[\[246a.4\]]nas grong khyer ser skya'i gzhir bsod snyoms la bzhud do/_/gang zhig mgron du gnyer ba dang /_lhung bzed khyer ba su yang med do/_/bcom ldan 'das sgo drung du 'khod de rnam par brtags pas ji ltar sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi rigs kyi grong khyer du byon nas bsod snyoms mdzad pa 
[\[246a.5\]]bzhin du gang ji ltar rigs par mi chen po'i khyim du 'gro zhing yang na [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bsod snyoms spyod do/_/de nas sangs rgyas gcig gis kyang ji ltar rigs par gshegs pa ma mthong bas bdag gis kyang nga ni 'di'i rigs so/_/'di sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs bzhin du 
[\[246a.6\]]bdag gis kyang rigs par gzung bar bya'o/_/bdag gi nyan thos kyang bdag nyid bzhin rjes su slob cing bsod snyoms la rdzogs par byon no/_/'khod pa'i khyim nas bzung nas [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du bsod snyoms la spyod do/_/'phags pa gzhon nu don grub bsod snyoms la gshegs 
[\[246a.7\]]so zhes brjod do/_/nyis thog dang sum thog la sogs pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnams su steng gi sgo chung phye nas mi thams cad blta bar gyur te lha mo sgra gcan 'dzin gyi yum yang 'phags pa'i bu grong khyer 'di nyid du rgyal po chen po'i mthus gser gyi do li la sogs pa la zhon te de ring nas skra dang kha spu 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]bregs shing ngur smrig gi gos gyon nas snod lag tu khyer te/_bsod snyoms la 'gro ba mdzes sam mi mdzes zhes steng gi sgo chung phye nas blta'o/_/sna tshogs pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba yang dag par 'bar zhing sku lus kyi 'od kyis grong khyer gyi steng thams cad snang bar mdzad de/_'dom gang 
[\[246b.2\]]ba'i 'od kun nas bskor zhing rab tu gsal ba dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa sangs rgyas kyi dpal dpe med par rnam par gsal ba mthong ngo /_/gtsug tor nas bzung nas zhabs kyi mthil gyi bar de srid do/_/dbu skra g.yas 
[\[246b.3\]]'khyil 'jam gnag snum pa dang /_dpral ba dri med nyi ma'i mthil bzhin no/_/sku dang 'tsham pa'i shangs ni mtho ba dang /_/mi yi seng ge 'od zer gsal bar mdzad/_/'di lta bu la sogs pa'i mi'i seng ge la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod do/_/khyed kyi sras po bsod 
[\[246b.4\]]snyoms la spyod do zhes rgyal po la smras so/_/rgyal po'i sems sdug bsngal bas gos nas bzung ste myur zhing myur bar phyir 'thon ta bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du 'khod nas smras pa ci btsun pa bdag cag ngo tsha bas ci'i don du bsod snyoms mdzad/_dge slong 'di rnams kyi bza' ba bdag gis ster 
[\[246b.5\]]bar mi shes bsams pa yin nam ci lags/_rgyal po chen po'i rigs kyi spyod pa yin no/_/btsun pa bdag cag shAkya'i rigs zhes bya ba'i rigs so/_/de la rgyal rigs gcig kyang bsod snyoms byed pa'i ming tsam yang med do/_/rgyal po chen po'i rigs zhes bya ba ni khyod kyi 
[\[246b.6\]]rigs 'di yin no/_/bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po mi dgyes pa ma mdzad cig_/slar yang bdag cag gi mar me mdzad dang kauDi n+ya dang 'od srung zhes bya ba 'di sangs rgyas kyi rigs yin no/_/'di rnams dang gzhan sangs rgyas stong phrag du mas kyang bsod snyoms spyod cing 'tsho bar 
[\[246b.7\]]mdzad la/_srang gi dbus su 'khod pa nyid do/_/bag med lhag mar byed pa med/_/chos la spyod cing legs par spyod/_/chos la spyad na bde ba 'byung /_/'jig rten 'di dang phyi mar ba de/_/chos kyi rkang pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di bstan cing bshad do/_/tshigs su bcad 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]pa'i mthar rgyal pos rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo/_/chos spyod pa ni legs par spyod/_/nyes par spyod pa mi bya zhing /_/chos spyad pa yis bde ba 'byung /_/'jig rten 'di dang pha rol du'o/_/slar yang chos kyi rkang pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos nas 
[\[247a.2\]]lan cig phyir 'ong gi 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/chos skyong ba'i skyes rabs thos nas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/'chi ba'i dus su gdugs dkar po'i 'og tu dpal gyi mal stan gyi steng du gzims pa nyid na dgra bcom pa thob par gyur to/_/dgon par gnas nas dka' thub spyod 
[\[247a.3\]]pa rgyal po la dgos pa med do/_/rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byas nas slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed bzung ste/_'khor dang bcas pa khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]chen po'i steng du spyan drangs nas gya nom pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba rnams drangs so/_/gdugs tshod zin pa'i mthar sgra gcan 'dzin 
[\[247a.4\]]gyi ma ma gtogs pa'i btsun mo 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas so/_/gzhan yang des 'khor gyi mi rnams la 'phags pa'i bu la phyag gyis zhes brjod nas/_gal te kho mo la yon tan yod na 'phags pa'i bu rang nyid kyi gnas su 'byon no/_/byon pa 
[\[247a.5\]]nyid na de la phyag byed do zhes brjod nas ma 'ongs so/_/rgyal pos lhung bzed bzung nas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos mchog gnyis dang bcas pa rgyal po'i bu mo'i khang [{]bzangs su [,]bzang du [}]gshegs te/_rgyal po'i bu mo rang nyid ji ltar mos pa'i phyag byed cing gzhan dang 'gal ba cung zad kyang ma byed ces 
[\[247a.6\]]nas gdan bshams pa mchog gi gung la bzhugs so/_/de myur du 'ongs nas byin pa bzung ste/_zhabs kyi steng du mgo bo bzhag nas ji ltar 'dod pa'i phyag byas so/_/rgyal po dang rgyal po'i bu mos bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba mang pos yon tan la sogs pas yon tan dang ldan par 
[\[247a.7\]]brjod nas/_btsun pa bdag gi bu mos nyid kyis gos ngur smrig gyon pa thos nas/_de nas bzung ste deng gi bar du gos ngur smrig gyon no/_/nyid kyis gdugs tshod lan cig gsol ba thos nas bu mos kyang bza' ba lan cig zos so/_/nyid kyis mal stan chen po spangs pa thos nas/_nyal khri 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]chung ba la nyal lo/_/nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba dang spos la sogs pa la sred pa med pa thos nas/_me tog gi phreng ba dang spos la sogs pa la chags pa med pa skyes so/_/rang gi nye du rnams bdag gis gso'o zhes 'phrin bskur nas/_gnyen gcig la yang blta ba mi 'dug go/_/bcom ldan 
[\[247b.2\]]'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa ni bdag gi bu mo yin no zhes gsol to/_/rgyal po chen po ya mtshan mi che'o/_/'di da lta khyed srung bar byed pa'i rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes yongs su ma smin pa rang gis bsrung ngo /_/sngar bsrung ba med cing ri la sogs pa la 'gro ba na/_ye shes yongs 
[\[247b.3\]]su ma rdzogs pa rang gis bsrungs so zhes gsungs nas/_mi 'am ci zla ba'i skyes rabs gsungs te stan las bzhengs nas gshegs so/_/nyi ma gnyis pa la rgyal bu gzhon nu dga' bo rgyal por dbang bskur ba dang /_khang pa gsar pa'i nang du zhugs te bkra shis pa'i bag ma blangs nas 
[\[247b.4\]]nye bar gnas so/_/de'i khyim du gshegs nas gzhon nu lhung bzed zung shig ces rab tu dbyung bar dgongs nas bkra shis brjod de/_gdan la bzhengs nas gshegs so/_/ljongs kyi dge ba'i bu mos 'gro ba mthong ngo /_/'phags pa'i bu myur du shog ces brjod nas blta'o/_/
[\[247b.5\]]des kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed gzung bar ma nus nas gtsug lag khang nyid du gshegs so/_/bcom ldan 'das de la 'dod pa med pa nyid kyis rab tu 'byung ba byed do/_/'di ltar bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ser skyar gshegs shing nyi ma gsum pa la dga' bo rab tu byung 
[\[247b.6\]]bar byas so/_/nyi ma bdun pa la sgra gcan 'dzin gyi mas gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du btang ngo /_/bu stong phrag nyi shu'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa 'di rnams ltos/_gser gyi kha dog can gyi tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi mdog can dge sbyong 'di ni khyed kyi 
[\[247b.7\]]yab bo/_/'di la gter chen po yod cing de 'thon pa nas bzung nas gter mthong ba med do/_/song la nor slongs shig_/bdag khyed kyi bu gzhon nu yin no/_/rgyal por dbang bskur ba thob nas 'khor los sgyur ba la dbang byed par 'gyur ro/_/bdag la nor gyi don du 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]nor stsal du gsol/_yab kyi nor bu bdag yin no zhes gsol cig ces smras pa dang /_gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar song ste/_yab kyi drung du dga' ba skyes so/_/sems spro bar gyur to/_/dge sbyong des khyed kyi grib ma ni de'o zhes brjod nas/_gzhan 
[\[248a.2\]]yang rang gi rigs pas brjod cing 'khod do/_/bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod kyi mthar rjes su yi rang ba mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te gshegs so/_/gzhon nus bdag la dge slong nor stsal du gsol/_bdag la dge slong nor stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su 'brangs nas/_
[\[248a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu phyir log la nga'i rjes su ma 'gro zhes pa dang /_rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das dang 'grogs nas byon te ldog par ma nus nas/_gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig kun dga' ra ba nyid du phyin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsams pa/_
[\[248a.4\]]'di yab kyi nor 'dod cing 'jig rten pa'i nor ni 'tshe ba dang bcas pa yin/_da ni gzhon nu la byang chub snying po des thob pa'i 'phags pa'i nor rnam pa bdun byin na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gyi bdag po byed par 'gyur bar dgongs nas/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bos te/_de'i phyir na shA ri'i bu khyod kyis 
[\[248a.5\]]gzhon nu sgra gcan 'dzin rab tu phyung zhes brjod nas rab tu byung ba byas so/_/slar yang rgyal po gzhon nu'i sdug bsngal cher skyes te bsran par ma nus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi gnas su phyin te/_btsun pa 'phags pa ma dang pha yis rjes su ma gnang ba'i bu rab tu 'byung bar byed pa ma legs so 
[\[248a.6\]]zhes dam pa bslangs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dam pa byin no/_/slar yang nyi ma gnyis pa la rgyal po'i gnas su gdugs tshod gsol nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/rgyal pos btsun pa nyid dka' ba spyod pa'i dus su lha cig bdag gi drung du nye bar 'ongs nas khyed kyi bu dus las 'das 
[\[248a.7\]]so zhes smras so/_/de'i tshig la yid ches pa med cing bdag gi sras byang chub ma thob bar du dus las 'da' bar mi byed do/_/de'i tshig bdag gis bkag go zhes brjod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_da lta ji ltar khyod yid ches par byed/_slar rus pa mthong nas khyed kyi bu 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]shi'o zhes zer ba la yid ches par ma byas so/_/'di'i don 'byung ba ni chos skyong ba chen po'i skyes rabs su bshad do/_/gtam gyi mthar rgyal pos phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas so/_/de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi yab 'bras bu gsum la so sor gnas nas dge slong gi dge 'dun 
[\[248b.2\]]'khor du byas so/_/slar yang rgyal po'i khab tu gshegs nas bsil ba'i tshal du bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis shing rta lnga brgya'i nor khyer nas rgyal po'i khab tu rang nyid dga' ba'i grogs kyi khang par song ste/_des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byon no zhes 
[\[248b.3\]]pa thos nas shin tu snga bar lha'i mthus sgo phye ste/_ston pa'i drung du nye bar song nas chos thos te rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/_/nyi ma gnyis pa la sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun la sbyin pa chen po phul lo/_/mnyan yod du gshegs pa'i phyir du ston pa'i drung du dam 
[\[248b.4\]]bca' blangs nas bar gyi lam dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i gnas su 'bum phrag re re'i nor byin nas dpag tshad re re'i gtsug lag khang byas so/_/rgyal byed tshal bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi dbyig gis nyos nas las kha gsar pa byed cing dbus su stobs bcu pa'i dri'i gtsang khang byed do/_/
[\[248b.5\]]de la bskor ba rnams la gnas brtan chen po brgyad cu'i bzhugs gnas so/_/chig thog dang nyis thog dang khang pa ring po dang /_bsti gnas la sogs pa'i bzhugs gnas dang /_rdzing bu dang /_'chag sa dang /_mtshan mo'i bzhugs gnas dang /_nyin mo'i bzhugs 
[\[248b.6\]]gnas so/_/bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi nor spel te yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs yid la 'thad pa'i gtsug lag khang byed do/_/stobs bcu pa byon pa'i phyir du pho nya ba btang ngo /_/ston pas pho nya ba'i 'phrin gsan nas dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po'i 'khor du byas te rgyal po'i khab nas phyir 
[\[248b.7\]]byon te [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du grong khyer mnyan yod du byon no/_/gtso bo chen po gtsug lag khang chen po sta gon byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal byed tshal du byon pa'i nyin mo bu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan no/_/slar yang brgyan pa nyid kyi gzhon nu lnga brgya dang bcas pa btang ngo /_/de 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]'khor dang bcas pa kha dog lnga'i gos yang dag par 'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan lnga brgya thogs nas stobs bcu pa'i mdun du song bar gyur to/_/de rnams kyi phyi ma la legs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]chen mo dang /_legs [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ma chung ba ste bu mo gnyis gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang bcas pa gser 
[\[249a.2\]]gyis gang ba'i bum pa lag par thogs nas phyir 'thon no/_/de'i phyi ma la tshong dpon gyi chung ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas bud med lnga brgya dang bcas pa gser gyis gang ba'i sder ma chen po thogs nas phyir 'thon to/_/thams cad phyin nas tshong dpon rang nyid gos bzang po gyon no/_/de 
[\[249a.3\]]bzhin du gos bzang po gyon pa'i tshong dpon lnga brgya dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor dge bsnyen 'di rnams mdun du byas nas/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po rnams 'khor du byas te/_rang nyid kyi sku lus kyi 'od kyis gser gyi bcud kyi gong bu 
[\[249a.4\]]lta bu dang mtshungs pa dang /_nags tshal gyi bar du snang bar mdzad cing mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rol pa sangs rgyas kyi dpal zla med cing mtshungs pa med pa rgyal byed tshal gyi nang du byon no/_/de nas mgon med zas sbyin gyis zhus pa/_btsun pa gtsug lag khang 'di ji lta bu la dbul bar 
[\[249a.5\]]bgyi/_khyim bdag gtsug lag khang 'di 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la phul cig_/legs so bcom ldan 'das zhes tshong dpon chen pos gser gyi ril ba spyi blugs blangs nas stobs bcu pa'i phyag tu chu sbreng ste/_rgyal byed tshal gyi gtsug lag khang 'di 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i 
[\[249a.6\]]phyogs bzhi'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun la sbyin zhes phul lo/_/ston pas gtsug lag khang bzhes nas rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do/_/grang dang dro bas mi nyams shing /_/de ltar [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]la sogs pa'i/_/sdig sbrul dang ni sbrang bu dang /_/ba mo dang ni char pas so/_/de 
[\[249a.7\]]ltar rlung dang shin tu dro/_/so sor lus la gos pa dang /_/khang nang gnas nas bde ba skyes/_/khang par bsam gtan lhag mthong rnams/_/dge 'dun gtsug lag khang 'bul ba/_/sangs rgyas mchog gis bsngags par mdzad/_/skyes bu mkhas pas de yi phyir/_/bdag 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]nyid kyi ni phyir du ni/_/dga' bas gtsug lag khang byed pa/_/mang du thos pa gnas pa yin/_/de rnams kyi ni bza' dang btung /_/gos dang mal cha stan dang ni/_/de rnams sems ni drang pos 'bul/_/rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis so/_/des ni de la chos bstan to/_/sdug 
[\[249b.2\]]bsngal thams cad nyer zhi'i phyir/_/gang de'i chos ni rtogs pa dang /_/rten med mya ngan 'das par byed/_/ces bya ba'i gtsug lag khang gi phan yon bshad do/_/mgon med zas sbyin gyis nyi ma gnyis pa nas bzung nas sbyin pa gtong ba'i mgo brtsams so/_/sa khams byas pa'i khang 
[\[249b.3\]{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ni zla ba bzhis grub bo/_/slar yang mgon med zas sbyin gyi gtsug lag khang chen po zla ba dgus grub bo/_/gtsug lag khang chen po la yang bye ba stong phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad nyid song ngo /_/'di la gtsug lag khang chen po 'di nyid la bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bzhi'i nor yongs su btang ngo /_/
[\[249b.4\]]slar yang 'das pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzigs kyi dus su tshong dpon kun gyi grogs zhes bya bas gser gyi glang po'i rkang pa'i rmig rjes lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas/_gnas 'di nyid du dpag tshad gcig gi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor can 
[\[249b.5\]]gyi dus su dpal 'phel zhes bya ba'i tshong dpon gyi bus gser gyi sder ma rgyun mi 'chad pas nyos pa'i sa gzhi'i gnas de nyid du rgyang grags bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam gyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das thams cad skyob kyi dus su tshong dpon bkra shis zhes bya bas gser gyi 
[\[249b.6\]]sa gzhi gser gyi rkang pa'i rjes lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du dpag tshad phyed kyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das log par dad sel gyi dus su tshong dpon 'pho ba med pa zhes bya bas gser gyi pha gu lta bu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sa gzhi nyos nas gnas nyid du rgyang grags
