[\[249b.7\]]bzhi'i tshad kyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das gser thub kyi dus su tshong dpon drag po zhes bya bas gser gyi rus sbal rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags gnyis kyi tshad kyi kun dga' ra ba byas so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]dus su tshong dpon bkra shis bzang po zhes bya bas gser gyi pha gu rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bus sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags gcig gi tshad kyi kun dga' ra ba byas so/_/slar yang bdag cag gi bcom ldan 'das kyi dus su tshong dpon mgon med zas sbyin gyis bye ba phrag 
[\[250a.2\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi dbyig gis gser gyi 'dra men du byas pa rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bus sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags phyed kyi kun dga' ra ba byas so/_/gnas 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma spangs pa'i gnas yin no/_/'di ltar byang chub chen po'i snying po'i drung du thams cad mkhyen pa'i 
[\[250a.3\]]ye shes thob pa ji srid pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa de srid du gang dang gang gi gnas su bcom ldan 'das bdag bzhugs pa 'di ni nye ba'i gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'o/_/de'i lugs kyis skyes rabs thams cad du bsngags par mdzad do/_/skyes pa rabs kyi gleng gzhi'i bshad pa 
[\[250a.4\]]rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//paN+Di ta A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas dang /_mang du thos pa'i lots+tsha ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/_skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//_//sa'i steng du nyi zla 
[\[250a.5\]]ltar gyur cig/[ {D33}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_A TA nA Ti ya sU tra/_bod skad du/_lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi mdo/_'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i 
[\[250a.6\]]ri la bzhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po gnod sbyin mang po'i sde dang /_dri za mang po'i sde dang grul bum gyi sde mang po dang klu'i sde mang po rnams phyogs bzhi bsrung zhing gnas so/_/phyogs bzhir tshan tshan du gnas so/_/phyogs bzhi skyob cing gnas so/_/mtshan mo 'ongs te 
[\[250a.7\]]kha dog sna tshogs pa can gyis bya rgod phung po'i ri 'ba' zhig snang bar byas te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/gnod sbyin de rnams las kyang gang la las bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]tu 'khod do/_/gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das la snyun gsol te snyun gsol nas ji ltar snying po dang snying po med pa'i gtam 'dri zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/gang su dag gis 
[\[250b.2\]]ming dang rigs dpyod cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/gang su dag cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gnod sbyin ma rungs pa gang la la zhig bcom ldan 
[\[250b.3\]]'das la ma dad par gyur to/_/gnod sbyin ma rungs pa gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/_/gnod sbyin 'bring po gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to/_/gnod sbyin 'bring po gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur 
[\[250b.4\]]to/_/gnod sbyin dman pa gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to/_/gnod sbyin dman pa gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/_/gnod sbyin gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/_btsun 
[\[250b.5\]]pa bcom ldan 'das kyis srog gcod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang /_ma byin par len pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang /_'dod pa log par spyod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang /_myos par 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba spong ba'i chos bstan 
[\[250b.6\]]pa mdzad la/_gnod sbyin gang de rnams srog gcod pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang /_ma byin par len pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang /_'dod pa log par spyod pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang /_myos par 
[\[250b.7\]]'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pas de rnams la mi dga' zhing mi 'dod par gyur to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos ji snyed yod pa rnams 'brog dgon pa'i lam du zhugs nas nyal ba dang 'dug pa la brten no/_/sgra med cing dbyangs med par dben 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]par gnas shing 'du 'dzi'i 'tshe ba med do/_/so sor dge sbyong rnams 'thun par gnas so/_/de na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa rnams kyi gnas yod do/_/gang zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la ma dad par gyur te/_de rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[251a.2\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bslab par bya ste/_lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrung du gsol/_dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang 'tshe ba med pa dang bde ba dang legs par gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung 
[\[251a.3\]]ba'i tshul gyis gnang ngo /_/de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba shes te/_de'i tshe 'di ltar lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig ces gsol to/_/spyan ldan dpal dang ldan pa yi/_/rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'byung po rnams 
[\[251a.4\]]la brtse ba yi/_/gtsug tor can la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/_/mgon med rnams la gdung ba yi/_/thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms pa yi/_/'khor ba 'jig la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bram ze dpal dang ldan pa yi/_/gser thub la ni phyag 
[\[251a.5\]]'tshal lo/_/sems can rnam grol mdzad pa yi/_/'od srung la ni phyag 'tshal lo/_/shAkya'i sras ni dpal dang ldan/_/nyi ma'i rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sdug bsngal kun las sgrol mdzad pa/_/gang zhig chos ni rab ston mdzad/_/gang yang 'jig rten par gyur pa/_/ji 
[\[251a.6\]]lta ba bzhin gzigs gyur pa'i/_/de rnams la ni phra ma med/_/'jigs pa med pa chen po'o/_/gang zhig gau tam phyag byed pa/_/lha dang mi la phan pa yin/_/rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/_/'jigs pa med pa chen po ste/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni/_/gang 
[\[251a.7\]]zhig tu ni nub cing 'char/_/gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa/_/de ni mtshan mor 'gyur ba yin/_/gang du nyi ma shar gyur pa/_/de ni nyin mo zhes brjod do/_/gting ni zab pa'i rgya mtsho yi/_/de yi chu yi bcud bzang ngo /_/de ltar der ni skyes gyur pa/_/rgya mtsho'i chu yi bcud bzhin no/_/
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]'dir ni shar gyi phyogs kyi ni/_/skye bo rnams la 'di brjod de/_/de yi phyogs ni kun skyong ba'i/_/rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/_/dri za rnams kyi bdag po ste/_/ming ni rgyal po yul 'khor skyong /_/dri za 'khor dang bcas pa ni/_/glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/_/de yi 
[\[251b.2\]]bu ni mang po rnams/_/ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/_/dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/_/de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/_/de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_/nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni/_/'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/_/thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/_/skyes bu cang mkhyen 
[\[251b.3\]]khyed phyag 'tshal/_/skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/_/mi ma yin rnams khyod phyag 'tshal/_/rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/_/de phyir de ltar 'di brjod de/_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/_/rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/_/
[\[251b.4\]]sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang yang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rjod byed pa/_/phra ma rgyab kyi sha can dang /_/srog gcod pa la chags pa dang /_/skye bo ma lus 'joms pa'o/_/'dir ni lho yi phyogs gnas pa'i/_/skye bo rnams la 'di skad brjod/_/de yi gnas ni yongs skyong ba/_/
[\[251b.5\]]rgyal po chen po grags ldan pa/_/grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste/_/ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya/_/grul bum 'khor dang bcas pa ni/_/glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/_/de yi bu ni mang po rnams/_/ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/_/dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/_/
[\[251b.6\]]de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/_/de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_/nyi ma'i rgyud kyi sangs rgyas ni/_/'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/_/thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/_/skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/_/skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/_/
[\[251b.7\]]mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/_/rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/_/de phyir de ltar 'di brjod de/_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/_/rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/_/sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni/_/gang nas 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]gang du shar gyur pa/_/der ni nyin mor 'gyur ba ste/_/nyin mo zhes ni brjod pa yin/_/gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa/_/de ni mtshan mor rjod par byed/_/gting ni zab pa'i rgya mtsho yi/_/de yi chu ni bcud bzang ngo /_/de ltar der ni skyes gyur pa'i/_/rgya mtsho'i 
[\[252a.2\]]chu yi bcud bzhin no/_/'dir ni nub kyi phyogs kyi ni/_/skye bo rnams la 'di brjod de/_/de yi phyogs ni kun skyong ba'i/_/rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/_/klu rnams kyi ni bdag po ste/_/'di yi ming ni mig mi bzang /_/klu yi 'khor dang bcas pa ni/_/glu dang gar gyis dga' 
[\[252a.3\]]bar byed/_/de yi bu ni mang po rnams/_/ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/_/dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/_/de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/_/de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_/nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni/_/'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/_/thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/_/skyes 
[\[252a.4\]]bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/_/skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/_/mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/_/rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/_/de phyir de ltar 'di brjod de/_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/_/rig 
[\[252a.5\]]pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/_/sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang zhig byang phyogs sgra mi snyan/_/lhun po blta na sdug ri dga'/_/der skyes pa yi mi rnams ni/_/bdag gir yongs su bzung ba med/_/de rnams sa bon 'debs pa med/_/rmo ba yang ni med pa yin/_/dka' 
[\[252a.6\]]spyad med par 'bras smin zhing /_/mi rnams yongs su longs spyod do/_/sbun med ma grugs shin tu dag_/dri bzang 'bras ni 'bras bur ldan/_/'bras kyi 'o ma la 'tshed cing /_/de bzhin btsos nas longs spyod do/_/ba lang rkang gcig la zhon nas/_/yul dang phyogs su 
[\[252a.7\]]'gro bar byed/_/rkang pa gcig pa'i phyugs zhon nas/_/yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/_/bud med kyi ni bzhon pa la/_/zhon nas yul dang phyogs su 'gro/_/skyes pa'i bzhon pa la zhon nas/_/yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/_/gzhon nu ma yi bzhon pa la/_/zhon nas 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]yul dang phyogs su 'gro/_/gzhon nu'i bzhon pa la zhon nas/_/yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/_/bzhon pa de rnams la zhon nas/_/phyogs kun du ni rjes su 'gro/_/gtso bo rgyal po khyad med do/_/glang chen bzhon dang rta yi bzhon/_/lha yi bzhon pa la gnas nas/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[252b.2\]]dang ni khyogs dang ni/_/rgyal po chen po grags dang ldan/_/de'i yang grub pa'i grong khyer ni/_/dri med bar snang la gnas pa/_/lcang lo can dang ku sha'i grong /_/pha rol ku sha'i grong dang ni/_/nA TA'i grong dang pha rol gyi/_/ku shi ta yi grong yin no/_/byang gi phyogs na thams cad 
[\[252b.3\]]rgyas/_/skye bo'i tshogs pa mang po gnas/_/dgu bcu rtsa dgu grong mkha' la/_/rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can/_/slar yang drang srong chen po dang /_/rgyal po chen po lus ngan po/_/bi sA NA zhes pa rgyal po'i pho brang ngo /_/de'i phyir rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_lus ngan po 
[\[252b.4\]]zhes brjod do/_/so sor rab tu gsal zhing zhi ba dang de dang der ni de dang de mdangs dang de'i gzi brjid dang dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal po stobs dang ldan pa'i ming ngo /_/sa gzhi yang ni bcud ldan no/_/gnas der sprin rnams char 'bebs par byed do/_/der ni b+ha ga la ba tI zhes 
[\[252b.5\]]pa'i rdzing bu'o/_/gang du gnod sbyin tshogs dang lhan cig tu gnas so/_/der ni rtag tu shing gi 'bras/_/sna tshogs bya rnams lhan cig gnas/_/rma bya khrung khrung sgra sgrogs shing /_/khu byug rnams ni tshan tshan gnas/_/shang shang te'u sgra sgrogs shing /_/de nas yang ni ngur pa 
[\[252b.6\]]dang /_/gong mo nags kyi bya gag ni/_/nags kyi rdzing bur gnas pa'o/_/ne tsho ri skegs de sgra 'byin/_/da Na Ta mA Ta bya dkar ni/_/dus kun du ni mdzes par byed/_/lus ngan rgyal po'i rdzing rtag mdzes/_/'di ni byang gi phyogs kyi yul/_/skye bo rnams ni 'di bzhin brjod/_/
[\[252b.7\]]de yi phyogs ni yongs skyong ba'i/_/rgyal po chen po grags dang ldan/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po ste/_/'di yi ming ni lus ngan po/_/gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa ni/_/glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/_/de yi bu ni mang po rnams/_/ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/_/dbang 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/_/de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/_/de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_/nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni/_/'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/_/thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/_/skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/_/skyes bu mchog 
[\[253a.2\]]khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/_/mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/_/rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/_/de phyir de ltar 'di brjod de/_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/_/rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/_/sangs rgyas gau tam 
[\[253a.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dir ni drang srong chen pos lcang lo can gyi pho brang dang bcas pas srungs shig_/_dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_'tshe ba med pa dang /_bde ba dang legs par gnas so/_/drang srong chen po gang su dag 
[\[253a.4\]]dge slong dang bcas pa 'am dge slong ma dang bcas pa 'am dge bsnyen dang bcas pa 'am dge bsnyen ma dang bcas pa rnams la/_'dir lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis de bsrung ba dang yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad yid la zung shig_/de'i yang mi ma yin rnams so/_/gnod sbyin nam gnod 
[\[253a.5\]]sbyin mo'am gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am/_gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen po 'am gnod sbyin gyi 'khor ram gnod sbyin gyi g.yog 'khor ram/_dri za pho 'am dri za mo 'am dri za'i bu pho 'am dri za'i bu mo 'am dri za'i blon po chen po 'am dri za'i 'khor ram dri za'i g.yog 
[\[253a.6\]]'khor ram/_grul bum pho 'am grul bum mo 'am grul bum gyi bu pho 'am grul bum gyi bu mo 'am grul bum gyi blon po chen po 'am grul bum gyi 'khor ram grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/_klu pho 'am klu mo 'am klu'i bu pho 'am klu'i bu mo 'am klu'i blon po chen po 'am klu'i 'khor ram 
[\[253a.7\]]klu'i g.yog 'khor ram/_rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis 'gro 'am rjes su 'gro 'am rjes su 'gro ba dang sdod pa dang lhan cig tu sdod pa dang /_gnas pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa dang /_nyal ba dang lhan cig tu nyal ba rnams ni drang srong chen po 'di rnams ni mi ma yin zhes bya'o/_/grong ngam 
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]grong rdal lam bkur sti byed pa'am bsti stang du byed pa la drang srong chen po mi ma yin rnams kyis de thob pa ma yin no/_/rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can zhes bya ba la gzhi'am gnas med do/_/drang srong chen po mi ma yin rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis lhan cig tu gnas pa'ang mi 'thob bo/_/drang 
[\[253b.2\]]srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyi bka' mnyan par bya'o/_/drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyis bdag la phan pa rdzogs pa dang /_pha rol la smod pa dang rtsod pa dang /_drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams la snod mer rab tu 'bar ba mgo la bkon pa 
[\[253b.3\]]dang /_drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyi mgo bo tshal pa bdun du gsheg par byed do/_/drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin ni gtum pa dang drag pa dang khro ba'o/_/de rnams kyis 'di ltar rgyal po chen po la rjod par byed do/_/rgyal po chen po la brjod par ma nus na skyes bu 
[\[253b.4\]]la sogs pa la rjod par byed do/_/rgyal po'i skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu rnams la rjod par byed do/_/drang srong chen po de yang mi ma yin rnams rgyal po chen po la 'gal ba smra ba'o/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/_ma ga d+hA'i yul gyi rgyal po la chom rkun byung 
[\[253b.5\]]na de ma thag tu rgyal po la rjod par byed do/_/rgyal po la brjod par ma nus na rgyal po'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do/_/skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la rjod par byed pa bzhin no/_/drang srong chen po de yang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po la chom rkun gyis gnod pa byed par 
[\[253b.6\]]brjod do/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta bu mi ma yin yod pa rnams gtum pa dang drag pa dang khro ba'o/_/de ma thag tu rgyal po chen po rnams la rjod par byed do/_/rgyal po chen po la brjod par ma nus na rgyal po'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do/_/skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na de'i 'og 
[\[253b.7\]]ma'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do/_/drang srong chen po de ni mi ma yin rnams rgyal po chen po rnams la 'gal bar rjod par byed do/_/drang srong chen po mi ma yin gang zhig gnod sbyin pho 'am gnod sbyin mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi bu 'am gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]po 'am gnod sbyin gyi 'khor ram gnod sbyin gyi g.yog 'khor ram/_dri za pho'am dri za mo 'am dri za'i bu pho 'am dri za'i bu mo 'am dri za'i blon po chen po 'am dri za'i 'khor ram dri za'i g.yog 'khor ram/_grul bum pho 'am grul bum mo 'am grul bum gyi bu pho 'am grul bum gyi 
[\[254a.2\]]bu mo 'am grul bum gyi blon po chen po 'am grul bum gyi 'khor ram grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/_klu pho 'am klu mo 'am klu'i bu pho 'am klu'i bu mo 'am klu'i blon po chen po'am klu'i 'khor ram klu'i g.yog 'khor ram/_rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen 
[\[254a.3\]]nam dge bsnyen ma rnams 'gro ba 'am rjes su 'gro ba'am rjes su 'gro ba dang sdod pa dang lhan cig tu sdod pa dang /_gnas pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa dang /_nyal ba dang lhan cig tu nyal ba dang /_'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams dang /_gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang /_sde dpon rnams 
[\[254a.4\]]dang /_sde dpon chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang /_nga ro sgrogs par byed pa dang /_sgra cher sgrogs par byed pa'o/_/'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas gnod sbyin 'dis tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis 'tshe bar byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par tho 'tsham 
[\[254a.5\]]par byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis gnod par byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par gnod par byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis ni mi gtong bar byed do/_/gnod sbyin rnams dang gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang /_sde dpon rnams dang sde dpon chen po rnams gang zhe na/_dbang po zla ba chu 
[\[254a.6\]]zla dang /_/b+hA ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag_/tsan dan dang 'od mchog dang /_/mgul pa mdzes dang mgul nges dang /_/skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang /_/lha las byung ba'i kha lo pa/_/dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/_/mi rgyal rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang /_/de bzhin ri dang gangs can dang /_/gang ba 
[\[254a.7\]]smin drug phug dang ni/_/'tsho ba dang ni btang bzung dang /_/sna tshogs bshes gnyen gnya' shing 'dzin/_/sa skyong rab tu rtogs pa dang /_/ngo tsha mig dang khang pa dang /_/lnga len gtum po Al ba ka/_/srid sgrub yid bzang bzhin bzang dang /_/zho gdong nor bu nor bu spyod/_/de bzhin dbang 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]phyug dang bcas so/_/'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams dang /_gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang /_sde dpon rnams dang sde dpon chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang /_nga ro sgrogs par byed pa dang /_sgra cher sgrogs par byed pa'o/_/'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas gnod sbyin 'dis 
[\[254b.2\]]tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis 'tshe bar byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par tho 'tsham par byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis gnod par byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par gnod par byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis ni mi gtong bar byed do/_/drang srong chen po 
[\[254b.3\]]'dis ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig_/dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_'tshe ba med pa dang /_bde ba dang /_legs par gnas so/_/drang srong chen po da ni bdag cag rnams 'gro bar bgyi'o/_/bdag 
[\[254b.4\]]cag rnams ni bya ba mang ba dang byed pa mang bas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyed rnams da ni 'gro bar gyis shig_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba byas nas der mi snang bar gyur to/_/gnod 
[\[254b.5\]]sbyin de rnams kyang langs nas gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das la snyun gsol te snyun gsol nas snying po dang snying po med pa ji ltar zhes zhus pa de rnams de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/
[\[254b.6\]]gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/gang la la zhig gis ming dang rigs rnam par dpyad nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/gang la la zhig cang mi smra bar gyur te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/lcang lo can gyi pho brang 
[\[254b.7\]]gi mdo las skabs rab mchog dang po'o//_//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i mtshan mo 'das nas dge slong rnams bos nas dge slong dag 'di'i mtshan mo rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams dang dri za'i sde mang po dang /_grul bum 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]gyi sde mang po dang /_klu'i sde mang po dang /_phyogs bzhi bsrung zhing gnas so/_/phyogs bzhir tshan tshan du gnas so/_/phyogs bzhi skyong zhing gnas so/_/mtshan mo 'ongs te kha dog sna tshogs pa can gyis bya rgod phung po'i ri 'ba' zhig snang bar byas te/_bcom 
[\[255a.2\]]ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste song nas nga la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/dge slong dag dang gnod sbyin de rnams gang la la zhig gis nga la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/gang su dag gis nga la snyun gsol te snyun gsol nas ji ltar snying po dang snying po med 
[\[255a.3\]]pa'i gtam 'dri zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/gang su dag gis nga la thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/gang su dag gis ming dang rigs dpyod cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/gang su dag cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas dge slong 
[\[255a.4\]]dag dang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus nga la 'di skad ces gsol nas/_gnod sbyin ma rungs pa yod pa rnams btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to/_/gnod sbyin ma rungs pa gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/_/gnod sbyin 'bring po gang la la zhig 
[\[255a.5\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to/_/gnod sbyin 'bring po gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/_/gnod sbyin dman pa gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to/_/gnod sbyin dman pa gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom 
[\[255a.6\]]ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/_/gnod sbyin gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis srog gcod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang /_ma byin par len pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang /_'dod pas log par spyod 
[\[255a.7\]]pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang /_myos par 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba spong ba'i chos bstan pas so/_/gnod sbyin gang de rnams btsun pas srog gcod pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang /_ma byin par len pa spong ba la mi dga' 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]bar gyur pa dang /_'dod pas log par spyod pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang /_myos par 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pas so/_/de rnams la mi dga' zhing mi 'dod par gyur to/_/btsun pa 
[\[255b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das nyan thos ji snyed yod pa rnams 'brog dgon pa'i lam du zhugs nas nyal ba dang 'dug pa dang brten to/_/sgra med cing dbyangs med par dben par gnas shing 'du 'dzi'i 'tshe ba med do/_/so sor dge sbyong rnams 'thun zhing gnas so/_/de na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa rnams 
[\[255b.3\]]kyi gnas yod do/_/gang zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la ma dad par gyur te/_de rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bslab par bya ste/_lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrung du gsol/_dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen 
[\[255b.4\]]ma rnams la bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_'tshe ba med pa dang /_bde ba dang legs par gnas so/_/dge slong rnams la bdag gis cang mi gsung ba'i tshul gyis gnang ba byin no/_/de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus gnang ba byin pa shes te/_de'i tshe 'di ltar lcang lo can 
[\[255b.5\]]gyi pho brang gis srungs shig ces gsol to/_/spyan ldan dpal dang ldan pa yi/_/rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can rnams la brtse ba yi/_/gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/mgon med rnams la gdung ba yi/_/thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdud 
[\[255b.6\]]kyi sde rnams 'joms pa yi/_/'khor ba 'jig la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bram ze dpal dang ldan pa yi/_/gser thub la yang phyag 'tshal lo/_/sems can rnam grol mdzad pa yi/_/'od srung la ni phyag 'tshal lo/_/shAkya'i sras ni dpal dang ldan/_/nyi ma'i rgyud la 
[\[255b.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/sdug bsngal kun las grol mdzad pa'i/_/gang zhig chos ni rab ston mdzad/_/gang yang 'jig rten par gyur pa/_/ji lta ba bzhin gzigs gyur pa'i/_/de rnams la ni phra ma med/_/'jigs pa med pa chen po ni/_/gang zhig gau tam phyag byed pa/_/lha 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]dang mi la phan pa yin/_/rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/_/'jigs pa med pa chen po ste/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni/_/gang zhig tu ni nub cing 'char/_/gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa/_/der ni mtshan mor 'gyur ba yin/_/gang du nyi ma shar gyur pa/_/der ni nyin 
[\[256a.2\]]mo zhes brjod do/_/gting ni zab pa'i rgya mtsho yi/_/de yi chu yi bcud bzang ngo /_/de ltar der ni skyes gyur pa'i/_/rgya mtsho'i chu yi bcud bzhin no/_/'dir ni shar gyi phyogs kyi ni/_/skye bo rnams la 'di brjod do/_/de yi phyogs ni yongs skyong ba'i/_/rgyal po chen po grags chen 
[\[256a.3\]]ldan/_/dri za rnams kyi bdag po ste/_/ming ni rgyal po yul 'khor skyong /_/dri za 'khor dang bcas pa ni/_/glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/_/de yi bu ni mang po rnams/_/ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/_/dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/_/de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/_/de yang 
[\[256a.4\]]sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_/nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni/_/'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/_/thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/_/skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/_/skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/_/mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 
[\[256a.5\]]'tshal/_/rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/_/de phyir de ltar 'di brjod do/_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/_/rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang yang [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]rjod byed pa/_/phra ma rgyab kyi sha can dang /_/srog gcod pa 
[\[256a.6\]]la chags pa dang /_/skye bo ma lus 'joms pa'o/_/'dir ni lho yi phyogs gnas pa'i/_/skye bo rnams la 'di skad brjod/_/de yi gnas ni yongs skyong ba/_/rgyal po chen po grags ldan pa/_/grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste/_/ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya/_/grul bum 
[\[256a.7\]]'khor dang bcas pa ni/_/glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/_/de yi bu ni mang po rnams/_/ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/_/dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/_/de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/_/de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_/nyi ma'i rgyud kyi sangs rgyas ni/_/'jigs dang bral 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]ba chen po la/_/thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/_/skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/_/skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/_/mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/_/rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/_/de phyir de ltar 'di brjod de/_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag 
[\[256b.2\]]gyis shig_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/_/rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/_/sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni/_/gang nas gang du shar gyur pa/_/der ni nyin mor 'gyur ba ste/_/nyin mo zhes ni brjod pa yin/_/gang du nyi ma nub 
[\[256b.3\]]gyur pa/_/der ni mtshan mor rjod par byed/_/gting ni zab pa'i rgya mtsho yi/_/de yi chu yi bcud bzang ngo /_/de ltar der ni skyes gyur pa'i/_/rgya mtsho'i chu yi bcud bzhin no/_/'dir ni nub kyi phyogs kyi ni/_/skye bo rnams la 'di brjod de/_/de yi phyogs ni kun skyong 
[\[256b.4\]]ba'i/_/rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/_/klu rnams kyi ni bdag po ste/_/'di yi ming ni mig mi bzang /_/klu yi 'khor dang bcas pa ni/_/glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/_/de yi bu ni mang po rnams/_/ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/_/dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/_/
[\[256b.5\]]de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/_/de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_/nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni/_/'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/_/thag ring nas ni phyag bgyid do/_/skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/_/skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge ba rtag tu gsung 
[\[256b.6\]]ba la/_/mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/_/rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/_/de phyir de ltar 'di brjod do/_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig/_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/_/rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/_/sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/_/gang zhig byang phyogs sgra mi 
[\[256b.7\]]snyan/_/lhun po blta na sdug ri dga'/_/der skyes pa yi mi rnams ni/_/bdag gir yongs su bzung ba med/_/de rnams sa bon 'debs pa med/_/rmo ba yang ni med pa yin/_/dka' spyad med par 'bras smin nas/_/mi rnams yongs su longs spyod de/_/sbun med ma grugs 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]shin tu dag_/dri bzang 'bras ni 'bras bur ldan/_/'bras kyi 'o ma la 'tshed cing /_/de bzhin btsos nas longs spyod do/_/ba lang rkang gcig la zhon nas/_/yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/_/rkang pa gcig pa'i phyugs zhon nas/_/yul dang phyogs su 'gro 
[\[257a.2\]]bar byed/_/bud med kyi ni bzhon pa la/_/zhon nas yul dang phyogs su 'gro/_/skyes ba'i bzhon pa la zhon nas/_/yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/_/gzhon nu ma yi bzhon pa la/_/zhon nas yul dang phyogs su 'gro/_/gzhon nu'i bzhon pa la zhon nas/_/yul dang phyogs su 
[\[257a.3\]]'gro bar byed/_/bzhon pa de rnams la zhon nas/_/phyogs kun du ni rjes su 'gro/_/gtso bo rgyal po khyad med do/_/glang chen bzhon dang rta yi bzhon/_/lha yi bzhon pa la gnas nas/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang ni khyogs rnams ni/_/rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/_/de'i yang grub pa'i grong 
[\[257a.4\]]khyer ni/_/dri med bar snang la gnas pa/_/lcang lo can dang ku sha'i grong /_/pha rol ku sha'i grong dang ni/_/nA TA'i grong dang pha rol gyi/_/ku shi ta yi grong yin no/_/byang gi phyogs na thams cad rgyas/_/skye bo'i tshogs pa mang po gnas/_/dgu bcu rtsa dgu grong mkha' la/_/rgyal 
[\[257a.5\]]po'i pho brang lcang lo can/_/slar yang drang srong chen po dang /_/rgyal po chen po lus ngan po/_/cog ldan zhes pa rgyal po chen po'i pho brang ngo /_/de'i phyir rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang lus ngan po zhes brjod do/_/so sor rab tu gsal zhing zhi ba dang de dang der ni de dang de mdangs dang 
[\[257a.6\]]de'i gzi brjid dang dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal po stobs dang ldan pa'i ming ngo /_/sa gzhi yang ni bcud ldan no/_/gnas der sprin rnams char 'bebs par byed do/_/der ni b+ha ga la ba tI zhes pa'i rdzing bu'o/_/gang du gnod sbyin tshogs dang lhan cig tu gnas so/_/der ni rtag tu shing 
[\[257a.7\]]gi 'bras/_/sna tshogs bya rnams lhan cig gnas/_/rma bya khrung khrung sgra sgrogs shing /_/khu byug rnams ni tshan tshan gnas/_/shang shang te'u sgra sgrogs shing /_/de nas yang ni ngur pa dang /_/gong mo nags kyi bya gag rnams/_/nags kyi rdzing bur gnas pa'o/_/ne tso ri skegs de 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]sgra 'byin/_/daN Ta mA na byA dkar dang /_/dus kun du ni mdzes par byed/_/lus ngan rgyal po'i rdzing rtag mdzes/_/'di ni byang gi phyogs kyi yul/_/skye bo rnams ni 'di bzhin brjod/_/de yi phyogs ni yongs skyong ba'i/_/rgyal po chen po grags dang ldan/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyi 
[\[257b.2\]]bdag po ste/_/'di yi ming ni lus ngan po/_/gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa ni/_/glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/_/de yi bu ni mang po rnams/_/ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/_/dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/_/de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/_/de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_/
[\[257b.3\]]nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni/_/'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/_/thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/_/skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/_/skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/_/mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/_/rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/_/de 
[\[257b.4\]]phyir de ltar 'di brjod do/_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig_/rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/_/rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/_/sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dir ni drang srong chen po lcang lo can dang bcas pas srungs shig_/dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam 
[\[257b.5\]]dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_'tshe ba med pa dang /_bde ba dang legs par gnas so/_/drang srong chen po gang su dag dge slong dang bcas pa 'am dge slong ma dang bcas pa 'am/_dge bsnyen dang bcas pa 'am dge bsnyen ma dang bcas pa rnams dang /_'dir lcang 
[\[257b.6\]]lo can gyi pho brang gis de bsrung ba dang /_yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad yongs su zung shig_/de yang mi ma yin rnams so/_/gnod sbyin nam gnod sbyin mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen po 'am gnod sbyin gyi 'khor ram gnod 
[\[257b.7\]]sbyin gyi g.yog 'khor ram/_dri za pho 'am dri za mo 'am dri za'i bu pho 'am dri za'i bu mo 'am dri za'i blon po chen po 'am dri za'i 'khor ram dri za'i g.yog 'khor ram/_grul bum pho 'am grul bum mo 'am grul bum gyi bu pho 'am grul bum gyi bu mo 'am grul bum gyi blon po chen po 'am 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]grul bum gyi 'khor ram grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/_klu pho 'am klu mo 'am klu'i bu pho 'am klu'i bu mo 'am klu'i blon po chen po 'am klu'i 'khor ram klu'i g.yog 'khor rnams rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis 'gro ba 'am rjes su 'gro ba 'am rjes su 'gro ba dang /_sdod 
[\[258a.2\]]pa dang lhan cig tu sdod pa dang /_gnas pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa dang /_nyal ba dang lhan cig tu nyal ba rnams la/_drang srong chen po 'di rnams ni mi ma yin rnams zhes bya'o/_/grong ngam grong rdal lam/_bkur stir byed pa 'am bsti stang du byed pa rnams/_drang srong chen po mi ma yin 
[\[258a.3\]]rnams kyis de thob pa ma yin no/_/rgyal po chen po'i pho brang lcang lo can zhes bya ba gzhi 'am gnas sa med do/_/drang srong chen po mi ma yin rnams kyis gnod sbyin dang lhan cig tu gnas pa 'am mi 'thob bo/_/drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyi bka' mnyan par bya'o/_/drang 
[\[258a.4\]]srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyis bdag la phan pa rdzogs pa dang /_pha rol la smod pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams la snod mer rab tu 'bar ba mgo la bkon pa dang /_drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyis mgo bo tshal pa bdun 
[\[258a.5\]]du gsheg par byed do/_/drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin ni gtum pa dang drag pa dang khro ba'o/_/de rnams kyis 'di ltar rgyal po chen po la rjod par byed do/_/rgyal po chen po la brjod par ma nus na skyes bu la sogs pa la rjod par byed do/_/rgyal po chen po'i skyes bu la brjod par 
[\[258a.6\]]ma nus na de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do/_/drang srong chen po de yang mi ma yin rnams rgyal po la 'gal ba smra ba'o/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/_ma ga d+hA'i yul gyi rgyal po la chom rkun byung na de ma thag tu rgyal po la rjod par byed do/_/rgyal po la brjod par ma nus na rgyal po'i skyes 
[\[258a.7\]]bu la rjod par byed do/_/skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na/_de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la rjod par byed pa bzhin no/_/drang srong chen po de yang ma ga d+hA'i rgyal po la chom rkun gyis gnod par byed par brjod do/_/drang srong chen po 'di lta bu'i mi ma yin yod pa rnams gtum pa dang drag pa dang khro ba'o/_/de ma thag 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]tu rgyal po chen po rnams la rjod par byed do/_/rgyal po chen po la brjod par ma nus na rgyal po'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do/_/skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do/_/drang srong chen po mi ma yin rnams rgyal po chen po rnams la 'gal ba rjod par byed do/_/drang 
[\[258b.2\]]srong chen po mi ma yin gang zhig gnod sbyin nam gnod sbyin mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen po 'am gnod sbyin gyi 'khor ram gnod sbyin gyi g.yog 'khor ram/_dri za pho 'am dri za mo 'am dri za'i bu pho 'am dri za'i bu mo 'am dri za'i blon po chen po 'am 
[\[258b.3\]]dri za'i 'khor ram dri za'i g.yog 'khor ram/_grul bum pho 'am grul bum mo 'am grul bum gyi bu pho 'am grul bum gyi bu mo 'am grul bum gyi blon po chen po 'am grul bum gyi 'khor ram grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/_klu pho 'am klu mo 'am klu'i bu pho 'am klu'i bu mo 'am klu'i blon po chen 
[\[258b.4\]]po 'am klu'i 'khor ram klu'i g.yog 'khor rnams rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma rnams 'gro ba 'am rjes su 'gro ba 'am rjes su 'gro ba dang sdod pa dang lhan cig tu sdod pa dang nyal ba dang lhan cig tu nyal ba dang /_'di rnams ni gnod sbyin 
[\[258b.5\]]rnams dang /_gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang /_sde dpon rnams dang /_sde dpon chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang /_nga ro sgrogs par byed pa dang /_sgra cher sgrogs par byed pa'o/_/'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas gnod sbyin 'dis tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis 'tshe bar 
[\[258b.6\]]byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par tho 'tsham par byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis gnod par byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par gnod par byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis mi gtong bar byed do/_/gnod sbyin rnams dang gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang /_sde dpon rnams 
[\[258b.7\]]dang /_sde dpon chen po rnams gang zhe na/_dbang po zla ba chu zla dang /_/b+hA ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag_/tsan dan dang 'dod mchog dang /_/mgul pa mdzes dang mgul nges dang /_/skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang /_/lha las byung ba'i kha lo pa/_/dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/_/mi rgyal 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang /_/de bzhin ri dang gangs can dang /_/gang ba smin drug phug dang ni/_/'tshe ba dang ni btang bzung dang /_/sna tshogs bshes gnyen gnya' shing 'dzin/_/sa skyong rab tu rtogs pa dang /_/ngo tsha mig dang khang pa dang /_/lnga len gtum pa Al 
[\[259a.2\]]pa ka/_/srid sgrub yid bzang bzhin bzang dang /_/zho gdong nor bu nor bu spyod/_/de bzhin dbang phyug dang bcas so/_/'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams dang /_gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang /_sde dpon rnams dang /_sde dpon chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang /_nga ro sgrogs 
[\[259a.3\]]par byed pa dang /_sgra cher sgrogs par byed pa'o/_/'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas gnod sbyin 'dis tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis 'tshe bar byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par tho 'tsham par byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis gnod par byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis 
[\[259a.4\]]rnam par gnod par byed pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'dis ni mi gtong bar byed do/_/drang srong chen po 'dis ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig_/dge slong dang dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang 'tshe ba med pa dang /_bde ba dang legs 
[\[259a.5\]]par gnas so/_/drang srong chen po da ni bdag cag rnams 'gro bar bgyi'o/_/bdag cag rnams ni bya ba mang ba dang /_byed pa mang bas so/_/dge slong dag bdag gis da ni rgyal po chen po rnams la 'gro ba'i gnang ba byin no/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams langs nas bdag la 
[\[259a.6\]]phyag byas te/_bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang langs nas bdag la phyag byas bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/gang su dag gis bdag la snyun gsol te/_snyun gsol nas snying po dang snying po med 
[\[259a.7\]]pa ji ltar zhes zhus pa de rnams de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/gang su dag gis bdag ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas 'dud pa byas te mi snang bar gyur to/_/gang la la zhig gis ming dang rigs rnam par dpyad nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/gang la la zhig cang mi smra bar gyur te 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/dge slong dag kha don du zung la lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig_/dge slong dag chongs la lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig_/dge slong dag don dang bcas pas lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig_/dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/_dge 
[\[259b.2\]]bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang /_sba ba dang /_'tshe ba med pa dang /_bde ba dang legs par gnas so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_/dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//skabs 
[\[259b.3\]]rab mchog gnyis pa ste lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//paN+Di ta A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas/_mang du thos pa'i lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos/_skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing 
[\[259b.4\]]zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//sa'i steng du nyi zla ltar gyur cig/[ {D34}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_ma hA sa ma ya sU tra/_bod skad du/_'dus pa chen po'i mdo/_'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa 
[\[259b.5\]]dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i yul ser skya'i gzhi'i tshal chen po na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po lnga brgya ste/_de thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so/_/'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha rnams de ma thag tu 'dus te/_bcom ldan 'das dang dge 
[\[259b.6\]]slong gi dge 'dun rnams blta ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i ris bzhi po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya'i yul ser skya'i gzhi'i tshal chen po na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po lnga brgya ste/_de thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa 
[\[259b.7\]]rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so/_/'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha rnams de ma thag tu 'dus te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams blta ba'i phyir ro/_/gang dag de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der de dag song ste song nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]bcad pa so sor brjod par bya'o/_/de nas lha de rnams kyis 'di lta ste skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las/_brkyang ba tsam dang brkyang ba las bskum pa de bzhin du gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams mi snang bar gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang bar gyur to/_/de 
[\[260a.2\]]nas lha de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas yang lha de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams gsol to/_/'dus pa chen po'i tshal 'di ru/_/lha yi tshogs rnams 'dus pa ste/_/chos 
[\[260a.3\]]'di'i phyir du bdag 'ongs pa/_/dge 'dun mi pham 'dus pa blta/_/de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to/_/dge 'dun sems rnams dul ba dang /_/rang gi sems ni drang por byas/_/kha lo sgyur bas drang por 'dzin/_/de bzhin mkhas 
[\[260a.4\]]pas dbang po bsrung /_/de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to/_/khyim gyi 'ching ba bton pa dang /_/dbang po nas ni sems 'gro zhing /_/dag cing dri med der 'gro ba/_/mig ldan glang po dul ba bzhin/_/de nas lha gzhan rnams 
[\[260a.5\]]kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro ba/_/de ni ngan song 'gro mi 'gyur/_/mi yi lus ni spangs nas su/_/lha yi lus ni yongs rdzogs 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams bos te de ma thag tu 
[\[260a.6\]]dge slong dag 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha rnams 'dus te de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa blta ba'i phyir ro/_/dge slong gang de rnams su gyur pa 'das pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams bcom ldan 'das de tsam du gyur pa de bzhin du lha rnams 
[\[260a.7\]]'dus par gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_bdag kyang 'di skad ces smra ste/_dge slong dag lha'i tshogs rnams kyi ming brjod par bya ste/_dge slong dag rab tu gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i lha'i tshogs dang /_dge slong dag lha'i tshogs ston par byed pa zhes bya ba'o/_/de thos nas legs par yid la zung shig 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]dang ngas bshad par bya'o/_/de ltar btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dge slong de rnams kyis so sor zhus nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/tshigs su bcad pa so sor bshad/_/gang du sa gzhi mthong gyur na/_/ri yi phug tu gang gnas pa/_/de ru mnyam 
[\[260b.2\]]par 'jog par byed/_/sa gzhir seng ge 'jigs med bzhin/_/ba spu tsam yang g.yo ba med/_/sems ni dag cing dkar ba dang /_/chu ni rab tu dngas bzhin du/_/lnga brgya po yis legs shes shing /_/ser skya'i tshal gyi gnas mang po/_/de nas dge slong ston pas bos/_/bstan 
[\[260b.3\]]la dga' ba'i nyan thos rnams/_/lha yi tshogs rnams 'ongs nas ni/_/dge slong rnams kyis de shes bya/_/lus ni gdung bar ma byed par/_/sangs rgyas bstan pa thos pas so/_/de rnams ye shes snang bar 'gyur/_/mi ma yin rnams mthong 'gyur ba/_/gang zhig 
[\[260b.4\]]gis ni brgya mthong zhing /_/stong dang bdun cu mthong ba yin/_/brgya dang stong phrag gcig dang ni/_/mi ma yin rnams mthong bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig gis ni mtha' med mthong /_/phyogs kun gang bar 'gyur ba mthong /_/de rnams kyis ni rtogs pa dang /_/spyan ldan rnam par 
[\[260b.5\]]dpyad nas ni/_/de phyir ston pa yis ni bos/_/bstan la dga' ba'i nyan thos kyis/_/lha yi tshogs rnams 'ongs nas ni/_/dge slong rnams kyis de shes bya/_/gang zhig la ni bdag bshad bya/_/[{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du mnyan par gyis/_/stong phrag bdun gyi gnod sbyin rnams/_/
[\[260b.6\]]ser skya'i sa la gnas pa ni/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/_/chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/_/zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/_/stong phrag drug ni gangs can gyi/_/gnod sbyin kha dog sna tshogs lus/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/
[\[260b.7\]]kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/_/chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/_/zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/_/sna tshogs bshes gnyen lnga brgya po/_/gnod sbyin kha dog sna tshogs lus/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/_/chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]'ongs te/_/zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/_/rgyal khab gnod sbyin chu srin ni/_/ngos yangs ri la gnas pa yin/_/stobs ldan 'bum phrag gcig po ni/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyi 'khor gyis bskor/_/rgyal khab gnod sbyin chu srin ni/_/zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/_/
[\[261a.2\]]shar gyi phyogs kyi rgyal po ni/_/ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes pa/_/dri za rnams kyi bdag po ste/_/rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/_/de yi bu ni mang po rnams/_/ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/_/dbang po zhes bya stobs chen po/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog dang ni 
[\[261a.3\]]grags par ldan/_/chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/_/zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/_/lho yi phyogs kyi'ang rgyal po ni/_/ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya/_/grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste/_/rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/_/de yi bu ni mang po rnams/_/ming ni gcig tu 
[\[261a.4\]]thos pa ste/_/dbang po zhes bya stobs chen po/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/_/chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/_/zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/_/nub kyi phyogs kyi rgyal po ni/_/ming ni mig mi bzang zhes grags/_/klu rnams kyi ni bdag po 
[\[261a.5\]]ste/_/rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/_/de yi bu ni mang po rnams/_/ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/_/dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs dang ldan/_/kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/_/chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/_/zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/_/
[\[261a.6\]]byang gi phyogs kyi rgyal po ni/_/de ming lus ngan po zhes grags/_/gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po ste/_/rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/_/de yi bu ni mang po rnams/_/ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/_/dbang po zhes bya stobs chen po/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha 
[\[261a.7\]]dog dang ni grags par ldan/_/chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/_/zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/_/shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor skyong /_/lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/_/nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang /_/byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/_/de rnams rgyal po chen po 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]bzhi/_/phyogs rnams bzhi po kun du'o/_/gzi brjid 'bar bas 'khod nas ni/_/ser skya'i gzhi yi tshal du'o/_/de rnams sgyu ma rtsed mo bsam/_/drung ldan rnams ni nam mkhar 'khod/_/sgyu ma sku Te N+ya bai Da Nu/_/bir+ya ts+tsha bir+ya Do bcas/_/tsan dan dang 'dod mchog dang /_/
[\[261b.2\]]mgul pa mdzes dang mgul nges dang /_/skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang /_/lha las byung ba'i kha lo pa/_/dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/_/mi rgyal rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang /_/mdun du rtse mo lnga de bzhin/_/g.yer ma dang ni nyi zer dang /_/de dang gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams/_/rgyal po 
[\[261b.3\]]dri za dang bcas dang /_/chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs nas/_/zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/_/de nas gzhan yang nam mkha'i klu/_/yangs pa can du lhan cig gnas/_/la ba rta yi mchog dang ni/_/rab 'gro gnyen dang lhan cig pa/_/ya mu na dang yul 'khor skyong /_/klu yi spun 
[\[261b.4\]]dang grags ldan dang /_/sa srung glang po chen po rnams/_/de yang nags kyi tshal du'o/_/gang zhig klu rgyal myur du len/_/lha dang bya dang rnam dag mig_/nam mkha' las 'ongs tshal der sleb/_/sna tshogs 'dab [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}(]ces [,]zhes [)]de'i ming /_/'jigs med byin pas klu yi rgyal/_/mkha' 
[\[261b.5\]]lding bzod pa rtogs pas so/_/phan tshun du ni mi rtsod cing /_/klu khyung sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro ba/_/rdo rje lag gis rgyal ba dang /_/lha ma yin ni rgya mtshor gnas/_/spun rnams de yi gnas dang ni/_/gzi brjid ldan zhing grags dang ldan/_/nag po mig sman 'jigs byed ldan/_/
[\[261b.6\]]lha ma yin rnams khro byed dang /_/thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang ni thags [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]ris/_/mtshan 'joms na mo tsi dang bcas/_/stobs kyi bu ni brgyad po rnams/_/thams cad rnam par snang mdzad ming /_/stobs kyi sde ni go bgos pa/_/sgra gcan bzang po sngon du 'gro/_/btsun pa de ni 'dus nas ni/_/
[\[261b.7\]]zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/_/chu dang lha dang sa dang ni/_/me dang rlung yang der 'ongs so/_/chu lha chu yi lha dang ni/_/zla ba dang ni grags par ldan/_/byams dang snying rje'i tshogs can dang /_/lha ni grags ldan mdun du'o/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs rnams ni/_/thams cad kha dog 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]sna tshogs lus/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/_/chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/_/zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/_/khyab 'jug lha dang lhan cig tu/_/tha dad tha dad 'ongs pa dang /_/zla ba de yi 'khor gyi lha/_/zla ba'i mdun byas 
[\[262a.2\]]'khor dang ni/_/nyi ma'i 'khor gyi lha rnams dang /_/nyi ma'i mdun byas 'khor dang ni/_/rgyu skar de yi 'khor dang yang /_/mdun byas pa la ha ka dang /_/sa dang sa yi gtso bo dang /_/brgya byin yang yang sbyin pa dang /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs rnams dang /_/thams cad kha dog sna tshogs 
[\[262a.3\]]lus/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/_/chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/_/zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/_/de nas nyer spyod lha dang ni/_/chu dang me yi rtse mo bzhin/_/sgra ldan snang bar byed pa dang /_/u ma'i me tog de bzhin du/_/chu lha dang bcas 
[\[262a.4\]]chos dang ni/_/ats+tsu ta dang du ma rnams/_/bzang len mdzes pa'i mdun dang ni/_/mdun dang gnas dang du ma dang /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs dang ni/_/thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/_/chos 
[\[262a.5\]]gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/_/zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/_/'dus dang 'dus pa chen po ni/_/mi dang mi yi mchog dang ni/_/rol pa'i go 'phang mdun du dang /_/yid mchog dang ni go 'phang rtse/_/de nas lha yi mchod 'os dang /_/gang yang dmar po'i gos gyon dang /_/
[\[262a.6\]]pha rol pha rol son chen dang /_/grags chen lha yi mdun gnas dang /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs dang ni/_/thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/_/chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/_/zhi bas dge 
[\[262a.7\]]slong tshal du'o/_/dkar dang drod dang dmar po dang /_/sngon shugs stug po lhan cig dang /_/dkar po 'dzin pa la sogs dang /_/mkhas pa'i lha ni sngon du'o/_/rtag tu glang chen myos 'phrang ba/_/'dres pa grags dang ldan pa dang /_/pradz+nyu na mang po mdun du dang /_/gang zhig phyogs 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]ni mdzes pa dang /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs rnams dang /_/thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/_/chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/_/zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/_/dge ba dga' ldan 'thab bral 
[\[262b.2\]]dang /_/grags ldan shing dang ldan pa dang /_/'phyang ba gnas dang gtso bo dang /_/'od dang bsam pa zhes bya dang /_/'phrul dga' ba ni sngon du dang /_/de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed sngon/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs dang ni/_/thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/_/rdzu 
[\[262b.3\]]'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/_/chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs nas/_/zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/_/sna tshogs drug po'i sde pa ni/_/thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/_/ming ni grags dang ldan pa sngon/_/khang gzhan 'dra ba lhan cig tu/_/ma lus rigs ni brjod pa 
[\[262b.4\]]dang /_/zag med tshogs ni pha rol brgal/_/glang chen tshogs ni blta ba dang /_/zla ba bzhad pa gsum ldan dang /_/tshangs bzang mchog gi thob pa dang /_/rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i bu dang ni/_/de yi dga' ba'i gzhon nu ni/_/de rnams zhi bas tshal du'o/_/tshangs pa'i 
[\[262b.5\]]'jig rten stong du ni/_/tshangs pa chen po nye bar 'khod/_/'od dang ldan par skye ba dang /_/grags ldan sna tshogs lus dang ni/_/dbang phyug bcu po sngon du dang /_/so so dbang du gyur pa dang /_/de yi dbus dang sngon du dang /_/'phrog ma 'khor dang bcas pa'o/_/de rnams thams 
[\[262b.6\]]cad 'ongs gyur nas/_/dbang po lha dang tshangs bcas 'ongs/_/bdud kyi sde rnams 'ongs nas ni/_/gau tam thugs ni blta ba dang /_/'di ni zung shig chings shig brjod/_/chags pa glang po bcings pa bzhin/_/'khor dang bcas pas bskor nas ni/_/gang du'ang stong pa ma yin 
[\[262b.7\]]no/_/de la 'di ni bde chen dang /_/gau tam sde la gnod mi nus/_/lag pa thal mo rdebs pa dang /_/'jigs par byed pa'i cho nge sgrogs/_/ji ltar rlung gis sprin rnams dang /_/mun nag glog dang bcas pa ni/_/de ma thag tu 'jigs dang bral/_/bsam pa khro ba med par gnas/_/
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]lha de rnams thams cad dang tshangs pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/_/bdud kyi sde de rnams kyang cang mi smra ba'i tshul gyis song ngo /_/ston pas nyan thos bstan pa la dga' ba rnams bos te/_de yang 'jigs pa med 
[\[263a.2\]]byed dang /_/dag pa'i sangs rgyas bstan pa la/_/'jigs med 'dod chags bral ba ni/_/de yi ba spu'ang g.yo ba med/_/g.yul ni kun las rgyal ba dang /_/'jigs pa 'das shing grags par ldan/_/lha dang lhan cig brjod pa dang /_/nyan thos rnams ni der gnas so/_/bcom 
[\[263a.3\]]ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'dus pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs [{]s+ho[,]so[}]//_//paN+Di ta A nan+da shrI'i zhal snga nas thos pa'i lo tsA ba shAkya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal 
[\[263a.4\]]bzang pos/_skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa/_gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//sa'i steng du nyi ma dang zla ba ltar gyur cig/[ {D35}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_mai tri sU tra/_bod skad du/_byams pa'i mdo/_'phags 
[\[263a.5\]]pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/_/ston pa dus gcig na ser skya'i gzhi dang /_n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba dang /_chu klung ro hi ni'i 'gram na bzhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ma 'ongs pa'i rgyal ba de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/_khyed kyi rjes bstan blo 
[\[263a.6\]]brtan ni/_/ci 'dra'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar/_/spyan ldan yongs su rgyas par ni/_/bdag ni rab tu nyan par 'dod/_/gnas brtan zhus pa gsan nas ni/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs/_/bsod nams phung po mi nyung ba'i/_/grags pa chen po mi pham pa'i/_/yon 
[\[263a.7\]]tan thams cad brjod mi nus/_/mdor bsdus nas ni legs bshad pa/_/phyogs gcig tsam ni bstan par bya/_/shA ri'i bu nyon nga yi tshig_/'di ni bskal pa bzang po ste/_/skye ba bye ba'i lo ru ni/_/byams pa zhes pa'i ming nyid kyis/_/rkang gnyis mchog gi sangs rgyas so/_/
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]ji ltar nga 'das nas dang por dus lnga 'byung ste/_'bras bu'i bar gyi dus dang /_bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus dang /_lung gi bar gyi dus dang /_rtags tsam gyi bar gyi dus dang /_sku gdung gi bar gyi dus so/_/de la 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus ni/_sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_
[\[263b.2\]]lo stong phrag gcig gi nang du rtogs pa bskyed par nus so/_/de song zhing song ba'i dus so/_/phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang /_rgyun du zhugs pa'o/_/de rnams yod pa na 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus med ces brjod par mi bya'o/_/lhag ma ni rgyun du zhugs pa 
[\[263b.3\]]ste/_de 'das nas 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus zhes bya ba ni/_zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gyi 'bras bu bslab par mi nus par/_pham pa bzhi po bsrung bar nus pa tsam mo/_/
[\[263b.4\]]song zhing song ba'i dus su/_pham pa bzhi po nyid bsrung ba tsam mo/_/pham pa bzhi po srung bar byed pa ni/_dge slong rnams stong phrag gcig gi nang na brgya tsam yod na yang bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes mi bya'o/_/brgya'i nang na dge slong gcig tsam yod pa las sdom pa 
[\[263b.5\]]zhig pa dang /_shi ba na bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya'o/_/'di ni bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya'o/_/lung gi bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya ba ni/_sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab sde snod gsum po'i don mi go zhing sgra tsam klog pa dang /_po ti yod pa'i bar ni lung gi bar gyi dus yongs 
[\[263b.6\]]su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/_/song zhing song ba'i dus su rtsod pa'i dus kyi rgyal po rnams chos ma yin pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/blon po la sogs pa rnams kyang chos ma yin pa byed par 'gyur te/_de nas yul 'khor rnams dang /_ljongs rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/de rnams kyi chos ma yin 
[\[263b.7\]]pa'i rgyu yis lha rnams char legs par mi 'bebs so/_/'bru rnams legs par mi smin no/_/de rnams kyi 'bru ma smin pas dge slong gi dge 'dun la bza' ba ster mi nus so/_/dge slong rnams kyis kha zas ma rnyed pas slob ma dang yang slob rnams 'dzin par mi nus so/_/song zhing 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]song ba'i dus su lung gi bar gyi dus dman pa'o/_/dang po ni rab tu byed pa chen po nyams par 'gyur ro/_/de nub nas ya ma ka~M gi tshigs su bcad pa dang /_gzhi dang gang zag dang gdags pa dang /_sku gdung gi gtam dang /_rnam 'byed dang /_chos bsdu ba nub par 'gyur 
[\[264a.2\]]ba'o/_/chos mngon pa'i sde snod nub nas/_mdo sde'i sde snod nub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas a~M ga phyi ma'i sde pa nub par 'gyur ro/_/a~M ga phyi ma'i sde pa nub nas/_yang dag par ldan pa'i sde pa nub par 'gyur ro/_/bar ma'i sde pa dang ring po'i sde pa nub par 'gyur ro/_/ring po'i sde pa 
[\[264a.3\]]nub nas 'dul ba dang bcas pa'i skyes rabs gnas so/_/'dul ba'i sde snod la yang ngo tsha dang ldan pa tsam 'dzin no/_/song zhing song ba'i dus su skyes pa'i rabs tsam yang 'dzin par mi nus so/_/dang po thams cad sgrol gyi skyes pa'i rabs nub par 'gyur ro/_/tha mar lo ma med pa'i skyes pa'i 
[\[264a.4\]]rabs nub par 'gyur ro/_/skyes rabs rnams nub nas 'dul ba'i sde snod 'ba' zhig 'dzin no/_/song zhing song ba'i dus su/_mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab kyi tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam dar bar byed na/_lung gi bar gyi dus nub pa med do/_/gang zhig rgyal po chos la 
[\[264a.5\]]dad pa'i dus su glang po che'i rgyab tu gser gyi za ma tog gcig bzhag ste/_nor stong phrag gcig de ru bcug nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gang gis shes pa des nor stong phrag de long zhes grong khyer gyi dbus su rol mo'i sgra lan gsum bsgrags nas de 
[\[264a.6\]]skad brjod de/_de len par mi nus pa na nor stong phrag de rgyal po'i mdzod du yang 'jog go/_/de'i dus ni lung gi bar gyi dus nub pa'i dus su 'gyur ro/_/'di ni lung gi bar gyi dus nub pa'i dus zhes bya ba yin no/_/song zhing song ba'i dus su/_chos gos 'dzin pa dang /_lhung 
[\[264a.7\]]bzed 'dzin pa dang /_gcer bu pa'i dge sbyong dang 'dra bar chag tshang ku ba'i snod/_slong ba'i snod dang /_lag pa'i rtse mo la 'phyang ba'i tshul dang 'dra ba dang /_dra ba'i nang du khyer nas 'gro ba'o/_/song zhing song ba'i dus su/_gos ngur smrig gis bdag la ci byed/_cung 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]zad chos su byas pa'i dum bu lag pa'am/_mgrin pa'am/_rna ba rnams su 'am/_skra rnams la 'gebs so/_/bag ma len pa dang /_so nam dang /_tshong la sogs pa byas nas/_'tsho ba'i phyir du spyod cing 'gro bar byed do/_/de'i tshe yon ster cing dge 
[\[264b.2\]]'dun gyi ched du de thams cad ster bar byed de/_de'i tshe ngas kun dga' bo dge 'dun gyi yon gyi 'bras bu ni grangs med par bshad do/_/song zhing song ba'i dus su/_'di ci bdag gi don du ngur smrig gi dum bu btogs nas dgon pa'am nags tshal du skyur bar byed do/_/de 
[\[264b.3\]]rnams kyi dus su rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i bar gyi dus nub par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa'i dus zhes bya ba yin no/_/de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa lo stong phrag lnga pa la rnyed pa dang bkur sti la sogs pa'i rnyed pa chung 
[\[264b.4\]]ngo /_/sku gdung rnams rnyed bkur byed pa'i gnas su 'gro bar byed do/_/song zhing song ba'i dus su/_gnas thams cad du bkur sti dang bsti stang ma thob nas/_bstan pa tha ma'i dus su klu'i yul dang /_lha'i 'jig rten dang /_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi gnas thams cad nas 
[\[264b.5\]]'ongs nas/_sku gdung thams cad byang chub kyi snying po kho nar bsdus te sangs rgyas kyi sku ru gyur nas/_gshin rje rdzu 'phrul du ma ston pa dang 'dra bar gzhan la ston no/_/de'i gnas su sems can mir gyur pa'i ming yang med do/_/stong phrag bcu'i lha'i 'jig rten gyi khor yug gi bar 
[\[264b.6\]]thams cad 'dus nas/_de ring stobs bcu pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed do/_/deng nas bzung nas mun nag tu gyur to/_/zhes ngu bar byed do/_/sku gdung thams cad la me'i khams langs nas de'i sku lus lhag ma med par sreg par byed do/_/'di ni sku gdung gi bar 
[\[264b.7\]]gyi dus nub pa zhes bya ba yin no/_/de nas lo stong phrag lnga po 'dir bstan pa nub par gyur nas 'jig rten pa rnams la mi dge ba lhag par 'phel bar byed do/_/zhes bya ba'i don no/_/mi rnams la ngo tsha dang khrel med par 'gyur zhing ma dang /_bu mo dang /_sring mo la sogs pa'i 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]'du shes med par 'gyur ro/_/phag dang ce spyang la sogs pa dang 'dra bar ngo tsha med par 'gyur ro/_/de nas mi dge ba la sbyor zhing tshe bri nas tshe lo bcu par 'gyur ro/_/lo lnga pa'i khye'u la lo lnga pa'i bu mo bag mar len no/_/yang lo lnga'i nang nyid du bu dang bu mo dang tsha bo dang 
[\[265a.2\]]tsha mo'ang 'byung ngo /_/de'i dus su mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa bar ma gsum ste/_mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma dang /_nad kyi bskal pa bar ma dang /_mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma'o/_/de la gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams la 'dod pa 
[\[265a.3\]]lhag par skyes nas mu ge'i bskal pa bar mar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe gti mug lhag par che ste/_nad kyi bskal pa bar mar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe skyon du gyur pa de'i dus su mtshon gyi bskal pa bar mar 'gyur ro/_/mu ge'i bskal pa bar mas sems can rnams brlag par byas nas 
[\[265a.4\]{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/nad kyi bskal pa bar mas sems can rnams brlag par byas nas dud 'gror skye bar byed do/_/mtshon gyi bskal pa bar mas sems can rnams brlag par byas nas dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe mi rnams phan tshun du [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi 'du shes dang 
[\[265a.5\]]bcas pa thob par gyur nas mtshon so gcig pa dang /_mtshon so gnyis pa dang /_spu gri'i so dang 'dra ba'i mtshon cha rnams bzung nas phan tshun gsod par byed do/_/de rnams su mkhas pa gang zhig des 'joms par thos nas ri'i sul la sogs par zhag bdun gyi kha zas bzung ste 
[\[265a.6\]]yib nas sdod do/_/de rnams su ma yib pa'i sems can lhag ma rnams phan tshun du rdeg cing gsod do/_/sa gzhi thams cad sha dang khrag tu 'gyur ro/_/de'i dus su sprin chen po 'dus nas char 'bebs par byed do/_/lha yis char bab pa'i rjes su dri zhim pa'i char 'bab cing 
[\[265a.7\]]'bab par byed do/_/de rnams kyi dus su gnas thams cad yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/_/gnas thams cad dag par gyur nas 'bras shun pa can gyi char 'bab cing 'bab par 'gyur ro/_/'bras shun pa can gyi char phab pa'i rjes su 'bras shun pa med pa'i char 'bab cing 'bab par 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/de'i rjes su gos dang rgyan gyi char 'bab cing 'bab par byed do/_/de'i mthar pus mo nub tsam gyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab cing 'bab par byed do/_/de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dri zhim pa yi char 'bab cing /_/shun 
[\[265b.2\]]can shun med 'bras kyi char/_/gos dang rgyan gyi char 'bab pa/_/de ltar dga' tshal mdzes pa bzhin/_/rin chen sna bdun ma lus pa'i/_/de yi gnas su char 'bab bo/_/gnas kun gang bar byas nas ni/_/de tshe dga' tshal mdzes pa bzhin/_/de rnams 'das 
[\[265b.3\]]nas mi yib pa rnams 'thon te/_de rnams 'thon nas phan tshun du 'khyud pa dang /_ngu ba dang /_tshul khrims lnga la sogs pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams rjes su dran par byas nas rdzogs par rtsom mo/_/de nas tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams las skyes pa'i bu dang bu mo tshe lo nyi shu par 
[\[265b.4\]]'phel lo/_/de nas mi rnams la lhag par chos 'phel bas [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin du tshe 'phel te tshe lo grangs med par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe sems can rnams la rgas pa dang 'chi ba mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar sems can gzhan yang bag yod par 'gyur te/_dmyal ba'i sdug 
[\[265b.5\]]bsngal zhes bya ba ni ci zhes sems can rnams sems pa med do/_/de nas tshe lo grangs med pa rnams 'bri bar byed do/_/sngar bzhin du bri nas tshe lo brgyad khri par 'gyur ro/_/de'i dus su 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du lha'i bu mo'i skal ba dang 'dra bar bud med dang /_de ltar 
[\[265b.6\]]skyes pa dang bcas pas gang bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i char pa zla ba phyed du 'bab pa dang /_zhag bcu dang /_zhag lnga dang /_nyin zhag phyed du sa'i bcud 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe sa gzhi thams cad kyi cha mnyam pa dang /_tsher ma dang shing rad rod med cing /_grong khyer la 
[\[265b.7\]]phyogs bzhi'i sgo dang ldan pa dang /_grong khyer gyi dbus su dpag bsam gyi shing skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_de nas de yi grong khyer ni/_/sna tshogs tshong 'dus so so dang /_/legs par rab byung rdzing bu dang /_/dga' zhing rab tu gnas pa dang /_/dri ma med 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]pa'i chu chen po/_/shin tu grang zhing dri bzang ldan/_/rnyog med mnyam zhing tshim pa dang /_/de nas rnyog ma yang dag gnas/_/pad ma ud pal gyis gang zhing /_/dba' rlabs dang ni rnyog pa med/_/tA la'i phreng ba bdun gnas zhing /_/rin chen 
[\[266a.2\]]rang bzhin gyis khebs pa/_/lcags ri bdun dang ldan pa dang /_/grong khyer thams cad 'brel ba dang /_/rtswa can rgyal po'i pho brang ni/_/de tshe tog dang ldan par 'gyur/_/grong khyer phyogs kyi sgo bzhi ru/_/dpag bsam shing ni skye bar 'gyur/_/sngon po ser po 
[\[266a.3\]]dmar po dang /_/dkar po rab tu gsal ba'i 'od/_/lha yi gos ni skye bar 'gyur/_/lha yi drin gyis rgyan dang ni/_/longs spyod nye bar spyod pa rnams/_/thams cad steng nas 'phyang ba yin/_/de nas grong khyer dbus su ni/_/khang dmig bzhi dang ldan pa yin/_/
[\[266a.4\]]bsod nams las kyis grub pa ni/_/dpag bsam shing gi steng nas 'byung /_/ras bal ras ni bzang po dang /_/ko ma u dum bA ra'i ras/_/bsod nams las kyis grub pa ni/_/dpag bsam shing gi steng nas 'byung /_/mr-i da~M ga ni lag pas rdung /_/mu ra rdza dang 
[\[266a.5\]]a lam b+ha/_/bsod nams las las byung ba ni/_/dpag bsam shing gi steng nas 'byung /_/dpung rgyan dag gi rgyan dang ni/_/dpung rgyan dang ni do shal dang /_/rin chen rang bzhin mgul pa'i rgyan/_/bsod nams las las byung ba ni/_/dpag bsam shing 
[\[266a.6\]]gi steng nas 'byung /_/dpral ba kha yi rgyan dang ni/_/nor bu 'og pag lus la ldan/_/bsod nams las las byung ba ni/_/dpag bsam shing gi steng nas 'byung /_/gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/_/rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/_/bsod nams 
[\[266a.7\]]las las grub pa ni/_/dpag bsam shing gi steng nas 'byung /_/ma rmos ma btab rang byung ba'i/_/bsod nams las kyis skyes pa ni/_/ma zhig sbun med dri ma med/_/'bras kyi 'bras bu dri zhim ldan/_/'bras rnams bed par btsos pa na/_/mi rnams yongs 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]su longs spyod do/_/de yi 'bras la zal zel med/_/stong phrag brgya ni 'byung ba yin/_/'bras kyi myu gu skye ba ni/_/thams cad du ni khyab par gnas/_/'bras snye re re skye ba la/_/phul ni re re 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mi rnams kyi ni 'bras kyi dri/_/thams cad du ni 
[\[266b.2\]]longs spyod do/_/stong phrag gnyis kyi shing rta'i tshad/_/shing rta brgya yi tshad tsam dang /_/shing rta sum cu rtsa dgu dang /_/bre chen bcu drug pa yi khal/_/de nas yang ni ku ba gnyis/_/de lta bu yi 'bras 'byung ngo /_/sa bon gcig la skye ba ni/_/skye bo rnams kyi bsod nams las/_/
[\[266b.3\]]gang zhig tog dang ldan par gnas/_/dung gi rgyal po mi yi bdag_/de yi tshe na de ltar 'gyur/_/yon tan gyi ni dpung rgyan 'dzin/_/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs/_/bzhin legs rna ba'i rgyan dang ldan/_/ha ri tsan dan lus la byugs/_/ka shi'i gos ni mchog tu 
[\[266b.4\]]gyon/_/nor ni rgya cher mang ba dang /_/ting cag pi wang gis sad byed/_/rtag tu shin tu skyid pa dang /_/de yi lus dang sems bde zhing /_/dpag tshad stong phrag bcu ru ni/_/'dzam bu gling ni gnas pa yin/_/tsher ma med cing shing med pa/_/mnyam zhing 'jam la sngo 
[\[266b.5\]]bsangs gnas/_/de la nad ni gsum 'byung ste/_/'dod dang zhen dang rgas pa'o/_/lnga brgya'i lo lon bud med ni/_/rgan dang gzhon pa bag mar len/_/gtan du gnyis ka bde ba yin/_/rtsod pa med par 'gyur ba yin/_/'bras bu lo tog phun sum tshogs/_/'khri 
[\[266b.6\]]shing gel pa shing gi tshal/_/rtswa ni sor bzhi pa ru skye/_/shin tu 'jam pa'i shing bal 'dra/_/ha cang mi grang mi dro zhing /_/char ni mnyam par 'bab pa dang /_/rlung ni shin tu chung ba dang /_/dus tshod mnyam par ldan pa dang /_/chu klung tA la mi dman zhing /_/de dang de yi 
[\[266b.7\]]sa yi cha/_/sa la rdo ni chung ldan la/_/sran nag sran chung tshad tsam mo/_/mu tig 'dra bas yongs su gang /_/rgyan rnams skyed mos tshal dang 'dra/_/dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/_/grong dang grong rdal mang pos gang /_/de dang de ni nye ba ru/_/'od ma smyug phran tshal bzhin no/_/
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]bya gag 'phur ba tsam nyid do/_/dge zhing rgyas la rdzu 'phrul ldan/_/lugs la nye bar 'tshe ba med/_/rtag tu rtse zhing dga' ba dang /_/gcig tu bde bas tshim pa dang /_/rgyu skar bde bas bskor ba dang /_/dga' zhing tshim la rab tu dga'/_/bza' dang 
[\[267a.2\]]btung ba mang po za/_/sha chang chu bzhin mang ba ni/_/lha yi pho brang lcang lo bzhin/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rgyal po'i pho brang ni/_/nyams dga' sgra mi snyan bzhin no/_/'dzam bu'i gling yang de bzhin gyur/_/de'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di ni bskal pa grangs med 
[\[267a.3\]]pa bcu drug dang bskal pa 'bum phrag gcig lhag tsam du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang /_pha rol du phyin pa sum cu rdzogs par byas nas thams cad sgrol bzhin du skye ba lhag ma'i lus sbyin pa chen por byas shing /_pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te/_de'i lus 
[\[267a.4\]]zhig nas dga' ldan du skye ba rdzogs par byas nas/_sangs rgyas byon par 'gyur ro zhes sgrogs so/_/stong phrag bcu'i 'khor yug gi lha rnams ni sangs rgyas byon par 'gyur ro zhes dam 'cha'o/_/phyogs lngar gzigs te dga' ldan gyi lha'i tshogs rnams kyi 'khor gyis bskor 
[\[267a.5\]]la/_dga' ldan nas byon te/_tog ldan zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang du/_dung gi rgyal po'i tshangs bzang mdun na 'don bram ze'i rigs kyi tshangs ldan ma'i rum du zhugs te/_'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu g.yos so/_/zla ba bcu 'das nas drang srong ltung ba dang ri 
[\[267a.6\]]dgas rgyu ba'i gnas su ma'i rum nas 'thon te rim pa bzhin du shes pa dang ldan par gyur te/_bdag nyid kyi bsod nams kyi mthus sa gzhi brtol nas steng du 'ongs te rin po che sna bdun gyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bzhir rang nyid kyi lha bzhin du lha mo zla ba'i gdong can ma la sogs pa/_lha'i bu mo 
[\[267a.7\]]bzhin du bud med mang po de rnams dang 'grogs nas/_lo stong phrag gcig lha bzhin du rjes su myong bar gyur te/_de'i nyin par rab tu byung ba'i gzugs gcig mthong nas gser gyi gzeb la mi dga' ba seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin du dpal 'byor ma lus pa rdzogs pa rin po 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]che'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rnams la shin tu mi dga' bar gyur nas nges par 'byung ba'i 'dod pa skyes so/_/thams cad stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi lha rnams lha'i me tog la sogs pa lag pas blangs nas 'jig rten gyi 'khor lo 'di gcig tu 'dus te/_dung gi rgyal po la sogs pa'i 
[\[267b.2\]]skye bo chen pos bzung nas dri bzang dang phreng ba dang bdug spos la sogs pas khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la bskor nas 'dug go/_/nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog lag pas bzung nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra gcig tu 'byin par byed do/_/'og min gyi bar du thams cad sgra gcig tu byed cing 
[\[267b.3\]]gnas so/_/de'i dus su rin po che'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo ltar 'khor zhing nam mkha' la 'gro'o/_/zla ba nya ba la rgyu skar gyi phreng bas bskor ba bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mo chen mo la sogs pa nam mkha' la bzhud do/_/gang zhig sems dpa' 
[\[267b.4\]]chen po dang 'grogs nas 'gro ba'i sems kyis de rnams kyis rang rang gi nam mkha' mthong ste tshangs pa chen pos dpag tshad gsum gyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i gdugs dkar po 'dzin no/_/brgya byin lha'i rgyal pos dung la sogs pa bzung nas 'bud do/_/de ltar dpal dang skal ba 
[\[267b.5\]]bzang po dang ldan pa'i lha dang mi'i tshogs kyis bskor nas khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]klu shing byang chub shing drung du gshegs so/_/de'i tshad ni/_khru brgya nyi shu yal ga'i bar/_/yal ga'i mtho tshad de dang mnyam/_/'khril nas steng nas 'og tu 'phyang /_/rma bya'i gdugs bzhin mdzes 
[\[267b.6\]]pa'o/_/rtag tu rtse mor me tog gsal/_/lha yi dri bzang bsung ldan zhing /_/ge sar phul lu gang tsam mo/_/me tog bzang po 'khor lo tsam/_/phyogs phyogs rlung gis 'khyer bar byed/_/dpag tshad bcu ru khyab pa'o/_/steng gi me tog 'og tu lhung /_/byang chub 
[\[267b.7\]]snying por me tog brtsegs/_/de'i dus su nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i bya rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshogs kyis sgra snyan pas mchod de/_de ltar klu shing gi byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs te nam mkha' la 'phyang zhing sa'i cha thams cad nyams dga' ba'i gnas su sdod do/_/de la zhag 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]bdun du dpal gyi snying por dka' ba spyod do/_/tshangs pa chen pos blangs nas dngos po rnams bzung nas rab tu byung ngo /_/ji snyed pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang rab tu byung ngo /_/de nas gzhan yang /_stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yis/_/bram ze'i rig byed mchog shes 
[\[268a.2\]]shing /_/byams pa rab tu byung bar gyur/_/de dang de ni rab tu byung /_/de la rab tu byung nas zla ba'i gdong can gyi lha mos shin tu mngar ba'i 'o thug phul lo/_/yongs su longs spyad nas srod kyi thun la byang chub kyi shing drung du sa bsnyams nas skyil krung gis ma pham pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[268a.3\]]shar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs su gzigs shing bzhugs so/_/rim pa bzhin du dus la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so sor rtogs so/_/'di skad gsungs pa/_'khor ba'i skye bo ma lus pa/_/dug med pa ni btsal ba'i phyir/_/dug med khyim ni byed pa ni/_/yang 
[\[268a.4\]]yang skye ba sdug bsngal ba/_/khyim ni byed pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/khyim ni gzhan ni byed pa med/_/sdug bsngal thams cad gzhig pa dang /_/dug ldan khyim ni gzhig pa'o/_/sems kyi dug ni spong ba dang /_/sred pa zad nas grol bar 'gyur/_/ched du brjod pa gsungs pa'o/_/
[\[268a.5\]]byang chub kyi shing gi drung du zhag bzhi bcu rtsa dgu bzhugs nas tshangs pas gsol ba 'debs pa'i phyir/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ched du drang srong lhung ba'i gnas su gshegs pa dang /_de nas der gshegs pa na/_zhabs ni bteg dang bzhag pa na/_/me tog pad ma skyes par 
[\[268a.6\]]gyur/_/'dab mnyam khru ni sum cu pa/_/'dab chung khru ni nyi shu lnga/_/ge sar khru ni nyi shu pa/_/lte ba khru ni bcu drug pa/_/ge sar rnams ni khyab par gnas/_/pad ma mdzod spu thams cad du'o/_/stobs bcu pa'i 'od kyis nyin mor byed pa'i 'od zil gyis mnan no/_/
[\[268a.7\]]nyin mo dang mtshan mo mi phyed par gyur to/_/de la srod dang tho rangs bya rnams skad sgrogs so/_/me tog kha zum pa dang bye bas mtshan mo dang nyin mor shes par byed do/_/gang dang gang du chos ston par byed pa de dang de ru chos kyi sgra sgrogs so/_/de'i phyir gsungs pa/_'od dang 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]'od zer tshad rnams ni/_/dbyangs dang dbyangs kyi tshad tsam mo/_/gzi brjid gzi yi tshad rnams ni/_/bsod nams bsod nams kyi ni tshad/_/shes rab shes rab kyi ni tshad/_/grags pa grags pa yi ni tshad/_/kha dog kha dog gi ni tshad/_/chos ni chos rnams kyi 
[\[268b.2\]]ni tshad/_/de nas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bram ze dang /_bye ba phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad kyi tshangs pa rnams kyis bdud rtsi'i btung ba 'thungs nas/_ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi mthu yis rnam pa brgya phrag du ma'i 'od zer 'phro zhing /_rnam pa brgya phrag du ma'i mtshan rdzogs pa 
[\[268b.3\]]mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog dang ldan pa dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan pa brgya phrag du ma'i sku mdog rnam pa du ma'i ya mtshan dang ldan par gyur pa brgya phrag du ma'i 'od zer de'i sku las 'thon par gyur to/_/de ni kha dog sngon po dang kha dog ser po dang /_kha dog dmar po dang /_kha 
[\[268b.4\]]dog dkar po dang /_btsod kyi mdog lta bu'i 'od zer dang ldan pa'i sku mdog can no/_/de'i sku lus la byung ba ni shing tA la'i tshad tsam gyi 'od zer 'phro'o/_/dus dang dus ma yin pa dang /_zung dang zung ma yin pa dang /_phung po dang phung po ma yin pa ni/_bcom ldan 'das kyi sku lus 
[\[268b.5\]]la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rgyang ring du 'gro ba dang thung du 'gro ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i sku lus ni mtho tshad du khru brgyad cu rtsa brgyad par 'gyur ro/_/zhabs kyi 'og nas pus mo'i bar du khru nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/_/pus mo nas lte ba'i bar du khru nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/_/lte ba nas 
[\[268b.6\]]sgrog rus kyi bar du khru nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/_/sgrog rus nas spyi gtsug gi bar du khru nyi shu rtsa gnyis so/_/dpung pa gnyis kyi bar du khru nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tshad do/_/sgrog rus re re'i dkyus ni khru lnga lnga'o/_/snyan gnyis kyi rtse mo nas rtsa ba'i bar la khru bdun bdun no/_/spyan re re'i mchu ru khru 
[\[268b.7\]]lnga lnga'o/_/smin ma gnyis kyi dkyus su khru lnga lnga'o/_/smin ma gnyis kyi dbus kyi bar zheng la khru lnga'o/_/shangs la khru bdun no/_/ya mchu ma mchu gnyis kyi mchu ru khru bcu bcu'o/_/ljags kyi zlums su khru lnga'o/_/gtsug tor la khru lnga'o/_/gser gyi me long dang 'dra ba'i 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]zhal gyi dkyil 'khor la khru nyi shu rtsa lnga'o/_/mgul pa la khru lnga'o/_/phyag gnyis kyi ring du khru bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa rtsa bzhi pa yin no/_/de ni 'di bzhin du dpe med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpal mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rol pa'o/_/stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten 
[\[269a.2\]]gyi khor yug thams cad kyi lha rnams dang /_de'i rjes su mi rnams kyi nang du gnas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/chos ston pa'i gnas dang bye ba 'bum phrag gcig gi lha dang /_mi'i 'ching ba grol ba dang /_chos kyi dang po thob pa dang /_chos kyi dang po ma thob pa rnams mtho 
[\[269a.3\]]ris su skye bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mchog dang ldan pa'i byams pa su zhig gis mi mthong /_nga ni ma bsad pa dang /_pha bsad pa dang /_dge slong ma sun phyung ba dang /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen byas pa dang /_mtshams med pa lnga'i las byas pa dang /_mchod rten bshig pa dang /_
[\[269a.4\]]byang chub kyi shing bcad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bsad pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi kha zas brlag par byas pa dang /_shin tu ser sna che ba dang /_log par lta bar nges pa dang /_'phags pa'i gang zag la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_gcer bu pa'i rigs te de rnams kyis mi mthong ngo /_/
[\[269a.5\]]tshigs bcad stong phrag gcig gis so sor brgyan pa 'di thams cad sgrol gyi skyes rabs chen po nyi ma gcig la skye bo rnams kyis bshad pa dang mnyan pa dang /_mar me stong phrag gcig gam/_stong phrag gcig gi me tog phal pa'am/_stong phrag gcig gi ud pa la sngon po'i me 
[\[269a.6\]]tog gam/_mchod rten byed pa'am/_sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs byed pa'am/_de la mchod pa byed pas ni byams pa sangs rgyas pa'i dus su/_de'i drung du dang po'i chos thob cing skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can lhag ma rnams kyis sbyin pa byin pa dang /_tshul khrims bsrungs 
[\[269a.7\]]pa dang /_gtsug lag khang sbyangs pa dang /_byang chub kyi shing bskrun pa dang /_mchod rten byas pa dang /_mchod rten dang byang chub kyi shing la rim gro byas pa dang /_skyed mos tshal bskrun pa dang /_zam pa btsugs pa dang /_lam bcos pa dang /_'gron khang byas pa dang /_
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]khron pa byas pa dang /_bstan pa'i bya ba byas pa dang /_chos kyi gnas la byi dor byas pa dang /_dri dang phreng ba la sogs pas mchod par byed pa dang /_gus par byas nas chos mnyan pa dang /_kha zas tsam gyi sbyin pa dge 'dun la gtong ba dang /_pha dang ma la bsnyen bkur 
[\[269b.2\]]byed pa dang /_rigs kyi gtso bo la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_gso sbyong la gnas pa la kha zas ster ba dang /_blo bur ba'i btsun pa la sbyin pa ster ba dang /_bsod snyoms pa la ster ba dang /_stan 'bul ba'i skye bos yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/
